articles.title: Enlarged Plenary Meeting of DPRK Cabinet Held
articles.content:
Enlarged Plenary Meeting of DPRK Cabinet Held
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- An enlarged plenary meeting of the Cabinet was held in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Attending it were Premier Pak Pong Ju and members of the Cabinet.
					
					 Present as observers were leading officials of institutions under the Cabinet, vice-ministers in charge of production, directors of management bureaus, chairpersons of provincial people's committees, provincial rural economy committees and provincial regional planning committees, directors of local industry management bureaus of provinces and managers of major industrial establishments.
					
					 The meeting discussed "On measures for carrying through the highly important tasks advanced by respected Supreme Leader Comrade Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address".
					
					 Speakers noted that the officials and working people in the economic field have made signal achievements under the guidance of the Supreme Leader, courageously smashing the mean and vicious sanctions of the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces.
					
					 The meeting analyzed and reviewed the successes and defaults made in last year's struggle to build an economic power and improve the people's living standard. And it discussed the matters arising in enhancing the independence and Juche character of the national economy and improving the people's living standard this year marking the 70th anniversary of the DPRK, as required by the revolutionary counter strategy laid down at the 2nd Plenary Session of the 7th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: President of NBC of U.S. Here
articles.content:
President of NBC of U.S. Here
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Oppenheim Noah David, president of the National Broadcasting Company of the U.S., and his party arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: New Stamp Album Published in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamp Album Published in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The stamp album "Accomplishment of the Historic Cause of Perfecting the National Nuclear Forces" was brought out in the DPRK.
					 Seen on the first page of the album are the emblem of the Workers' Party of Korea and letters "Long live General Kim Jong Un, peerless patriot who accomplished the historic cause of perfecting the national nuclear forces, the cause of building a rocket power!"
					
					 The album carries stamps commemorating the successful test-fires of ICBM Hwasong-14 in July Juche 106 (2017), a demonstration of the might of the WPK's strategic nuclear force, and the successful test-fire of new type ICBM Hwasong-15 in November.
					
					 It shows that the accomplishment of the historic cause of perfecting the national nuclear forces is a precious fruition of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's tireless devotion and energetic guidance and the immortal feats to be recorded in the history of building a nuclear power of Juche.

articles.title: Big Efforts Being Paid to Scientific Farming in DPRK
articles.content:
Big Efforts Being Paid to Scientific Farming in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- It has been pushed forward in the agricultural field of the DPRK to do faming in a scientific way, as part of the efforts to attain the target of grain production this year, the third year in implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					 In this regard, Ri Kyong Rok, vice department director of the Ministry of Agriculture, told KCNA:
					
					 The ministry has taken due measures to boost up low-yielding units.
					
					 The ministry and provincial, city and county agricultural guidance organs are directing big efforts to producing good strains of seeds and expanding their cultivation area, while paying deep attention to planting dry-field rice highly resistant to lower temperature and drought in arable lands lack of water or not kind for maize cultivation in order to raise per-hectare yield.
					
					 And measures have been taken to operate sci-tech learning spaces on a normal basis and render services like weather and crop growth forecasts and question-answer for farming technique through network, so as to disseminate advanced farming techniques and methods in time.
					
					 It also gains momentum to organize passing-on-technique and experience-share meetings and introduce water-saving farming methods, no-tillage cultivation, organic farming with the help of mud snails, etc.
					
					 Meanwhile, many efforts have been paid to producing high-performance farm machines for potato farming in Samjiyon and Paekam counties of Ryanggang Province and livestock farming in the Sepho area of Kangwon Province and laying a foundation for raising the rate of mechanization in farm work.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Steadfast is the faith of the Korean army and people to go along the road of socialism of Juche following the Party to the end, regarding the revolutionary sprit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, as an eternal ideological and mental weapon.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu is the unyielding offensive spirit of weathering obstacles and difficulties and the staunch spirit of fighting it out no matter how often one may fall.
					
					 The said spirit has been the lifeline of Juche Korea and its strongest weapon.
					
					 The DPRK wrought the historic miracles of defeating the two formidable imperialist enemies with young armed forces and performed heroic feats on the ruins and debris and despite harsh sanctions and blockade of the enemies. Such mysterious achievements would have been unthinkable without this spirit.
					
					 The revolutionary faith, fighting spirit and pluck of the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners were displayed to the full in the advance for the new century of Juche. As a result, the lifeline of the Party, revolution and Korean-style socialism has been firmly maintained and great victories and changes to be specially recorded in the history of the nation spanning five thousand years have been made one after another.
					
					 When the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, symbol of the great mental power of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea, is given full play, the invincibility of the Juche revolution and the mightiness of socialist Korea would be demonstrated more strikingly.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Foiling Ideological and Cultural Poisoning by Imperialism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Foiling Ideological and Cultural Poisoning by Imperialism
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- For all the nations aspiring to independence and opposing imperialism to combat the poisoning of decadent ideologies and culture of every description precisely means a fierce struggle to defend their sovereignty and dignity, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Saturday.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The imperialists regard the reactionary ideological and cultural poisoning as the most effective way for attaining their aggression and predatory aims with ease.
					
					 The degenerate reactionary ideology and the American outlook on value, which were employed as a guide to aggression, play the main role in aggression at present.
					
					 The imperialists consider the rising generation as the main target of their corrupt ideological and cultural poisoning.
					
					 Through films, newspapers, magazines and intranets and other media which the young people enjoy very much, the imperialists make them corrupt and degenerate and spread illusions about imperialism.
					
					 Those young people infected with luxury and enjoyment are reduced to renegades of their countries and stooges of imperialism unwittingly.
					
					 Some countries witnessed regime changes and government falls and the young people took the lead in causing such abnormal situations. That is because they were infected with the imperialist ideological and cultural poisoning.
					
					 The struggle in the ideological and cultural field is a war without gunfire. And a wrong struggle results in the worse consequences than the defeat in war.
					
					 The bourgeois ideological and cultural poisoning is more dangerous than a formidable enemy coming in attack with guns.
					
					 Any hesitation and concession to the ideological confrontation would give way to the bourgeois ideological and cultural poisoning and then it would make mess of the destiny of a nation and country.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Warned Not to Put out Hardly-kindled Spark for Improved North-South Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Warned Not to Put out Hardly-kindled Spark for Improved North-South Relations
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- We are now making all sincerity and efforts for the successful holding of the Winter Olympics due in south Korea in line with the unanimous expectation and wish of all Koreans.
					 But witnessed in south Korea, quite contrary to this, are dishonest things seriously chilling the dramatic atmosphere for the north-south reconciliation created by the great magnanimity and the initiative steps taken by the DPRK.
					
					 Along with the south Korean chief executive's ill-boding comments, there heard rubbish calling the technical issues regarding the DPRK's participation in the Olympics a "violation of sanctions on the north".
					
					 The conservative media and persons claimed that the use of "Mangyongbong-92" and Air Koryo during the Olympic period falls foul of the "independent sanctions" by the U.S. and south Korea. And they also said that provision of sports facilities for the players from the north and the financial support for the stay of delegations, cheering group and press group have the sign of "violating the sanctions" and that some high-ranking officials of the north with likeability to visit Phyongchang are on the list of "sanctions".
					
					 Needless to say, this represents the unpleasant and uneasy mind of the U.S. and the south Korean conservative forces displeased with the trend for the improvement of the north-south relations created after entering the new year.
					
					 What matters here is that the south Korean authorities have taken unequivocal stand, pledging to "prevent the controversy about violation of sanctions on the north as regards the north's participation in Phyongchang Olympics" and "to closely cooperate with the UN Sanctions Committee and the U.S. and other parts of the international community" for this.
					
					 To go senseless without manners and etiquette as the host is a shameful and foolish act before the world as it is little short of binding oneself hand and foot.
					
					 Now is a crucial time that every single matter should be handled with utmost care so as not to have adverse effect on the atmosphere for improving the north-south relations, and efforts should be exerted so that both sides can build confidence and have good feelings.
					
					 The ambiguous stand of the south Korean authorities cannot be construed otherwise than a revelation of the sinister intention to give impression that they are bringing someone benefits and they are doing something big for the north-south reconciliation while pleasing their American master.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should behave with discretion, away from the narrow-minded way of approach toward the DPRK's sincerity and magnanimity.
					
					 Everything is now at the beginning.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should make clear their stand, bearing in mind that their light acts and deeds may result in putting out the hardly-kindled spark for the improvement of the north-south relations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Algeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Algeria
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in booklet at the Tarzalt Publishing House in El-Djezair of Algeria on Jan. 10.
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the WPK is a proud course in which it has led the Korean revolution to victory, being responsible for the people's destiny under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied Abroad
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Reading sessions and lectures on the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were held in India, Tanzania, DR Congo, Finland, Denmark and Mexico on Jan. 4-15.
					 The vice-chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups hoped that the heroic Korean people would achieve fresh victory on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country this year, too, by taking the historic victory in the building of the state nuclear forces as a springboard for fresh progress, firmly united around Kim Jong Un, this year.
					
					 The chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo stressed that the U.S. must no longer resort to sanctions and pressure against the DPRK but repeal its hostile policy and learn how to co-exist with the DPRK, a nuclear-armed country.
					
					 The Korean people guided by the prominent leader will achieve bigger successes in the building of a powerful socialist country despite the hostile forces' anti-DPRK moves this year, too, he added.
					
					 The international secretary of the Finnish Communists' League noted that the Korean people are waging a dynamic struggle for the country's sovereignty and national reunification in hearty response to the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association expressed the will to lift up the voice of support and solidarity with the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Ethiopia
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- An Ethiopian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Addis Ababa on Jan. 9
					 Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the Ethiopia-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the exploits of Kim Jong Il for the cause of global independence in the period from Jan. 11 to Feb. 17.

articles.title: DPRK's Principled Stand Hailed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Principled Stand Hailed Abroad
Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Personages of Nigeria and Indonesia made public statements in support of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 Goodswill Nnaji, national chairman of the Better Nigeria Progressive Party, in a statement on January 12, highlighted the foreign policy stand clarified by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address and appealed to the progressive mankind to side with the DPRK, backing its principled stand for global peace and security.
					
					 The manager of the Millennia Armada Express Co. of Indonesia said in a statement on Jan. 9 that the proposals for national reunification advanced by Kim Jong Un are the most just guidelines, extending invariable solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Tiene lugar reunion ampliada del pleno del Consejo de Ministros
articles.content:
Tiene lugar reunion ampliada del pleno del Consejo de Ministros
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la reunion ampliada del pleno del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Participaron en la ocasion el premier Pak Pong Ju y otros miembros del Consejo de Ministros. 
					
					En calidad de observador, estuvieron presentes los funcionarios directivos de los organos subordinados directamente al Consejo de Ministros, los viceministros encargados de la produccion y los titulares de las Direcciones adscritas a los Ministerios, los presidentes de los comites populares provinciales, de los comites provinciales de economia rural y de los comites provinciales de planificacion, los jefes de las direcciones provinciales de industria local y los gerentes de las fabricas y empresas importantes. 
					
					La reunion discutio la agenda "Sobre las medidas para cumplir cabalmente las tareas programaticas presentadas por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en su Mensaje del Ano Nuevo 2018".
					
					Los oradores mencionaron que bajo la guia del Maximo Dirigente, los funcionarios y trabajadores del sector de economia han alcanzado exitos orgullosos frustrando tajantemente la brutal y sucia campana de sancion de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles. 
					
					Analizo e hizo balance de los exitos y defectos reportados el ano pasado en la construccion de la potencia economica y en la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					Debatio las medidas para elevar en este ano del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC el nivel independiente y autoctono de la economia nacional y mejorar las condiciones de vida poblacional, segun la estrategia de la respuesta revolucionaria presentada en el segundo pleno del VII Periodo del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Llegan a Pyongyang el presidente de NBC y su comitiva
articles.content:
Llegan a Pyongyang el presidente de NBC y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- Llegaron el dia 20 a esta capital el presidente de la cadena NBC de EE.UU., Oppenheim Noah David, y sus acompanantes.

articles.title: Publicado en Corea nuevo album de sellos
articles.content:
Publicado en Corea nuevo album de sellos
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- Quedo editado en Corea el nuevo album de sellos "Cumplimiento de la historica causa del perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado".
					En el medio de su primera pagina esta dibujada la insignia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y por debajo, se leen estas palabras: "!Viva el General Kim Jong Un, patriota sin igual que alcanzo grandes victorias de la historica causa del perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado y la empresa de construccion de la potencia coheteril!".
					
					El album contiene sellos conmemorativos de los grandes exitos en el primer y segundo lanzamientos de prueba del ICBM tipo "Hwasong-14", efectuados en julio del ano pasado, y en el disparo experimental del nuevo ICBM tipo "Hwasong-15", realizado en noviembre del ano pasado.
					
					Los sellos describen que el cumplimiento de dicha causa es el fruto valioso de la infatigable guia del Maximo Dirigente y esta hazana sera registrada para siempre en la construccion de la potencia nuclear del Juche.

articles.title: Hay que tomar actitud sincera para el mejoramiento de relaciones N-S
articles.content:
Hay que tomar actitud sincera para el mejoramiento de relaciones N-S
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- De acuerdo con la unanime esperanza y anhelo de toda la nacion, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea realiza ahora esfuerzos sinceros por la celebracion exitosa de los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales en el Sur de Corea. 
					En contraste, en el territorio surcoreano suceden cosas que rompen el dramatico ambiente de reconciliacion entre ambas partes coreanas, preparado por la magnanimidad y la iniciativa de la RPDC. 
					
					Ademas del discurso irracional del mandatario surcoreano, se escuchan unos chismes sobre los problemas de trabajo vinculados con la participacion de la parte Norte en la olimpiada tales como "violacion de la sancion anti-Norte". 
					
					Los medios de prensa y los teoricos conservadores del Sur de Corea dicen que el uso del barco "Mangyongbong-92" o la Aerolinea Coryo por el Norte de Corea en el periodo de la olimpiada contraviene a la "sancion independiente" de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Agregan que el suministro de aparatos deportivos al equipo norcoreano de jugadores y el pago de gastos de estancia de la delegacion y los grupos de hinchas y periodistas del Norte de Corea pueden dar pie a la "violacion de la sancion" y algunos de altos funcionarios norcoreanos posibles de visitar a Phyongchang estan incluidos en la lista de "sancion".
					
					Indudablemente, tales disparates representan el mal humor e inquietud de EE.UU. y las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas que estan descontentos del ambiente favorable a la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, creado a comienzos del Ano Nuevo. 
					
					Lo problematico es la actitud ambigua de las autoridades surcoreanas quienes dicen que "tomaran las medidas para que no ocurra la polemica sobre el desacato a la sancion anti-Norte por su participacion en los Juegos Olimpicos de Phyongchang" y "estrecharan la cooperacion con el Comite de Sancion de la ONU y la sociedad internacional, incluso EE.UU."
					
					Como se ve, ellas se muestran irrespetuosas sin saber como mantener la cortesia ni la honra de anfitrionas de la fiesta deportiva mundial. 
					
					Ahora es el momento en que ambas partes coreanas deben tomar precaucion de los temas que puedan perjudicar el ambiente favorable a la mejora de relaciones bilaterales y esforzarse por construir la confianza y simpatia sobre la contraparte. 
					
					Se puede decir que la actitud ambigua de las autoridades surcoreanas parte del malsano intento de lisonjear a su amo norteamericano y describir la coyuntura de reconciliacion Norte-Sur como un merito de si mismas. 
					
					Ellas deben actuar con prudencia dejando el punto de vista egocentrico sobre los esfuerzos sinceros y magnanimos de la parte connacional.
					
					Todavia, lo todo no pasa de ser el comienzo.
					
					Ellas deberan exponer en claro su posicion teniendo presente que su conducta frivola puede romper el hilo de la mejora de los vinculos Norte-Sur, reanudado a duras penas.

articles.title: KCNA Warns Conservative Media and Politicians against Anti-DPRK Vituperation
articles.content:
KCNA Warns Conservative Media and Politicians against Anti-DPRK Vituperation
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- At a time when our personnel's dispatch to the south side is high on the agenda following the north-south high-ranking talks and technical contacts, the south Korean conservative media and politicians continue to speak ill of the DPRK.
					 Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo and other conservative media of south Korea describe the measures and sincere efforts exerted by the DPRK as a step to "paint hermit state as normal state" and as the one for "promotion of social system" and as "camouflaged peace offensive".
					
					 They are even branding the Masikryong Ski Resort and Kalma Airport which we offered for joint training as "old and imperfect equipment" and "dangerous places", dare slandering them as the ones aimed at building "achievements".
					
					 "Liberal Korea Party" representative Hong Jun Phyo, chief spokesman Jang Je Won and other conservative politicians keep branding the DPRK's participation in the Olympics as the "one for estranging the south side from the U.S." and that the "Olympic is an offering presented to the north" up to date since the first day of the north-south technical talks.
					
					 These deliberate slandering to chill the ardent desire of the whole nation for improvement of the north-south ties clearly reveals the sordid nature and poor colors of those staking their fate on confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 Nothing else can be expected from the conservative remnants staking their fate on outsiders, nation's division and confrontation with the fellow countrymen. But their desperate acts of openly challenging the hardly-won atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south ties now shock even the international community, to say nothing of the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 Now the Korean people query should our sacred mission be truly sent to such a dangerous place where tricksters, devoid of traditional manners and customs of the Korean nation and any traits as the civilized men in the modern day, go roughshod.
					
					 As had already been clarified, there is no doubt about the sincerity and authenticity of the DPRK to improve the north-south relations and to ensure successful Olympics.
					
					 Never unreasonable was our request to value the hardly-won atmosphere for north-south reconciliation and keep it up, not asking the past of anyone who has the blood and the spirit of the Korean nation.
					
					 Furthermore, now that countries and nations competitively head for development to meet their own interests, the acts of slandering fellow countryman and inciting confrontation can not be construed otherwise than a traitorous act to check the unified development of the nation and to help outsiders fish in troubled waters.
					
					 Even before the north-south ties that had been in frozen made an official set-off, the conservative media and politicians resorted to all sorts of vituperation against the DPRK. This leads to increasing concern that the "Peace Olympics" so much touted by the south Korean authorities can turn into "Confrontation Olympics."
					
					 The whole nation has already turned its back on such reptile media as Chosun Ilbo and Choongang Ilbo which are only keen on smear campaign and slandering, being devoid of impartiality and objectivity as media and such conservative politicians as Hong Jun Phyo and Jang Je Won engrossed in criticizing their fellow countrymen.
					
					 If the trend toward the improvement of inter-Korean relations is checked and mistrust and contradiction build up again due to the thoughtless acts of the conservative remnants aimed to tarnish our noble compatriotic measures, those who played havoc with the great cause of the nation and slandered their fellow countrymen will be made to own full responsibility.
					
					 They are clearly reminded that the whole nation is closely following their future attitude.

articles.title: Madusan Revolutionary Battle Site Visited by Thousands of Units in Four Years
articles.content:
Madusan Revolutionary Battle Site Visited by Thousands of Units in Four Years
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- It is four years since respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un provided field guidance to the Madusan Revolutionary Battle Site.
					 The battle site is associated with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung for national liberation.
					
					 When the respected Supreme Leader visited it on Jan. 22 Juche 103 (2014), he said the revolutionary battle sites are eternal treasures of the Korean revolution, which can't be bartered for anything.
					
					Many service personnel, working people and youth and students of at least 2,300 units visited the battle site in the past four years.

articles.title: Millions of People Visit U.S. Imperialist Armed Spy Ship Pueblo
articles.content:
Millions of People Visit U.S. Imperialist Armed Spy Ship Pueblo
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- It is 50 years since the Navy of the Korean People's Army (KPA) captured the U.S. imperialist armed spy ship Pueblo.
					 Pueblo is the direct product of the acts of aggression against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea committed by the U.S. imperialists from the mid-19 century and a trophy symbolic of the U.S. bitter defeat and the DPRK's eternal victory in the anti-U.S. confrontation.
					
					 On Jan. 23, Juche 57 (1968) KPA seamen captured the ship, which intruded into the inviolable territorial waters of the DPRK, thus clearly showing to the world that we never pardon aggressors.
					
					 More than 2,190,000 service personnel, people of various strata and youth and students visited Pueblo, an exhibit showing to the whole world the crime of the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Censures U.S. for Aggravating Regional Situation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Censures U.S. for Aggravating Regional Situation
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. organized a foreign ministers' meeting of its satellites in Canada against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The meeting brought together those in charge of foreign affairs of mainly U.S. allies that participated in the past Korean War. The meeting chaired by U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson was reported to discuss the issues to intensify sanctions and pressure for "denuclearization" of the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary says this runs contrary to the aspiration and wishes of all the Koreans for the country's peace and reunification and is an unpardonable provocation aimed at aggravating the regional situation.
					
					 What the U.S. seeks in the meeting is to realize its aggressive goals by wrecking peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and exacerbating the tension, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 That's why the U.S. is hell-bent on the sanctions and pressure against the DPRK by mobilizing even its vassal forces in a bid to cast a chill over the atmosphere of north-south dialogue and refrain the tension on the Korean Peninsula from being defused.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is the fact that the south Korean authorities spouted undesirable remarks at the U.S.-led meeting in Canada.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to think twice about inglorious consequences to be entailed by their behavior.
					
					 With no sanctions and blockade can the hostile forces frighten the DPRK.
					
					 Even though the U.S. gets more desperate in anti-DPRK sanctions by mobilizing riffraff, unaware of the DPRK's strategic position and the trend of the times, the U.S. will never reverse the fate of the American empire rushing headlong to doom.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Media Denounced for Inciting Confrontation
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Media Denounced for Inciting Confrontation
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The Chosun Ilbo, the Choongang Ilbo and other south Korean conservative media are reeling off a litany of such malignant vituperation as "propaganda for the social system" and "camouflaged peace offensive", faulting the broadminded measures and sincere efforts of the DPRK.
					 Worse still, they are absurdly finding fault with the Masikryong Ski Resort and the Kalma Airport we provided for joint training with south side's players, describing them as "outdated and imperfect" and "dangerous places".
					
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun on Sunday comments that this is the grave provocation against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the traitorous act which could be done by the matchless scoundrels devoid of elementary etiquette for the other side and the rubbish media obsessed with confrontation.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 It is a lesson of the history that a distorted report would bring dreadful consequences.
					
					 The south Korean puppet conservative hack writers devoid of elementary moral principle of media and conscience can never be safe under the sky.
					
					 The Chosun Ilbo, the Choongang Ilbo and other south Korean conservative media will keenly feel what dear price they will have to pay for taking the lead in inciting mistrust and confrontation among the nation.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak Is to Blame for Ryongsan Disaster
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak Is to Blame for Ryongsan Disaster
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Memorial Committee to Mark the 9th Anniversary of Ryongsan Disaster held a news conference outside the office of traitor Lee Myong Bak on Jan. 19 at which it demanded Lee be branded as the real chief culprit of the Ryongsan disaster, detained and investigated, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 A press release was made public there. It said that traitor Lee drove the inhabitants of Ryongsan into death before the disaster.
					
					 It noted that the Lee Myung Bak regime mobilized police commando to ruthlessly suppress the evacuees squarely challenging it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied Abroad
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- Reading sessions and briefings on the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were held in Russia, Romania, Germany, Ethiopia and Nigeria between Jan. 2 and 15.
					 The first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation praised Kim Jong Un, who has creditably carried forward the cause of the preceding leaders, for firmly protecting the country's prestige and interests from the moves of the U.S. styling itself the "only superpower".
					
					 The secretary general of the Romania-Korea Friendship Association said that last year the Korean people laid an eternal foundation for ensuring peace and security of the Korean Peninsula by accomplishing the great, historic cause of perfecting the national nuclear forces and that all the successes made in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea would have been unthinkable without the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany and the chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany said that the year 2017 was a proud year of victory when the Korean people made eye-opening development in the face of the hostile forces' sanctions and a year when the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK went bankrupt and that before long the world will clearly see how the DPRK becomes a powerful socialist country.
					
					 The chief of the Ethiopian Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and other speakers stressed that the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un brightly indicated the path for the Korean people and that Korea will surely be reunified in the near future when it does as indicated by him in his New Year Address.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Mexico
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Mexico
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- A Mexican national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star) was formed on Jan. 10.
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and immortal feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the feats performed by the Korean army and people in the building of a powerful socialist country and organize diverse political and cultural events on these anniversaries and other holidays of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Nigeria
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Nigeria
Pyongyang, January 21 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Abuja on Jan. 10.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and immortal feats of Kim Jong Il and the successes achieved by the Korean people in the building of a powerful socialist country and organize significant political and cultural events including a celebration and film show.

articles.title: ACNC rechaza en comentario la demagogia de medios conservadores surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC rechaza en comentario la demagogia de medios conservadores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 21 de enero (ACNC) -- Prosigue la demagogia de medios y politicos conservadores surcoreanos aunque terminaron las conservaciones de alto nivel y otras de trabajo N-S y esta sobre el tapete el envio del personal norcoreano al Sur de Corea.
					"Chosun Ilbo", "Choongang Ilbo" y otros medios conservadores de la prensa surcoreana hablan mal de las medidas magnanimas y esfuerzos sinceros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea describiendolos como la medida para pintar el "Estado hermetico como el normal", "cosas para la propaganda del regimen" y "ofensiva de la paz fingida". 
					
					En cuanto al Campo de Esqui Masikryong y el Aeropuerto de Kalma, ofrecidos por la RPDC para el entrenamiento junto con los jugadores surcoreanos, los critican como "instalaciones viejas y defectivas" y "lugares peligrosos" y como sitios para la propaganda de los "meritos" de alguien.
					
					Por otra parte, desde el primer dia de las conservaciones de trabajos Norte-Sur hasta ahora, el representante del Partido de Corea Libre, Hong Jun Phyo, el portavoz en jefe de la misma organizacion, Jang Je Won, y otros politicos conservadores pronuncian injurias de toda indole sobre la participacion de la RPDC en los Juegos Olimpicos como "cosa para sembrar discordias entre EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea" y "ofrendar los Juegos Olimpicos al Norte".
					
					Este disparate malintencionado desalienta el entusiasmo de toda la nacion coreana por la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y deja conocer nuevamente el sucio atributo y la miserable fechada de los elementos que se sustentan de la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Causa la consternacion de todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar y hasta de la sociedad internacional la locura de los elementos conservadores y conflictivos que desafian publicamente a la atmosfera de mejoramiento de relaciones de ambas partes coreanas, dificilmente preparada.
					
					Como ya hemos aclarado, no cabe ninguna duda en nuestra posicion de buena fe y sinceridad de mejorar las relaciones N-S y celebrar con exito los eventos nacionales.
					
					Es razonable nuestra demanda de que cualquier persona con sangre y espiritu de la nacion coreana debe apreciar el clima de reconciliacion N-S, dificilmente preparado, y fomentarlo sin comprometerse a los antecedentes.
					
					Actualmente, todos los paises y naciones compiten para desarrollarse mas anteponiendo los intereses propios. En estas circunstancias, calumniar a la parte connacional y fomentar el enfrentamiento fratricida a la vista de la humanidad constituyen un acto antinacional para impedir el desarrollo unificado de la nacion y favorecer a las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Por culpa de los medios y politiqueros conservadores surcoreanos que se dedican a la demagogia sobre el Norte aun antes de que las relaciones N-S en congelamiento hasta hace poco dieran oficialmente la nueva partida hacia el mejoramiento, se hace mas fuerte la preocupacion de que los "Juegos Olimpicos de la Paz", anunciados tanto por las autoridades surcoreanas, se conviertan en "los conflictivos".
					
					Hace mucho tiempo, todos los compatriotas escupieron en los colectivos de plumiferos pagados como "Chosun Ilbo" y "Choongang Ilbo", que se empenan en tramar intrigas y calumniar faltando a la imparcialidad y objetividad de la prensa, y en el representante del Partido de Corea Libre, Hong Jun Phyo, el portavoz en jefe de la misma organizacion, Jang Je Won, y otros politicos conservadores que publican en esos medios sus blasfemias.
					
					Si se detiene nuevamente la corriente de mejoramiento de relaciones N-S y se agravan la desconfianza y antagonismo debido a la conducta grosera de los restos de fuerzas conservadores que se atreven a manchar las nobles medidas fraternales de la RPDC, la responsabilidad recaera totalmente sobre ellos que echan a perder la gran empresa nacional con sus malas lenguas insultando a la parte connacional.
					
					Les recordamos nuevamente que toda la nacion observa ahora con una mirada rigurosa el posterior acto verbal de ellos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena reunion anti-RPDC convocada por EE.UU. en Canada
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena reunion anti-RPDC convocada por EE.UU. en Canada
Pyongyang, 21 de enero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, EE.UU. convoco en Canada una reunion de caracter provocativo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea invitando a las fuerzas seguidoras. En esta cita auspiciada por el secretario de Estado Tillerson, tomaron parte principalmente los jefes de la diplomacia de los paises satelites de EE.UU. que habian participados en la pasada guerra coreana.
					Segun trascendidos, se ha discutido en esa ocasion el problema de endurecer la sancion y presion para la "desnuclearizacion" de alguien.
					
					Este caso resulta un imperdonable acto provocador que busca la agravacion de situacion regional desafiando a la aspiracion de todos los coreanos a la paz y reunificacion del pais.
					
					Asi condena el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado este domingo y prosigue:
					
					Es el intento taimado de EE.UU. cumplir su objetivo de agresion al destruir la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y exacerbar de continuo la tension.
					
					Con la intencion de congelar el ambiente de mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas y romper la coyuntura de alivio de tension en la Peninsula Coreana, el imperio americano trata de recrudecer la sancion y presion anti-RPDC involucrando hasta las fuerzas satelites.
					
					Lo mas problematico es el discurso malsano de las autoridades surcoreanas hecho en la susodicha reunion de Canada.
					
					Seria mejor que ellas piensen seriamente en las consecuencias catastroficas de su conducta.
					
					No podra asustarnos ninguna forma de sancion ni de bloqueo de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Aunque el imperio americano se mueve fanatico por sancionar y presionar mas fuerte a la RPDC movilizando a los fulanos y menganos sin justipreciar la posicion estrategica de la segunda ni la corriente de la epoca actual, no podra reparar su destino condenado al arruinamiento.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena la demagogia de medios conservadores surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena la demagogia de medios conservadores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 21 de enero (ACNC) -- "Chosun Ilbo", "Choongang Ilbo" y otros medios conservadores de la prensa surcoreana hablan mal de las medidas magnanimas y esfuerzos sinceros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea describiendolos como "cosas para la propaganda del regimen" y "ofensiva de la paz fingida".
					Ademas, critican el Campo de Esqui Masikryong y el Aeropuerto de Kalma, ofrecidos por la RPDC para el entrenamiento junto con los jugadores surcoreanos, como "instalaciones viejas y defectivas" y "lugares peligrosos".
					
					Esta demagogia constituye una grave provocacion a la RPDC y un acto antinacional de que son capaces solo esos medios enloquecidos por el enfrentamiento fratricida que no tienen ni la elemental cortesia sobre la contraparte.
					
					Asi condena el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de hoy y prosigue:
					
					La historia ensena la leccion de que las desinformaciones de la prensa causan resultados terribles.
					
					Dentro de la nacion coreana, no hay refugio para los plumiferos venales conservadores del Sur de Corea quienes no respetan la principal mision de la prensa ni tienen conciencia.
					
					"Chosun Ilbo", "Choongang Ilbo" y otros medios conservadores veran cuan caro les va a costar su papel de abanderado en fomentar la desconfianza y confrontacion entre los compatriotas.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservatives Blasted for Chilling Atmosphere for Improved Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservatives Blasted for Chilling Atmosphere for Improved Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- Ri Myong, councilor of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, made public an article on Monday.
					 Referring to the fact that the frozen inter-Korean ties have been put on the orbit of dialogue, cooperation and improved relations as desired by the entire Korean nation aspiring to the reunification from the outset of the year, the article went on:
					
					 However, the south Korean conservatives are making no scruple of letting out reckless remarks chilling the hardly-won atmosphere of the improvement of the inter-Korean relations, quite contrary to the unanimous expectations and desire of all the fellow countrymen and the trend of the times.
					
					 Hong Jun Phyo, Kim Song Thae, Sim Jae Chol, Ham Jin Gyu, Ra Kyong Won, Kim Mu Song and Jang Je Won of the "Liberal Korea Party" and Ryu Sung Min and Ha Thae Gyong of the "Parun Party" and Jo Won Jin of "Korean Patriotic Party" are taking the lead in the smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 Those are crying out for "further ratcheting up the sanctions and pressure for nuclear dismantlement of the north," describing our sincere proposal for dialogue and proactive measures for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations as "the strategy to gain the time for completing the nuclear force", "the bogus peace offensive aimed at disintegrating the south Korea-U.S. alliance" and "an artifice for making a breakthrough in overcoming the sanctions."
					
					 As for the participation of the north side's sports team and big mission in the Winter Olympics welcomed by the entire Korean nation and the whole world, they even bluster that "the Olympics should not be the venue for promotion of the north's social system" and "the flag of south Korea, not the Korean Peninsula flag, should be raised when the players of the north and the south make a joint entry" and "the formation of a single team will make the sportspersons of the south side abandon their dreams and future."
					
					 Representative of the "Liberal Korea Party" Hong Jun Phyo, who is the top-class political profiteer and chieftain of thieves without an equal in the south Korean political camp and is nicknamed a would-be rapist, "Hong Quixote", "Hong Trump," etc. for his despicable words and deeds, claimed that "the north is making the Phyongchang Olympics the Pyongyang Olympics with a spoon only", "it is the venue for promotion of Nazism", and "the north is using the international sports festival for the south-north political show".
					
					 Ra Kyong Won sent the IOC a letter urging it not to allow the formation of the single team, stunning the world.
					
					 Head of the "Korean Patriotic Party" Jo Won Jin, who is a remnant of traitor Park Geun Hye, and other mad men are making desperate efforts to block the improvement of the north-south relations, while committing unpardonable atrocities chanting "No participation of the north in the Olympics" and defaming the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and burning the DPRK flag and the Korean Peninsula flag in the heart of Seoul.
					
					 They are, indeed, human scum obsessed with pro-U.S. sycophancy and confrontation with the fellow countrymen. 
					
					 We reiterate that our measures are not ones for "gaining time", "disintegrating south Korea-U.S. alliance" and "making a breakthrough in overcoming the sanctions" but the important decision for the fellow countrymen and the nation.
					
					 Whoever has national conscience even a bit would not run amuck to spoil the hardly-won climate of reconciliation, speaking ill of the exciting event brought about by such noble patriotism and love for compatriots and the fact that south Korea greatly benefits from the event.
					
					 The traitors staking their fates on the submission to the U.S. might regard the "south Korea-U.S. alliance" as an ancestral tablet but the south Korean candlelight demonstrators aspiring to independence and justice have already sentenced to death the alliance, no more than the humiliating relations between master and servant in colony, and are dynamically advancing along the road to national independence.
					
					 The rapidly changing inter-Korean relations are the strict indictment and judgment on the thrice-cursed crimes of the conservative group of Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye who drove the north-south relations to the worst catastrophe and the Korean Peninsula to the danger of a nuclear war while resorting to sycophancy to the U.S. and confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 If these traitors and psychopaths defaming the dignified Korean nation are allowed to go scot-free, the national reconciliation, unity and the building of a reunified powerful country will be delayed so much.
					
					 Those committing evil doings, frightened by the mounting enthusiasm for national reconciliation and unity, should clearly understand that their reckless acts are big crimes before the nation and will pay high price for them.

articles.title: 23rd Paektusan Prize Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions Opens
articles.content:
23rd Paektusan Prize Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions Opens
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The 23rd Paektusan Prize Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions was opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street here Monday to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The contest is to be held on a knock-out basis being divided into four groups. The participants will compete in basketball, volleyball, badminton, Taekwon-do and shooting events at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, the Taekwon-Do Hall, the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street, the Meari Shooting Gallery and other places.
					
					 At the same time, tug of war and other diverse sporting and amusement games will also take place.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee, and other officials concerned and officials and players of ministries and national institutions.

articles.title: Nutritive Liquid Effective in Increasing Grain Production
articles.content:
Nutritive Liquid Effective in Increasing Grain Production
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The Chongjong Cooperative Farm in Chongdan County, South Hwanghae Province, the DPRK is pushing forward the drive to produce a large amount of nutritive liquid with peat, chicken droppings and rice-straw ash.
					 In recent years, the farm has increased the grain output per hectare by using this nutritive liquid.
					
					 According to Ra Sun Gil, chief engineer of the farm, the farm not only processed the seed with this nutritive liquid but also applied foliage dressing according to period and crops, proving effective.
					
					 Germination percentage increased more remarkably than before and paddy rice were produced 900 more kilograms per hectare, maize 1.2 more tons, bean 600 more kilograms and barley 3.7 more tons.
					
					 In comparison with humate production, the consumption of raw materials decreased, but actual yield rate increased.
					
					 Rice-straw ash was used instead of caustic soda.
					
					 The farm set a higher target to produce nutritive liquid and is meticulously organizing the work to carry it out.

articles.title: Japan's Heinous Crime Should Be Settled without Fail
articles.content:
Japan's Heinous Crime Should Be Settled without Fail
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists illegally occupied Korea early in the 20th century and committed a number of heinous unethical crimes.
					 Among them was an assassination of Kojong, emperor of Korea, on January 22, 1919.
					
					 Emperor Kojong, representative of the Feudal Joson Dynasty, expressed his strong dissatisfaction for Japan's aggressive maneuverings and tried to frustrate them.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists forced him to conclude the "Ulsa (1905) Five-Point Treaty" for establishing colonial domination over Korea, but he did not sign and seal the treaty despite aggressors' threat and blackmail.  
					
					 He dispatched three emissaries to the 2nd International Peace Conference held in Hague in June 1907, letting them expose the illegality and invalidity of the treaty. 
					
					 When the Japanese imperialists compelled him to acquiesce in the "Jongmi Seven-Point Treaty" that year, he rejected the prior consent, signing and sealing of it.
					
					 Regarding him as a thorn in their flesh, the Japanese imperialists forcibly dethroned Kojong and, not content with it, they murdered him by poison.
					
					 According to the history, the Japanese imperialists instigated a stooge to put poison into food prepared for Kojong. After his death, his eyes turned into bloody color and red stigmas broke out on his whole body.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists made desperate efforts to conceal their crime but it cannot be covered up.
					
					 The "2nd declaration on independence" worked out and announced by the "Korean Provisional Government" in Shanghai in 1921 and the personal letter of a child of Kojong's concubine wrote that the Japanese imperialists imprisoned those who insisted on the poisoning of Kojong after examining his corpse and finding out red stigmas on his whole body.
					
					 Recorded in the diary of a Japanese, who was director of the auditing bureau at Japan's royal office in 1919, are the data that Terauchi, the first Japanese imperialist "governor-general" in Korea, instructed to poison Emperor Kojong for the reason that he refused to acknowledge the "Ulsa Five-Point Treaty".
					
					 Japan is now impudently scheming to justify or cover up its heinous unethical crimes committed against the Korean people in the past.
					
					 Japan should make apology and reparation for its past crimes.

articles.title: U.S. Is Doomed to Destruction: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Is Doomed to Destruction: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. and its vassal forces held the "Vancouver foreign ministers' meeting" in Canada over the security and stability of the Korean Peninsula.
					 The issue of stepping up sanctions and pressure against the DPRK for its "denuclearization" was reportedly put on the table at the meeting attended by foreign ministers of 20 countries including Japan, Britain and France that participated in the past Korean War, with U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson in the chair.
					
					 The U.S. claimed that the meeting was aimed at putting sustained pressure in such feasible ways for blocking maritime channels of north Korea and that it should know such pressure gets stronger as time goes by.
					
					 At a time when a peaceful environment has been created on the Korean Peninsula thanks to our active efforts, the U.S. and its vassal forces held the meeting. This is unpardonable provocation going against the aspiration and desire of all Koreans for the country's peace and reunification and aggravating the regional situation.
					
					 Now the international community is pouring scorn on the farce of those countries which were defeated in the Korean War.
					
					 The U.S. dispatched its huge aggression forces boasting of their "invincibleness" and "elite" as well as its vassal forces to the Korean Peninsula in the past century but they all met the fate of forlorn wandering spirits.
					
					 The U.S. predecessors who suffered from disgrace of "defeated general" and "grave general" frankly confessed that the U.S. fought a wrong war with a wrong rival in the wrong place at the wrong time.
					
					 The U.S., which failed to bring the Korean people with rifles to their knees in the Korean War, is now trying to inveigle its vassal forces into the dangerous scenario against the DPRK which has emerged as a new strategic state. It is nothing but hysteria.
					
					 Those countries that joined the United States in the Korean War have still joined it in international terrorism at its beck and call. This adds to the crimes against the Korean people.
					
					 As the saying goes, those who are fond of playing with fire are destined to perish in the flames and there is no use crying over spilt milk.
					
					 When the north and the south of Korea have dialogues for the successful holding of the great event common to the nation, the south Korean authorities joined in the international plot to do harm to their fellow countrymen. This is intolerable.
					
					 The reality once again clearly tells who breaks reconciliation and unity between the north and the south and who harasses peace of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The aggressors and provokers who are trying to ignite a second Korean war challenging the strongest nuclear power and military power of the world will only face corpse and death.
					
					 No matter how desperate the U.S. gets to increase pressure upon the DPRK by mobilizing all sorts of riffraff, oblivious of the DPRK's strategic position and trend of the times, the empire of America is doomed to destruction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Strength of Science in Building Powerful Socialist Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Strength of Science in Building Powerful Socialist Nation
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially says that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's field guidance to the State Academy of Sciences was a historic event in which he once again powerfully demonstrated to the world the firm determination and will of the Workers' Party of Korea to open up a broad avenue for the building of a powerful socialist country and hasten final victory on the strength of science and technology.
					 Steadfast is the determination of the WPK to lay the groundwork of a powerful country, pave a wide avenue for building a prosperous country on the strength of science and technology and make the people enjoy all blessings with scientific and technological successes, the editorial says, adding:
					
					 Now is the time for the scientists and technicians of socialist Korea, who have grown up under the care of the Party, to give free rein to their prominent intelligence and give full play to their high spirit of creation and patriotism.
					
					 All the scientists and technicians should fulfill the honorary mission and duty as standard-bearers and frontline soldiers in the struggle for opening up a broad avenue for the building of a powerful socialist country and hastening the final victory on the strength of science and technology.
					
					 The powerful socialist country that we are building now is a knowledge-based economic giant which will be propelled and guaranteed by world-level advanced science and technology.
					
					 The editorial appeals to all the scientists, technicians, officials and working people to achieve fresh victories on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country by making continued innovations and progress on the strength of science and technology in hearty response to the WPK's idea of prioritizing science and technology.

articles.title: No Force Can Block Advance of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No Force Can Block Advance of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The imperialists are getting evermore pronounced in their moves to isolate and stifle the Democratic People's Republic of Korea as they do not hope that it would become strong and rich, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article. It goes on:
					 The moves of hostile forces against the DPRK were the most brutal ones unprecedented in history. However, the DPRK became a nuclear power of Juche and world military power which no formidable enemy dares provoke and achieved a series of successes in the building of a powerful socialist country last year.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces are now making last-ditch efforts to deprive the DPRK of its sovereignty and rights to existence and development.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists run amuck in the barbarous sanctions and blockade against the DPRK by dint of all economic and diplomatic means, unprecedentedly increasing the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula by massively deploying the nuclear strategic assets in and around the peninsula.
					
					 The enemies' sanctions will never work on the DPRK as it has the foundation of self-supporting national economy and a huge army of reliable scientists who are fully supporting the policies of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and devotedly working to implement them.
					
					 Victory and glory are in store for Juche Korea and its future is rosy thanks to the wise guidance of the WPK and the single-hearted unity of all the service personnel and people united close around it.

articles.title: No Statute of Limitations Is Applicable to Crimes against Korea by Japanese Imperialists: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No Statute of Limitations Is Applicable to Crimes against Korea by Japanese Imperialists: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- An article of Rodong Sinmun Monday marks the anniversary of intoxication of Emperor Kojong, representative of the sovereignty of the Korean nation, by the Japanese imperialists.
					 The intoxication of Emperor Kojong on January 22, 1919 was a hideous crime committed by the Japanese imperialists to more thoroughly enforce their colonial rule over Korea, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The fact is stark evidence showing that the Japanese imperialists did stoop to any infamy to realize their colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists' decades-long colonial rule over Korea was unprecedented hideous crimes aimed at exterminating the Korean nation.
					
					 History records lots of data about colonial rules enforced by imperialists but there is no such ferocious imperialism as Japanese imperialism as it went wild to trample the history and tradition of a nation that had been inherited century after century and to deprive the nation of even its spoken and written languages.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists' crimes against humanity can never be written off.
					
					 State reparations should be made for those hideous crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the first half of the last century as they were state-sponsored, organized crimes.
					
					 No statute of limitations is applicable to the hideous crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean nation.

articles.title: "Liberal Korea Party" Coteries' Act of Going against Trend of Times Flailed
articles.content:
"Liberal Korea Party" Coteries' Act of Going against Trend of Times Flailed
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservatives including the "Liberal Korea Party" are now talking about sort of "lobbying" and "intention of provocation behind the sports exchanges" over the participation of the DPRK in the coming Winter Olympics and the dispatch of a cheering group and an art troupe, claiming that this may undermine the international cooperation for "sanctions on the north". They are also touting hoarse that "Olympics is a tribute offered to the north" and the "Olympics should not be a ground for political promotion of the north," getting perverse over the mounting enthusiasm of the south Korean public over the news of the north-south technical talks for the dispatch of art troupe.
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Monday says this proves that the coteries of the "Liberal Korea Party" are a group of hideous traitors only concerned for escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen and meeting their greed for power, being indifferent to the desire and wish of the nation.
					
					 Needless to say, the flurry of invectives uttered by the conservative forces are aimed to chill the atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 It is clear that there can neither be the successful Olympics nor the improvement of the north-south ties and the peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula should the "Liberal Korea Party" coteries be allowed to go on challenging the nation's enthusiasm for reunification in their moves to tide over the extreme political crisis and prolong their remaining days.

articles.title: Fire Leaves Five Persons Dead in Seoul
articles.content:
Fire Leaves Five Persons Dead in Seoul
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- A fire occurred at a hotel in Jongro District of Seoul at around 3 a.m. on Jan. 20, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 The fire left five persons dead and several others wounded just in one hour.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Germany
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on Jan. 11.
					 The chairman of the Forum was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee fixed the celebration period from Jan. 11 to Feb. 16 and decided to organize diverse political and cultural events such as seminar and film show in the period.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- A Bulgarian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Sofia on Jan. 12.
					 Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from Jan. 26 to Feb. 16 and decided to organize multifarious political and cultural events in Sofia and other local areas.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was brought out in booklet at the Knizhnii Mir Publishing House of Russia.
					 The work published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble career of loving the country and its people.
					
					 It also indicates important matters arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Jan. 17.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Backed by Political Party, Body of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Backed by Political Party, Body of DR Congo
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- A political party and a body of DR Congo made public statements on Jan. 10 and 11 supporting the New Year Address made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The Communist Party of DR Congo said that it can foresee the victory of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in the meaningful year 2018 after reading the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It noted that Kim Jong Un, who completely contained the U.S. with his rare wisdom and matchless pluck, stressed the need to glorify this meaningful year as an eventful one noteworthy in the history of the nation by improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It pointed out that it expresses full support to his proposals for Korea's reunification based on the idea of national independence.
					
					 The Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in DR Congo sincerely wished, together with the Juche idea followers and peace-loving people across the world, the Korean people bigger success this year marking the 70th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.

articles.title: Ri Myong condena disparates de conservadores surcoreanos
articles.content:
Ri Myong condena disparates de conservadores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 22 de enero (ACNC) -- El consejero del Secretariado del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria, Ri Myong, publico el dia 22 un articulo que sigue:
					Desde el principio del Ano Nuevo, las congeladas relaciones intercoreanas entraron en la orbita de dialogo, cooperacion y mejoramiento de acuerdo con la aspiracion y demanda de todos los miembros de la nacion coreana que desean la reintegracion territorial.
					
					A contrapelo de la unanime esperanza de todos los coreanos y a la corriente de la epoca actual, los conservadores surcoreanos pronuncian disparates, que envenenan el clima de mejoramiento de relaciones N-S creado a duras penas, y cometen locuras insoportables.
					
					Al frente de ellos estan Hong Jun Phyo, Kim Song Thae, Sim Jae Chol, Ham Jin Gyu, Ra Kyong Won, Kim Mu Song y Jang Je Won del Partido de Corea Libre, Ryu Sung Min y Ha Thae Gyong del Partido Parun y Jo Won Jin del Partido Patriotico de Corea.
					
					Estos tipejos difaman la sincera propuesta de dialogo y las iniciativas para el mejoramiento de relaciones tomadas por la RPDC como "estrategia para ganar el tiempo necesario a perfeccionar las fuerzas armadas nucleares", "ofensiva de paz fingida que busca la ruptura de la alianza Surcorea-EE.UU." y "artimana para superar la sancion" y reclaman en voz alta "endurecer mas la sancion y presion para la cancelacion nuclear del Norte".
					
					Ahora tanto los coreanos como los extranjeros apoyan y aplauden con unanimidad la participacion de la seleccion de deportistas y los grupos de la RPDC en los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.
					
					Pero, aquellos conservadores surcoreanos insisten absurdamente en que "los juegos olimpicos no deben ser un campo de propaganda sobre el regimen del Norte", "hay que levantar no la bandera de la Peninsula Coreana sino la surcoreana durante la aparicion conjunta en el estadio" y la "composicion del equipo unificado significa obligar a los jugadores surcoreanos renunciar su sueno y futuro".
					
					Sobre todo, el representante del Partido de Corea Libre, Hong Jun Phyo, peor estafador politico y ladron no. 1 quien se gano la mala fama de "autor del conato de violacion sexual", "Hong quijote", "Hong Trump", dijo que "el Norte aparece solo con la cuchara en la mano para convertir los Juegos Olimpicos de Phyongchang en los de Pyongyang", "la sede del evento deportivo sera lugar de propaganda nazista" y "usan el festival internacional de deportes para la demostracion politica Sur-Norte". Mientras tanto, la mujerzuela Ra Kyong Won dejo consternado a todo el mundo al remitir al Comite Olimpico Internacional un mensaje de que no se puede tolerar en ningun caso la composicion del equipo unificado Norte-Sur.
					
					Para colmo, el capo del Partido Patriotico de Corea, Jo Won Jin, uno de los subordinados fieles a la traidora Park Geun-hye, y otros histericos cometieron acciones nunca perdonables como insultar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y quemar la bandera de esta y la de reunificacion en la parte centrica de Seul gritando la consigna "!No la participacion del Norte en los Juegos Olimpicos!"
					
					Tales locuras se les pueden ocurrir solo a las escorias humanas enviciadas del servilismo a EE.UU., enloquecidas por el enfrentamiento fratricida y habituadas a la demagogia contra la parte connacional.
					
					Reiteramos otra vez que la presente medida de la RPDC no es para "ganar el tiempo" ni "romper la alianza Surcorea-EE.UU." ni "superar la sancion" sino deviene de punta a cabo la decision importante para los compatriotas y la nacion.
					
					Si alguien tiene, aunque sea en lo minimo, la conciencia nacional, no podria insultar el presente acontecimiento conmovedor iniciado gracias al amor por la nacion y por los compatriotas ni romper el ambiente de reconciliacion preparado a duras pernas. Ademas, es el Sur de Corea el que se beneficia al maximo de ese acontecimiento.
					
					Ahora los vendepatrias proyanquis consideran como tesoro la "alianza Surcorea-EE.UU.", pero la opinion publica surcoreana reflejada en velas encendidas, que ama la independencia y la justicia, puso ya el punto final a esa alianza, que no pasa de ser las vergonzosas y humillantes relaciones entre la colonia y el metropoli, y avanza a pasos firmes por la senda de independencia nacional.
					
					La realidad de hoy en que se cambian bruscamente las relaciones intercoreanas constituye una declaracion severa y sentencia sobre los crimenes de las bandas conservadoras de Lee Myung Bak y Park Geun-hye que situaron las relaciones N-S en la peor coyuntura de ruptura y la Peninsula Coreana en el peligro de guerra nuclear recurriendo al servilismo proyanqui y a la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Si se dejan intactos a aquellos traidores incurables y psicopatas que manchan la imagen de la nacion coreana, se tardaran los pasos hacia la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y la construccion de una potencia reunificada.
					
					Los espantados ante el creciente entusiasmo por la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales deben saber bien que sus acciones demenciales constituyen un tremendo crimen contra la nacion que les costara muy caro.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la "reunion de cancilleres" para endurecer la sancion anti-RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la "reunion de cancilleres" para endurecer la sancion anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 22 de enero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Estados Unidos y sus satelites sostuvieron en Canada la "reunion de cancilleres de Vancouver" sobre la seguridad y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					En esta cita auspiciada por el secretario de Estado Tillerson, se reunieron los jefes de diplomacia de 20 paises, principalmente los participantes en la pasada guerra coreana tales como Japon, Gran Bretana, Francia.
					
					Dicen que la reunion debatio el tema de endurecer la sancion y presion anti-Norte de Corea para lograr su desnuclearizacion.
					
					EE.UU. chismeo que la "reunion tiene la meta de ejercer la presion sostenible con todos los metodos posibles como bloqueo naval" y "el Norte de Corea debe saber que la presion en su contra sera mas fuerte con el paso del tiempo."
					
					Ese encuentro, convocado cuando en la Peninsula Coreana se crea un ambiente pacifico gracias a los esfuerzos protagonicos de la RPDC, deviene una provocacion intolerable que desafia a la aspiracion de todos los coreanos a la paz y la reunificacion y busca la exacerbacion de la situacion regional.
					
					Ahora la sociedad internacional se burla de la nueva payasada de los paises derrotados en la guerra coreana.
					
					En el siglo pasado, murieron tragicamente en la Peninsula Coreana las enormes fuerzas armadas de EE.UU., que se jactaban de ser "invencibles" y "flor y nata", y hasta los mercenarios de paises satelites introducidos por el imperio.
					
					Los antecesores norteamericanos, que se ganaron la mala fama de "generales derrotados" y "de tumba", dejaron en la historia sus confesiones francas de que la guerra coreana fue la mala hecha en el lugar y el tiempo mal escogidos y con el rival mal seleccionado.
					
					En aquel entonces, EE.UU. no pudo poner de rodillas al pueblo coreano que le hizo frente con el fusil. Ahora comete la locura de involucrar a los paises seguidores en su complot contra el rival socialista que emergio bruscamente como nuevo Estado estrategico.
					
					Los paises participantes en la guerra de agresion desatada por EE.UU. contra la RPDC siguen sumandose a los actos de terrorismo internacional de su capo aunque pasaron mas de 60 anos desde entonces, lo cual deviene otro crimen contra la nacion coreana.
					
					El que prefiere el fuego muere quemado en llamas y el arrepentimiento siempre se hace tarde.
					
					En particular, resulta imperdonable la participacion de las autoridades surcoreanas en la reunion internacional contra la parte connacional justamente cuando ambas partes coreanas sostienen las conversaciones para celebrar bien los eventos nacionales.
					
					La realidad demuestra claramente otra vez quien es el opositor a la reconciliacion y unidad del Norte y el Sur de Corea y el destructor de la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Les tocara solo la muerte a los agresores y provocadores que quieren desatar a toda costa la segunda guerra coreana desafiando a la potencia nuclear y militar de talla mundial.
					
					A pesar de que el imperio americano actua con desesperacion para redoblar la presion anti-RPDC movilizando una chusma sin ver correctamente la posicion estrategica de su rival ni la corriente de la epoca actual, no podra reparar su destino condenado al arruinamiento.

articles.title: Japon es culpable de envenenamiento del emperador coreano Kojong
articles.content:
Japon es culpable de envenenamiento del emperador coreano Kojong
Pyongyang, 22 de enero (ACNC) -- A principios del siglo pasado, el imperialismo japones ocupo ilegalmente a Corea, donde cometio muchos crimenes de lesa humanidad.
					Se puede citar como ejemplo el caso de envenenamiento del emperador coreano Kojong, sucedido el 22 de enero de 1919.
					
					Kojong, soberano de la dinastia feudal de Corea de aquel entonces, estuvo disgustado de las acciones agresivas de Japon e intento frenarlas.
					
					Cuando Japon le impuso la firma del "Tratado de 5 Puntos de Ulsa" con el objetivo de obtener el derecho a colonizar a Corea, Kojong no dio autorizacion previa ni lo firmo hasta el final con el sello imperial pese a la amenaza y chantaje de los agresores.
					
					Envio a tres emisarios secretos a la II Conferencia Internacional para la Paz efectuada en junio de 1907 en La Haya de Holanda para que ellos revelaran la ilegalidad y la invalidez del tratado arriba mencionado.
					
					El mismo ano, cuando los imperialistas japoneses le obligaron el "Tratado de 7 Puntos de Jongmi", se nego tambien a dar la autorizacion previa y sellar.
					
					Muy disgustados del emperador coreano, los japoneses le destronaron por la fuerza y le envenenaron por fin.
					
					Luego de asesinar al emperador coreano, los imperialistas japoneses hicieron todo lo posible por encubrir su delito.
					
					La "Segunda Declaracion de Independencia", elaborada y publicada en 1921 por el "gobierno provisional" en Shanghai de China, y la carta escrita por el rey Uichin, hijo ilegitimo de Kojong, hacen conocer que los japoneses encarcelaron a los necroscopicos que confirmaron el envenenamiento del emperador.
					
					En el diario de un japones, quien en 1919 era funcionario de la Oficina Real de Japon, esta registrado un dato, segun el cual el habia oido que Terauchi, primer "gobernador general japones" de Corea, ordeno envenenar a Kojong que no reconocia el "Tratado de 5 Puntos de Ulsa".
					
					Hoy dia tambien, el pais isla actua siniestramente para justificar o encubrir sus archi-crimenes antieticos cometidos contra el pueblo coreano en el siglo pasado.
					
					Japon debe pedir disculpas por su historia llena de crimenes e indemnizarlos sin falta.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena acto provocativo del Partido de Corea Libre
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena acto provocativo del Partido de Corea Libre
