					!Activemos los contactos, dialogos, cooperacion e intercambio entre los partidos politicos, los estratos y los sectores para hacer mas fuerte el clima favorable a la reunificacion!
					
					!Que todos los coreanos dinamicen la lucha por eliminar los anacronicos aparatos legales e institucionales, que impiden la nueva corriente de reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion, y por frustrar los actos hostiles! 
					
					Este ano, demostraremos a todo el mundo la voluntad de reunificacion independiente al frustrar todos los desafios a la aspiracion a la reunificacion de los coreanos y al celebrar con solemnidad los actos conjuntos nacionales con la participacion de partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades dentro y fuera del pais, con motivo de los dias de publicacion de las declaraciones N-S, el 73o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria y otras oportunidades.
					
					4. !Frustremos las maniobras de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion internas y externas y abramos la nueva fase de reunificacion de la patria, bajo la bandera de la independencia nacional y otra de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales"!
					
					!Que todos los coreanos dentro y fuera del pais subordinen y orienten lo todo a la pannacional causa de reunificacion de la patria asumiendo la posicion de dar preferencia e importancia a la nacion y promover la unidad nacional!
					
					!Mantengamos la firme posicion y punto de vista de resolver todos los problemas pendientes en las relaciones intercoreanas en el principio de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales"!
					
					!Que todos los coreanos estrechen la mano para impulsar juntos la gran marcha de reunificacion independiente por adelantar la construccion de la patria reunificada y prospera!
					
					El llamamiento concluye exhortando a todos que se levanten, convencidos del futuro maravilloso de la nacion, en la sagrada lucha por hacer del presente un ano de gran viraje y eventos especiales a registrarse para siempre en la historia de reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita la XXX Cumbre de la Union Africana
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita la XXX Cumbre de la Union Africana
Pyongyang, 24 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 24 un mensaje de felicitacion a la XXX Cumbre de la Union Africana que se celebrara en Addis Abeba, Etiopia. 
					La misiva expresa la conviccion de que la Cumbre resultara fructifera conforme a la aspiracion de los pueblos de paises regionales. 
					
					Ratificando la invariable posicion del gobierno de la RPDC de ampliar y desarrollar en la nueva etapa mas alta las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con la Union Africana y sus miembros, desea que la reunion sea una oportunidad significativa para adelantar la integracion y la prosperidad del continente y promover su desarrollo socioeconomico.

articles.title: ACNC comenta el disgusto de Japon por el clima de reconciliacion N-S de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC comenta el disgusto de Japon por el clima de reconciliacion N-S de Corea
Pyongyang, 24 de enero (ACNC) -- Cuando todo el mundo apoya cada vez mas el relajamiento de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, Japon conocido como pais enano en la politica se porta malhumorado al igual que Estados Unidos.
					Desde el comienzo de la coyuntura de reconciliacion entre ambas partes coreanas, el canciller Kono, el director del secretariado del gabinete Suga, el ministro de Defensa Nacional Onodera y otros compinches de Abe dijeron que "no debe ser el dialogo para el dialogo" y "ha de ser invariable la politica existente de obligar al Norte de Corea a cambiar su politica mediante la maxima presion".
					
					Durante su gira europea, el premier Abe mancho la imagen de la RPDC con su disparate de que "el Norte de Corea amenaza a toda Europa".
					
					El comportamiento de las altas autoridades japonesas persigue romper a toda costa la atmosfera de reconciliacion y mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas, preparada por la iniciativa de la RPDC.
					
					Es un vicio del clan de los Samurais sacar provechos de sembrar la discordia y el resentimiento entre los coreanos.
					
					Cada vez que la RPDC tomaba las justas medidas de autodefensa, Japon se rasgaba las vestiduras para utilizarlas como pretexto de su conversion en potencia militar.
					
					Si se mejoran las relaciones intercoreanas y llega el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana, Japon puede perder la justificacion del ejercicio del "derecho a la defensa colectiva" y de la enmienda de su Constitucion. A la larga, sera frustrada su ambicion expansionista a ultramar.
					
					Por esta razon, estropea intencionalmente la coyuntura de dialogo y mejoramiento de relaciones Norte-Sur exponiendo su atributo de opositor a la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Es muy absurdo que Japon haya suplicado la cooperacion en sancionar y presionar a la RPDC haciendo referencia al cambio de la politica de esta.
					
					Ahora es el momento en que Japon cambie su politica sobre la RPDC justipreciando la corriente de la epoca para el bien de si mismo.
					
					El pais isla debe saber que crecera el sentimiento antijapones de la nacion coreana si multiplica su antecedente criminal tratando de echar a perder la fiesta ajena.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia la venta de misiles de EE.UU. a Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia la venta de misiles de EE.UU. a Japon
Pyongyang, 24 de enero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, EE.UU. tomo la decision de vender a Japon los misiles interceptores valorados en mas de 130 millones de US$. Segun ello, se emplazaran en un futuro cercano en Japon 4 plataformas de lanzamiento del misil MK-29 y los misiles SM-3 Block 2A y se le ofrecera la tecnologia correspondiente. 
					En un comentario individual de este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de un eslabon para el establecimiento del sistema antimisiles de alcance global y de peligroso movimiento militar para llevar a la coyuntura conflictiva la situacion regional, y continua:
					
					El sistema global de defensa antimisil, que intenta establecer EE.UU. en la region de Asia-Pacifico, no reviste el caracter "defensivo" sino el ofensivo. 
					
					Ese sistema abarca no solo a Europa y el Medio Oriente sino tambien las vastas regiones desde Alaska hasta Japon, el Sur de Corea, Filipinas y Australia. 
					
					Entonces, los paises regionales se veran obligados a consolidar el disuasivo para la defensa propia.
					
					El hecho demuestra evidentemente que EE.UU. es el autor que perturba la paz y la seguridad de la region y causa la carrera armamentista mundial.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun ridiculiza la gira extranjera de la camarilla de Abe
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun ridiculiza la gira extranjera de la camarilla de Abe
Pyongyang, 24 de enero (ACNC) -- Recientemente, la banda de Abe pronuncio palabras provocativas a la RPDC en sus visitas al extranjero.
					Durante su visita a Europa, el premier japones Abe disparateo que "no puede tolerar nunca las armas nucleares de Corea", "hay que ejercerle la maxima presion usando todos los medios" y "el Norte de Corea constituye la seria amenaza tambien para toda Europa".
					
					El canciller nipon Kono chismeo tambien en los Emiratos Arabes Unidos y Canada que "Corea trata de ganar el tiempo para continuar el desarrollo de arma nuclear y misil" y "no debe distraerse ante la diplomacia de sonrisa de Corea".
					
					Es ridicula la gira extranjera de los enanos politicos japoneses para suplicar la cooperacion en presionar a la RPDC.
					
					Asi ironiza el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado hoy y prosigue:
					
					Cuanto mas la banda de Abe actue mezquinamente, tanto mas se demostraran a la sociedad internacional su ignorancia politica, astucia, vanidad y fanfarronada.
					
					Si sigue acusando a otros, el pais isla puede ser la primera victima de sus consecuencias desastrosas.
					
					La camarilla de Abe debe cambiar la politica sobre la RPDC al ver bien la corriente de la epoca actual.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Pyongyang Pharmaceutical Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Pyongyang Pharmaceutical Factory
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with Ri Sol Ju, gave field guidance to the Pyongyang Pharmaceutical Factory.
					 He went round the rooms dedicated to education in the revolutionary history and to the history of the factory.
					
					 He said that the factory, which was built in June 1946 as the nation's first pharmaceutical industrial base on the personal initiative of President Kim Il Sung, is associated with the warm love of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the people.
					
					 He stressed that its officials and employees should add luster to the undying feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forever by dedicating their passion for creation and devoted efforts to the production of medicines with pride of holding the honorable post for the protection of the lives of the people and the promotion of their health.
					
					 He learned in detail about the production of medicines, going round packing materials workshop, western and Koryo (traditional) medicine workshops and other parts of the factory.
					
					 Stressing the need for the factory to put on a normal basis the production of various medicines for the promotion of the people's health and the medical treatment and prevention of diseases, he urged the relevant sectors to supply in time the raw and other materials and technical means needed for the medicine production.
					
					 Sustained big efforts should be directed to grasping the global trend of pharmaceutical industrial development and introducing the advanced technology in order to study and develop new highly efficacious medicines of good quality and widely use them in the treatment and prevention of diseases, he said.
					
					 The respected Supreme Leader set forth the tasks to remodel the Pyongyang Pharmaceutical Factory on a more modern basis.
					
					 He said it is his plan to turn the factory into a standard one in the country's pharmaceutical industry and renovate on a modern basis all other pharmaceutical factories throughout the country with it as a model. The upgrading of the Pyongyang Pharmaceutical Factory and the Hungnam Pharmaceutical Factory should be pushed forward in a bold way to make this an important occasion in laying a springboard for rapid progress in the pharmaceutical industrial sector, he added, taking measures of warm affection to do so.
					
					 He had a picture taken with the factory's officials and employees.
					
					 Accompanying him were Vice-Chairman Pak Thae Song, Department Director Choe Tong Myong and Vice Department Director Jo Yong Won of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Spokesman for Korea-Asia Association on Deeds of Fanning Tension in Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Spokesman for Korea-Asia Association on Deeds of Fanning Tension in Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea-Asia Association on Thursday gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA over "A Resolution on the Peace of the Korean Peninsula" which was adopted at the 26th meeting of the Asia-Pacific Parliamentary Forum in Vietnam:
					 The 26th meeting of the Asia-Pacific Parliamentary Forum (APPF) held recently in Vietnam adopted the so-called "Resolution on the Peace of the Korean peninsula".
					
					 What cannot be overlooked is the fact that the "resolution" denounced the self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK as a serious provocation against the stability of the Korean Peninsula and the peace of Northeast Asia and the world, while insisting on "the abandonment of nuclear weapons" of the DPRK, a full-fledged nuclear power.
					
					 The "resolution" intentionally ignored the root cause of nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula, created by the United States, and followed the anti-DPRK hostile policy of the U.S. running amuck to oppose the dignified DPRK to the international community.
					
					 An atmosphere for peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and for reconciliation and unity of the whole Korean nation is now created thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's noble love for the nation, strong will for the reunification based on devotion to the country and people and great and courageous determination for safeguarding peace.
					
					 The "resolution", cooked up against this atmosphere by taking advantage of the anti-DPRK hostile policy of the U.S., is no more than an unreasonable and senseless paperwork devoid of elementary political sense and of ability for situation analysis.
					
					 Our country's nuclear forces are capable of thwarting and countering any nuclear threats from the U.S., and they constitute a powerful deterrent that prevents the U.S. from starting an adventurous war.
					
					 The DPRK will resolutely counter any acts of wrecking peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The participants in the meeting should clearly distinguish between the peace breaker on the Korean Peninsula and the peace defender making sincere efforts for peace and security of the region and the world.
					
					 Any countries, if they are truly interested in maintaining the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula, should not be involved in the acts of intentionally instigating the escalation of tension on the Korean Peninsula but think twice before doing something.
					
					 The DPRK will, in the future, too, uphold the banner of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the buildup of nuclear force and make positive efforts to build a just and peaceful new world as a responsible, peace-loving nuclear power.

articles.title: AP Vice-President Here
articles.content:
AP Vice-President Here
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Ian Antony Phillips, vice-president of the Associated Press of the U.S., arrived here Thursday.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception on Thursday to mark the 59th anniversary of the victorious Cuban revolution.
					 Present there on invitation were Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho, Vice Department Director of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea Ryu Myong Son, Vice-Chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries So Ho Won and officials concerned.
					
					 Members of the Cuban embassy were on hand.
					
					 Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo noted in his speech that the Cuban people have dynamically advanced the socialist cause while smashing the U.S. heinous blockade and aggression moves over the past 59 years after they won the victory in the revolution under the guidance of Fidel Castro Ruz.
					
					 He expressed the will to consolidate the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by the preceding leaders and being steadily carried forward by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and Comrade Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 Ri Yong Ho said the victory in the Cuban revolution was a historic event that provided the Cuban people with rosy future and opened a road to build a new society.
					
					 He stressed that the Korean people would as ever stand by the Cuban people in the joint struggle for independence against imperialism and for the victory in the socialist cause, develop the good-neighborly, friendly and cooperative relations with countries advocating independence and strive for genuine international justice.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Construction Site for Establishment of C1 Chemical Industry
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Construction Site for Establishment of C1 Chemical Industry
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, inspected the construction for the establishment of the C1 chemical industry.
					 Going round various parts of the construction site, the premier encouraged the builders who are pushing ahead with the construction project as planned despite the biting cold.
					
					 A consultative meeting was convened on the spot to discuss the measures for scrupulously organizing the construction schedule by different units under the winter conditions and completing the project in a qualitative way at an early date.
					
					 Earlier, the premier inspected the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex and the Sunchon Phosphorous Fertilizer Factory under construction. He stressed the need to drastically increase the power production and push ahead with the construction as scheduled and the necessity for the relevant units to produce and supply equipment in good time.

articles.title: Wonsan-Kalma Coastal Tourist Area to Be Built in DPRK
articles.content:
Wonsan-Kalma Coastal Tourist Area to Be Built in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- A tourist resort is to be built in the Wonsan-Kalma coastal area in Kangwon Province, the DPRK on a large scale. 
					 The Wonsan-Kalma area is good for coastal tourism.
					
					 The Kalma Peninsula in the southern part of Wonsan bay is the connecting bar formed with granite sand.
					
					 The northern part of the peninsula ranging north and south is low hill and its coastline is straight and smooth as a whole.
					
					 It faces the Hodo Peninsula to the north and Sin, Tae and other islets are located between them which serve as seawall of Wonsan Port.
					
					 There are four-kilometer-long famous sandy beach resorts called Myongsasipri and modern Kalma Airport in the peninsula.
					
					 When the tourist area is built, it will satisfy the demand of domestic and foreign tourists and will be the most ideal place to link various tourist destinations to the Wonsan-Mt Kumgang international tourist zone.
					
					 Now, a preparatory work is brisk for completing the construction of the Wonsan-Kalma coastal tourist area, a radical turn in putting the country's tourism on world level.

articles.title: New Turf-green Nutritive Liquid Developed
articles.content:
New Turf-green Nutritive Liquid Developed
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Turf Branch Institute of the DPRK State Academy of Sciences have developed new turf-green nutritive liquid "Songyong-2".
					 They settled such scientific and technological problems as confirming varieties of materials and additives capable of raising green chroma and green-covering rate, and fixing rational method of mixing various materials and its ratio to enhance resistance to water to the maximum.
					
					 According to the application of the nutritive liquid, it helps promptly improve the ornamental value of yellow turf, promote its growth and restoration in summer and maintain the quality of lawn at a high level from late autumn to early spring of the next year.
					
					 The development of new turf-green nutritive liquid offered another scientific and technological guarantee for turning the whole country into greenery and woodland and providing the people with better cultural and emotional living conditions.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Accused of Checking Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Accused of Checking Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Thursday accuses the Japanese reactionaries of behaving mischievously, disclosing their disturbed feelings when a radical turn is being brought to the inter-Korean relations thanks to the measures of the DPRK.
					 The commentary says:
					
					 The Abe group such as Foreign Minister Kono, Chief Cabinet Secretary Suga and Minister of Defence Onodera said that "dialogue should not be for the sake of dialogue" and that "there should be no change in the readymade principle that north Korea should be led to policy change through maximum pressure" in solidarity with the U.S.
					
					 Abe, in particular, begged for intensified sanctions and pressure against the DPRK, claiming that "north Korea threatens Europe as a whole" during his recent visit to some European countries.
					
					 Their remarks are the revelation of their black-hearted intention to check the improvement of the north-south relations at any cost, being displeased with it.
					
					 For the Japanese reactionaries obsessed with wild ambition for reinvasion it is out of question that the climate of reconciliation between the north and the south has been created with so much effort.
					
					 It is their bad habit to draw water to their mill by finding fault with other.
					
					 Japan should properly understand that the more mischievously it behaves to check the improvement of the north-south relations, the more unpardonable sins it would add to its past hideous crimes and to the anti-Japanese sentiment of the Korean people.

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Disturb Peace on Korean Peninsula under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Disturb Peace on Korean Peninsula under Fire
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary cites facts that the U.S. massively deploys its troops on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity.
					 The U.S. real intention is to prevent the detente on the Peninsula and the improvement of the north-south relations at any cost while being displeased with them, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the U.S. deploys its nuclear-powered aircraft carrier strike groups in the waters off the Peninsula after announcing that it would postpone the joint military maneuvers with south Korea till the Winter Olympics.
					
					 The U.S. does not hope to see an advent of a peaceful world as it lives on war and aggression.
					
					 Its ulterior motive is that it can realize its strategy to dominate Asia-Pacific with south Korea as an outpost to invade the DPRK and the continent only when it keeps tension heightened on the Peninsula.
					
					 That is why the U.S. is being displeased with the defusing of detente on the Peninsula and the creation of peaceful atmosphere in Asia-Pacific.
					
					 The U.S. had better awake from a foolish daydream, properly facing up to the strategic position and entity of the DPRK as a world-level military power.
					
					 We are strong enough to snub war hysteria of the U.S. and defend peace on the Peninsula.
					
					 It is the unshakable will of our service personnel and people to resolutely make tough counter-actions against the acts of wrecking peace and security on the Peninsula.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Moves of U.S. and Its Vassal Forces under Fire
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Moves of U.S. and Its Vassal Forces under Fire
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Days ago, the U.S. and its vassal forces held a foreign ministers' meeting of its satellites in Vancouver, Canada. The meeting was chaired by U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson and attended by Japan, UK, France and other countries that participated in the Korean War. It was reported to discuss the issue to intensify sanctions and pressure for "denuclearization of the north". Their farce is an unpardonable crime to drive the situation on the Korean Peninsula into the phase of confrontation and war again, says Minju Joson Thursday in a commentary.
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces try to intensify sanctions and pressure against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, laying the blame for failure of the denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula at the door of the DPRK. This is the shameless provocation against the DPRK like a thief crying "stop thief!"
					
					 Now the U.S. is engaged in international attempt for tightening sanctions and pressure against the DPRK, vociferating about absurd "denuclearization of the north". This is the revelation of the wicked intention to drive the situation of the peninsula to tensions again and aggravate the situation of the region.
					
					 The vassal countries which took part in the aggression war against the DPRK provoked by the U.S. more than 60 years ago are joining the U.S., ringleader of gangsters, in international terrorism. This adds to the crimes against the Korean people.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the south Korean authorities are joining them in the international scheme to do harm to the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The reality clearly shows again who harasses peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Dismissal of Ra Kyong Won of LKP Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Dismissal of Ra Kyong Won of LKP Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- People from all strata in south Korea are reportedly staging a petition campaign to demand dismissal of Ra Kyong Won of the "Liberal Korea Party" from membership of the organizing committee of the Winter Olympics.
					The petition campaign, which started on Jan. 20, was joined by more than 200,000 people as of Jan. 23.
					
					 They posted a petition under the title "Remove Ra Kyong Won from membership of the Phyongchang Olympics organizing committee" on the homepage of the Chongwadae, charging that Ra submitted to the International Olympic Committee a document opposing the formation of inter-Korean unified team.
					
					Yonhap News said in this regard that the petition campaign was joined by 200,000 people in just three days after the north's participation in the Phyongchang Olympics became the focus of attention.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Ukraine
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Ukraine
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Ukraine on Jan. 14.
					 Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely introduce the revolutionary careers and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il through media and organize political and cultural events on the occasion of the anniversaries.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in DR Congo
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in DR Congo
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of DR Congo for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of Shining Star) was formed in Kinshasa on January 15.
					 Boswa Isekombe Sylvere, general secretary of the Workers' Party of DR Congo, and Andre Lohekele Kalonda, national president of the Working Citizens' Association of Democratic Congo, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from Jan. 15 to Feb. 16 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events such as meeting, seminar and book and photo exhibition in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Switzerland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Switzerland
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- A Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Basel on Jan. 14.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee and chief of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee set a celebration period from Jan. 21 to Feb. 17 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded in Various Countries
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Foreign public has become vocal praising respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as he is leading the Korean revolution to victory with matchless grit and pluck and rare wisdom.
					 Russian President Putin, at a recent meeting with media persons, said that Kim Jong Un was an unquestioned competent and perfect statesman.
					
					 Mentioning the developments on Korea in the New Year, he said that he thinks that HE Kim Jong Un won the confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un attained his strategic goal by making the DPRK possess the rocket with a nuclear payload capable of reaching every part of the territory of the enemy country, Putin added.
					
					 Finarai Vijayan, prime minister of Kerala State of India, said that he pays his unreserved tribute to Kim Jong Un of north Korea for strongly standing against the U.S. imperialists, adding that it was setting a more wonderful example in countering the imperialist forces.
					
					 Buchanan, who was a senior aide to former U.S. presidents Nixon, Ford and Reagan, in an article contributed to a newspaper said that last year was the most impressive one for the leader of north Korea, stressing that he is winning the confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 Manuel Arismendi, official representative of the Chilean Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, said that Korea is now greeting the greatest heyday of its development under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, adding that a prophecy of a foreign newspaper that he would be recorded in the 5 000-year history of Korea as another great national hero and patriot is coming true.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno la Fabrica Farmaceutica de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno la Fabrica Farmaceutica de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno con Ri Sol Ju la Fabrica Farmaceutica de Pyongyang.
					El recorrio primero la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial.
					
					Recordo que la fabrica fue fundada en junio de 1946 como primera base farmaceutica del pais por la iniciativa personal del Presidente Kim Il Sung y en ella estan registradas las huellas del calido amor por el pueblo de el y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Instruyo que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica deben glorificar para siempre las indelebles proezas de los lideres antecesores al dedicar toda su creatividad y esfuerzos abnegados a la produccion de medicinas con el orgullo de trabajar en el puesto importante para proteger la vida del pueblo y fomentar su salud.
					
					Se cercioro en detalles del estado de produccion recorriendo el taller de materiales de embalaje, el de medicina quimica, el de medicina tradicional Coryo y otros puntos.
					
					Hay que normalizar aqui la produccion de diferentes medicamentos necesarios al fomento de salud publica, el tratamiento y la prevencion de enfermedades, senalo y apunto que para ese fin, los sectores vinculados deben producir y suministrar a tiempo y sin falta las materias primas, materiales y medios tecnicos necesitados en la produccion.
					
					Para investigar y desarrollar nuevas medicinas de buena calidad y alta eficacia y usarlas ampliamente en el tratamiento y la prevencion, es preciso saber bien la tendencia mundial de desarrollo de la industria farmacologica y seguir prestando profunda atencion a las labores para introducir las tecnologias avanzadas, subrayo.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente presento las tareas para remodelar mejor la fabrica.
					
					Puntualizo que tiene el proyecto de acondicionar esta fabrica como la ejemplar y la estandarizada del sector de farmaceutica y reconstruir modernamente todas las demas a lo largo del pais tomandola como modelo. 
					
					Propuso llevar adelante con osadia la modernizacion de las Fabricas Farmaceuticas de Pyongyang y de Hungnam para que esta obra sea un hito importante para preparar el trampolin de desarrollo vertiginoso de la rama y tomo personalmente las medidas correspondientes.
					
					Al final, se retrato junto con los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta visita el vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, Pak Thae Song, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Choe Tong Myong, y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Vocero de ACA rechaza la "resolucion sobre paz de la Peninsula Coreana"
articles.content:
Vocero de ACA rechaza la "resolucion sobre paz de la Peninsula Coreana"
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por un reportero de la ACNC en relacion con que quedo aprobada la "resolucion sobre la paz de la Peninsula Coreana" en el 26o Foro Parlamentario de Asia y el Pacifico, efectuado recientemente en Vietnam, el vocero de la Asociacion Corea-Asia (ACA) dio el dia 25 la siguiente respuesta:
					Quedo aprobada la llamada "resolucion sobre la paz de la Peninsula Coreana" en el 26o Foro Parlamentario de Asia y el Pacifico, efectuado recientemente en Vietnam.
					
					Lo insoslayable es que el documento exigio la "cancelacion nuclear" de la RPDC, irrefutable potencia nuclear, difamando sus medidas de autodefensa como grave acto provocativo que amenaza la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la paz del Noreste de Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					La "resolucion" es una copia de la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. que hace vista gorda de la causa del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana engendrado por si mismo y trata de oponer la digna RPDC a la sociedad internacional.
					
					Ahora se prepara el ambiente de paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y de reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion gracias al noble amor a la nacion y la patriotica voluntad de reunificacion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y su valiente decision de defender la paz.
					
					En estas circunstancias, la malsana "resolucion", fabricada en adhesion a la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU., no pasa de ser una chismografia carente del elemental sentido politico y de la capacidad de analisis de la situacion.
					
					Las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC pueden frustrar y responder a cualquier amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. y son el poderoso disuasivo que le impide la aventura militar.  
					
					Haremos frente rotundo a los actos que destruyen la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Los participantes en el foro deberan distinguir bien quien es el perturbador principal de la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y quien realiza esfuerzos sinceros por defender la paz y seguridad de la region y el resto del mundo.
					
					Si estan interesados de verdad en la preservacion de la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, deberan actuar con prudencia dejando de sumarse a los actos que incitan adrede la exacerbacion de tension en esa region.
					
					Como responsable potencia nuclear amante de la paz, la RPDC se esforzara mucho en lo adelante tambien por construir un nuevo mundo justo y pacifico levantando mas alto la bandera de la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por el 59o aniversario del triunfo de revolucion cubana
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por el 59o aniversario del triunfo de revolucion cubana
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 59 del Triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana, el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario cubano en Corea, Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, ofrecio el dia 25 un banquete.
					A la recepcion fueron invitados el canciller Ri Yong Ho, el subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ryu Myong Son, el vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, So Ho Won, y los funcionarios interesados.
					
					Y estuvieron presentes los miembros de la embajada cubana.
					
					En su discurso pronunciado en la ocasion, el embajador cubano dijo que el pueblo cubano viene impulsando la causa socialista frustrando el brutal bloqueo y la campana agresiva de EE.UU. durante 59 anos desde que lograra el triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana.
					
					Expreso la voluntad de consolidar y desarrollar las relaciones entre Cuba y Corea, preparadas por los lideres antecesores y continuadas por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y el Companero Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					Ri Yong Ho califico el triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana como acontecimiento historico que preparo el futuro maravilloso al pueblo cubano y abrio el camino de construccion de nueva sociedad.
					
					Subrayo que en lo adelante tambien, el pueblo coreano estara con el pueblo cubano en la lucha conjunta por la independencia antiimperialista y la victoria de la causa socialista y realizara ingentes esfuerzos por desarrollar y ampliar las relaciones de buena vecindad, amistad y cooperacion con los paises, que defienden la independencia, y por hacer valer la verdadera justicia internacional.

articles.title: Llega a Pyongyang el vicepresidente de AP
articles.content:
Llega a Pyongyang el vicepresidente de AP
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- Llego el dia 25 a esta capital el vicepresidente de la agencia noticiera norteamericana AP, Ian Antony Phillips.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre campo de construccion para la fundacion de industria quimica de C1
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre campo de construccion para la fundacion de industria quimica de C1
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y premier del Consejo de Ministros, averiguo en el terreno el estado de construccion de los establecimientos para la fundacion de la industria quimica de C1.
					En su recorrido por varios puntos, estimulo a los constructores que impulsan la obra como lo programado a pesar del frio penetrante.
					
					En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno, se discutieron los remedios para que las unidades de construccion terminen la obra lo mas pronto posible y con calidad al organizar con esmero los quehaceres de edificacion.
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier recorrio el Complejo Termoelectrico de Pukchang y el campo de construccion de la Fabrica de Fertilizante Fosforico de Sunchon donde subrayo la necesidad de aumentar decisivamente la produccion electrica y llevar adelante como lo planeado la construccion de la fabrica y exigir a las unidades vinculadas que produzcan y suministren a tiempo los equipos necesarios.

articles.title: South Side's Advance Team Visits North Side's Area
articles.content:
South Side's Advance Team Visits North Side's Area
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- An advance team of the south side consisting of Ri Ju Thae, department director of the Ministry of Unification, and eleven other persons, visited the north side's area from Tuesday for a two-night and three-day trip, under the agreement of inter-Korean working-level talks held on Jan. 17.
					 The advance team toured the Masikryong Ski Resort, Mt Kumgang area, etc. where a joint training of north-south skiers and a north-south joint cultural event are to be staged with the 23rd Winter Olympics just ahead.

articles.title: Greetings to Indian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Indian President
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Friday sent a message of greeting to Ram Nath Kovind, president of the Republic of India, on the Day of the Republic of India.
					 Kim in the message wished the president good health and bigger success in his work for the country's progress and prosperity, expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would strengthen in interests of their peoples.

articles.title: Indian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Indian Ambassador Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Indian Ambassador to the DPRK Jasminder Kasturia Friday gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club to mark the Day of the Republic.
					 Present there on invitation were DPRK Minister of Public Health Jang Jun Sang, Vice Department Director Ryu Myong Son of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Choe Hui Chol, officials concerned and foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here.
					
					 Indian embassy officials were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Abandon Its Scheme to Prevent Detente on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Abandon Its Scheme to Prevent Detente on Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Choe Song Ho, a researcher of the room for international policy studies at the DPRK Academy of Social Sciences, on Jan. 25 issued a commentary titled "The U.S. should abandon its foolish scheme to prevent detente on the Korean Peninsula".
					 The commentary condemns the U.S., which once cried out for a peaceful solution to the Korean Peninsula issue, for making every possible effort to stop the present affirmative development of the inter-Korean relations based on concerted efforts.
					
					 Typical of such attempts is what the U.S did at the "foreign ministers' meeting on the security and stability on the Korean Peninsula" held in Vancouver of Canada, it says, and goes on:
					
					 The meeting was, in fact, for confab on a new war, not on the stability of the peninsula. It was attended by 20 countries and regions, including those which participated in the Korean War against the DPRK in the 1950s. At the meeting, the U.S. wooed them to ratchet up the sanctions and pressure on the DPRK with threatening words and cried out for a military option again.
					
					 U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson, in particular, fanned the confrontation with the DPRK by claiming that the efficiency of the U.S.-led maximum pressure strategy, such as sea blockade, should be raised and all the nations should pool their efforts to make the north pay more dearly. U.S. Secretary of Defense Mattis, who appeared before the audience in neckties, made such violent remarks like the boss of gangsters that the scenario for war with north Korea has been ready and unless the meeting goes well, defense ministers' meeting will be held next, which stunned the audience.
					
					 Heavyweights of the U.S. political circle and administration made no scruple of hurling a stream of provocative remarks that it is high time the U.S. took the initiative by putting the DPRK on the defensive, it is necessary to stop the present trend in which the U.S. overturned with the DPRK's appeasement policy, and the Trump administration is very seriously examining the military option against the DPRK.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the U.S. is further aggravating the tension by deliberately revealing that the extremely dangerous military action targeting the Korean Peninsula is not hot air.
					
					 It has been recently disclosed that an electronic warfare plane and a formation of special operation planes were secretly deployed in south Korea for ultra-precision surveillance on the DPRK. Those planes were said to have proved their combat effectiveness in theatres of wars such as former Yugoslavia, Libya, Iraq and Afghanistan.
					
					 Such ill-boding movements of the U.S., timed to coincide with the creation of a new climate for the detente and peace, go to prove that what the U.S. wants awake or asleep is not peace and stability on the peninsula but instability and the exacerbation of military tension and start of war for aggression on the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have earnestly and repeatedly requested their American master to help them successfully hold the Winter Olympics they managed to have held in south Korea, but the answer was such disturbing movements and the aggravation of tension. Therefore, they have to know what a foolish thing they have expected.
					
					 The reality requires all Koreans to get awakened lest the U.S. meddle in the Korean Peninsula issue any longer and decisively reject such intervention by their concerted efforts in order to successfully hold the forthcoming great national event and bring about a turning point in the north-south relations development.
					
					 The U.S. is advised to understand that it would be seriously mistaken if it thinks that the situation of the peninsula would change as intended by it and would be controlled by it as it used to do.
					
					 The U.S. should be well aware of the Korean nation's fixed will for independent reunification and its powerful strength for peace, stop the reckless provocative adventures and make a reasonable and rational choice, though belatedly.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Hit for Hindering Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Hit for Hindering Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Thae Chol of the Japan-Korea Interchange Association Friday issued a commentary to condemn the Japanese reactionaries for hindering the inter-Korean dialogue and the warming situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Prime Minister Abe, chief Cabinet secretary, foreign minister, defense minister and other heavyweights of the Japanese political circle reeled off the following vituperations:
					
					 "It would be a significant dialogue only when north Korea conducts concrete act of complete, verifiable and irretrievable nuclear dismantlement." "We hope that it would be a dialogue for conveying a strong message to north Korea." "The existing policy of pressurizing north Korea based on the international cooperation should be invariably pushed forward irrespective of the north-south dialogue." 
					
					 Meanwhile, Japanese media have asserted that "south Korea is at the north's back and call after putting the pressure against the north on the shelf, it should not play in the hands of the north and south Korean people are growing increasingly discontent", in a bid to drive a wedge between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 Japan has no qualification and right to meddle in the affairs of the Korean nation, and no one will lend his or her ear to the allegations, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Nevertheless, Japan openly and secretly tries to lay hurdle in the way of the inter-Korean dialogue and the warming situation on the Korean Peninsula, particularly straining its nerves.
					
					 The reason is that the Abe group thinks that its political fate hinges on the inter-Korean relations and the change of the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Historically, cunning Japan has drawn big benefits from the division of the Korean nation and war. So, it thinks that it will lose biggest ones when the north and south of Korea take each other's hand.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should admit that they are in a poor position. They should stop acting rashly, aware of the consequences to be entailed by their foolish acts.
					
					 If Japan runs amuck defying our warning, the Korean people will surely force Japan to pay a very high price for its crimes with their strong fists.

articles.title: 33rd Sci-Tech Festival of DPRK State Academy of Sciences
articles.content:
33rd Sci-Tech Festival of DPRK State Academy of Sciences
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The 33rd sci-tech festival of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK took place at the academy on Jan. 24-26.
					 Presented to it were hundreds of data on the achievements made by scientists, technicians and teachers and graduate students of the academy and the University of Sciences during their scientific researches and technical innovation movement.
					
					 The festival was held, divided into more than ten panels including basic science, automation, information, bioengineering and physical Nano.

articles.title: Mineral Production Increases in DPRK
articles.content:
Mineral Production Increases in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Mines of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have directed big efforts to expanding production capacity in a drive to implement the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 The Hyesan Youth Mine, Sangnong Mine and Unpha Mine under the Ministry of Mining Industry are channeled efforts into securing more stopes with good prospect to raise the capacity for carrying ores and the rate of actual extraction of ore dressing. 
					
					 They are remodeling vertical elevators and winches and increasing the operating rate of compressors, rock-drills and other equipment to the maximum.
					
					 They developed various stopes at deep parts favorable for production and formed loop lines.
					
					 Along with this, they established the automatic measuring system and newly installed domestic pumps to boost production.
					
					 The Ssangryong Mine is putting spurs to earth-scrapping at an open-cast cutting site to produce phosphate fertilizer and pushing ahead with the work for reconstructing the hauling track and extending new electric-car lines.
					
					 A mine producing glauberite, the Unhung and other mines are focusing efforts on expanding the mineral production capacity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Adding Shine to Tradition of Great Chollima Upswing
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Adding Shine to Tradition of Great Chollima Upswing
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday stresses in an editorial that in order to glorify this year as the one of great victory to be specially recorded in the history of the country, it is necessary for all the people to live and struggle in the spirit and mettle displayed during the great Chollima upswing.
					 The editorial says that the era of Chollima recorded in the history of victory and glory of Juche Korea shines as the one of making miracles and achieving feats in which the revolutionary upswing started.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The spirit of devotedly implementing the Party's policies, spirit of self-reliance and fortitude and popular heroism displayed in the country were the fundamental source of industrializing the DPRK in a short span of time, advancing several centuries.
					
					 The heroic Korean people set a good example showing with what fighting spirit, trait and mettle someone should build socialism. Herein lies the historic significance of the era of Chollima.
					
					 The tradition of the great Chollima upswing is the weapon of eternal leap forward and advance of Juche Korea.
					
					 The Korean people could register one miraculous victory after another in the annals of building a thriving country in the spirit of Chollima spurred on by the speed campaign and provide a springboard for building a powerful socialist country despite the worst adversity.
					
					 This was possible because they have lived and struggled in the fighting spirit of the great Chollima upswing.
					
					 Only when the tradition of the great Chollima upswing is successfully carried forward and glorified, the present revolutionary general offensive can be turned into the immortal heroic epic and the prosperous and powerful country be built as soon as possible.
					
					 The editorial calls on all to add shine to the tradition of the great Chollima upswing and win fresh victory on all fronts for building a powerful socialist country.

articles.title: S. Korean FM's Anti-DPRK Remarks Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean FM's Anti-DPRK Remarks Assailed
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- South Korean Foreign Minister Kang Kyong Hwa, at the recent U.S. organized meeting of foreign ministers of its allied forces in Canada to tighten the siege to the DPRK, pledged to "explore a way for dialogue for denuclearization of the north" while saying priority is the "solution of the nuclear issue".
					 In her telephone talk with the U.S. state secretary earlier, she called for the "simultaneous promotion of the solution of the north's nuclear issue".
					
					 Minju Joson Friday in a commentary says this is an unpardonable shame to the nation.
					
					 What matters is that her remarks are not merely an expression of her individual opinion but the unchanged stand of the south Korean authorities not yet away from the concept of confrontation with the fellow countrymen, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The act of peddling the internal issue of the nation abroad will bring nothing.
					
					 Instead, that will offer outsiders seeking extreme escalation of tension on the Korean Peninsula a pretext to meddle in the internal issue of the nation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should ponder over the undesirable results their improper attitude may bring, and approach the nation's issue with their senses, though belatedly.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Completely Stop Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Completely Stop Joint Military Exercises
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The permanent representative of the DPRK to the UN Office and international organizations in Geneva, at the first session of the Geneva Disarmament Conference that opened on Jan. 23, clarified the following principled stand as regards military moves going against the atmosphere for detente on the Korean Peninsula:
					 A dramatic change is taking place in the situation of the Korean Peninsula thanks to the initiatives and sincere efforts of the DPRK government in the New Year.
					
					 But the U.S. is massively introducing nuclear strategic assets in and around the Korean Peninsula, going against this trend.
					
					 This is a dangerous act to chill the hard-won atmosphere for the improved north-south ties and push the situation back to the extreme phase of confrontation.
					
					 The U.S.-led reckless joint military exercises staged every year targeting the preemptive attack on the DPRK are a root cause of the escalating tension on the peninsula.
					
					 If the U.S. truly wishes for the improvement of the north-south ties and has a willingness to provide a peaceful environment on the peninsula, it should completely halt the joint military exercises, not just postponing them, and completely stop all nuclear war drills aimed at a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 As a responsible, peace-loving nuclear power, the DPRK will never use nuclear weapons nor pose any nuclear threat as long as the aggression hostile forces do not encroach upon the sovereignty and interests of the country, but will resolutely counter any act of harassing peace and security on the peninsula.

articles.title: Acts of Blocking National Concord Flailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Acts of Blocking National Concord Flailed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the South Kyongsang Provincial Committee of the People's Party of south Korea held a press conference at the provincial office on January 18 to denounce the U.S. and the "Liberal Korea Party" for blocking the national concord and realization of peace on the Korean Peninsula, according to the south Korean internet newspaper OhmyNews.
					 He charged that Trump has shown the double-dealing tactics of hailing the inter-Korean dialogue while freezing national division in a bid to maintain the U.S. domination over south Korea.
					
					 He condemned the LKP for opposing the formation of a unified team between the south and the north of Korea to participate in the Winter Olympiad and thus blocking national concord and peace of the peninsula.
					
					 He urged the U.S. to stop the military threat to the DPRK and come out for dialogue to conclude a peace accord with it.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Hit Japan for Denying Past Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Hit Japan for Denying Past Crimes
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps and the Justice Preserving Foundation for Settling the Issue of Sexual Slavery of the Imperial Japanese Army in south Korea on Thursday made public a joint statement to denounce Japan for denying its past war crimes.
					 The statement charged that the Japanese government has persistently denied the crime-woven war history in disregard of the victims of the sexual slavery.
					
					 Not content with this, Abe is going to visit south Korea to force the authorities to implement the "agreement" on the sexual slavery issue, the statement noted.
					
					 The statement urged the south Korean "government" to immediately dissolve the "foundation for reconciliation and recovery" and return a billion yen to Japan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Russia
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK on Jan. 15.
					 Lebedev, chief of the Group, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 It set a celebration period from Jan. 15 and Feb. 16 and decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il and organize political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Hungary
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Hungary
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- A Hungarian preparatory committee for celebrating leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Budapest on Jan. 15.
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee fixed a celebration period from Jan. 15 and Feb. 18 and decided to give wide publicity to the feats of Kim Jong Il and the struggle of the Korean people pushing ahead with the building of a powerful socialist country under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and hold colorful political and cultural events such as a lecture and film show in the period.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- A Bangladeshi preparatory committee for celebrating leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed on Jan. 16.
					 MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events such as seminar praising Kim Jong Il's feats for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a reply message from Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba, on January 22.
					 In the message Raul Castro Ruz, on behalf of the Communist Party of Cuba and the government and people of Cuba, expressed thanks to Kim Jong Un for having sent warm congratulations on the 59th anniversary of the victorious Cuban revolution.
					
					 He affirmed the will to steadily strengthen the friendly and cooperative relations and solidarity between the parties, governments and peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Backed by Beninese Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Backed by Beninese Figure
Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, issued a statement on Jan. 12 in support of the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The statement said that Kim Jong Un wisely led the struggle of the Korean people to implement the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and thus put the DPRK on the position of the world's most powerful country.
					
					 It expressed full support for the proposals for national reunification and the foreign policy stand of the DPRK to develop good-neighborly and friendly relations with all the countries that are friendly to it and strive to build a just and peaceful new world, which were advanced by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address,.
					
					 The statement sincerely hoped that the Korean people would make brilliant successes in building a thriving country under leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Grupo sureno de avanzada visita la zona del Norte
articles.content:
Grupo sureno de avanzada visita la zona del Norte
Pyongyang, 26 de enero (ACNC) -- Segun el acuerdo de las conversaciones de trabajo Norte-Sur efectuadas el pasado dia 17, el grupo de avanzada de la parte Sur, compuesto por 12 miembros incluso al director del Ministerio de Unificacion, Ri Ju Thae, visito la zona de la parte Norte con una agenda de dos noches y tres dias desde el dia 23.
					Ellos recorrieron el Campo de Esqui Masikryong, el monte Kumgang y otros lugares donde se realizaran en visperas de los 23o Juegos Olimpicos Invernales los ejercicios conjuntos de esquiadores de ambas partes coreanas y el acto conjunto cultural Norte-Sur.

articles.title: Thae Chol comenta la intencion de Japon de llevar al fracaso el evento nacional de Corea
articles.content:
Thae Chol comenta la intencion de Japon de llevar al fracaso el evento nacional de Corea
Pyongyang, 26 de enero (ACNC) -- Thae Chol de la Asociacion de Intercambio Corea-Japon condeno en su comentario fechado 26 a los reaccionarios japoneses que obstaculizan el dialogo entre ambas partes coreanas y el alivio de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					El premier Abe, el director del secretariado del gabinete, el canciller, el ministro de Defensa y otros caudillos del circulo politico de Japon pronuncian disparates malhumorados tales como "el dialogo tendra sentido cuando el Norte de Corea emprenda la accion concreta de proceder a la cancelacion nuclear completa, verificable e irreversible", "desean que el dialogo transmita bien al Norte el mensaje de intransigencia" y "hay que mantener invariablemente la existente politica de presion anti-Norte segun la cooperacion internacional independientemente del dialogo Norte-Sur". 
					
					En tanto, los medios de prensa intentan sembrar cizanas entre ambas partes coreanas con las desinformaciones de que "el Sur de Corea se mueve bajo la batuta del Norte dejando atras la presion contra este", "no debe dejarse llevar por el Norte" y "es grande el descontento de la poblacion surcoreana". 
					
					Japon no tiene la calificacion ni el derecho a cuestionar el asunto de la nacion coreana y por esta razon, nadie le hara caso.
					
					Sin embargo, obstaculiza de una manera u otra el dialogo Norte-Sur y el alivio de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Es que la banda de Abe considera el cambio de las relaciones intercoreanas y la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana como uno de los factores principales que determina su destino politico.
					
					Japon, que ha vivido historicamente beneficiandose mas que nadie de la division y guerra de la nacion coreana, piensa que perdera mucho mas mientras el Norte y Sur de Corea marchen tomandose de las manos.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben reconocer su miserable situacion y actuar con prudencia pensando seriamente en el resultado catastrofico de su actitud frivola e indiscreta.
					
					Si Japon desoye la advertencia de la RPDC, la nacion coreana se librara sin falta del rencor acumulado de siglo en siglo usando el puno de acero preparado hasta ahora.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Ram Nath Kovind
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Ram Nath Kovind
Pyongyang, 26 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, envio el dia 26 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente indio Ram Nath Kovind en ocasion del Dia de la Republica de la India.
					En su mensaje, el remitente expreso la conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran las relaciones tradicionales de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises conforme a los intereses de ambos pueblos y deseo buena salud del destinatario y mayores exitos en su trabajo para el progreso y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Choe Song Ho comenta intento de EE.UU. obstaculizar el proceso de distension
articles.content:
Choe Song Ho comenta intento de EE.UU. obstaculizar el proceso de distension
Pyongyang, 26 de enero (ACNC) -- El investigador de la Oficina de Estudio de la Politica Internacional de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales, Choe Song Ho, publico el dia 25 un comentario intitulado "Estados Unidos debe dejar su absurdo intento de detener el alivio de tension en la Peninsula Coreana".
					Si bien hablaba antes de la solucion pacifica del problema de la Peninsula Coreana, EE.UU. recurre ahora a todos los medios para invertir a toda costa la positiva evolucion de la situacion actual que estan propiciando ambas partes coreanas con las fuerzas unidas, adelanta el comentarista y continua:
					
					Se puede citar por ejemplo la "reunion de cancilleres sobre la seguridad y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana", convocada por EE.UU. en Vancouver, Canada.
					
					Al contrario de su cartel, esa reunion no debatio el problema de estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana sino la nueva guerra.
					
					En la cita en que participaron 20 paises y region, inclusive los participantes en la pasada guerra coreana de la decada de 1950, EE.UU. agito en tono amenazante el recrudecimiento de la campana de sancion y presion anti-RPDC y se refirio de nuevo a la opcion militar.
					
					Sobre todo, el secretario de Estado Tillerson dijo que "hace falta elevar la eficiencia de la estrategia de maxima presion patrocinada por EE.UU., incluso el bloqueo maritimo" y "todos los paises deben unir la fuerza para hacer al Norte de Corea pagar el precio mas caro".
					
					A su vez, el secretario de Defensa Mattis, quien se metio en la reunion de los "caballeros" diplomaticos siendo funcionario militar, chismeo que "esta preparado el plan de guerra contra el Norte de Corea" y "si esta reunion no sale fructifera, convocara la proxima vez la reunion de los ministros de Defensa".
					
					Las figuras de alto rango del circulo politico y de la administracion de EE.UU. sueltan sin vacilacion alguna los disparates provocativos anti-RPDC tales como "ahora es el momento en que EE.UU. tome el control poniendo al Norte en aprieto", "hay que cambiar la actual corriente en que EE.UU. se pone a la zaga debido a la politica de zanahoria del Norte", "la administracion Trump esta examinando en serio la opcion militar contra el Norte".
					
					Lo mas problematico es que EE.UU. pone mas inestable la situacion al demostrar intencionalmente que sus palabras amenazantes no son vacias mediante sus peligrosisimas acciones militares en torno a la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Recientemente, se conocio que EE.UU. ha introducido en secreto en el Sur de Corea el avion de batalla electronica y la escuadrilla de operacion especial, cuyas capacidades de combate real fueron comprobadas en las zonas de guerra agresiva, inclusive ex Yugoslavia Libia, Iraq y Afganistan.
					
					Tales movimientos sospechosos de EE.UU., que coinciden con la formacion de nueva atmosfera para el alivio de tension y la paz en la Peninsula Coreana, comprueban que el imperio americano desea en todo momento la inquietud de la situacion y la exacerbacion de tension militar en la Peninsula Coreana en lugar de la paz y estabilidad y le interesa unicamente la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas han solicitado tanto a su amo gringo que les ayudara para que se efectuen con exito los juegos olimpicos invernales cuya sede la alcanzaron a costa de mucho trabajo.
					
					Ahora cuando reciben la respuesta de EE.UU., es decir, estropear el ambiente favorable y agravar la situacion, ellas deberan reflexionar en serio cuan absurda es la esperanza depositada en su patron.
					
					La realidad muestra claramente que para celebrar con exito el inminente evento y registrar un hito trascendental en el desarrollo de relaciones intercoreanas, toda la nacion coreana debe estar alerta para que EE.UU. no intervenga mas en el problema de la Peninsula Coreana y rechazarlo rotundamente con las fuerzas unidas de los connacionales.
					
					Estaria muy equivocado si EE.UU. piensa que la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana marchara segun su voluntad.
					
					EE.UU. tiene que ver bien la firme voluntad de reunificacion independiente y la poderosa fuerza para la defensa de paz de la nacion coreana.
					
					Debera tomar una opcion sensata y razonable para si mismo dejando sus imprudentes aventuras provocativas.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica el disparate de Kang Kyong Hwa
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica el disparate de Kang Kyong Hwa
Pyongyang, 26 de enero (ACNC) -- En la reunion de las autoridades diplomaticas de los paises seguidores convocada recientemente por EE.UU. en Canada para arreciar la red de cerco para el aplastamiento anti-RPDC, la ministra surcoreana de Relaciones Exteriores, Kang Kyong Hwa, disparateo que es primordial la "solucion del problema nuclear" y "buscara el proyecto para abrir el dialogo de desnuclearizacion"
					En la anterior conversacion telefonica con su homologo estadounidense, ella le hablo mucho del "impulso simultaneo de la solucion del problema nuclear del Norte de Corea".
					
					La conducta vendepatria de Kang es intolerable verguenza nacional.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado hoy y prosigue:
					
					Las palabras de Kang no son su opinion individual sino la posicion invariable de las autoridades surcoreanas que no se liberan todavia de la concepcion de enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					No se puede conseguir nada aunque se plantee en el extranjero el asunto interno de la nacion.
					
					Al contrario, eso dara el pretexto de intervenir en el asunto interno a las fuerzas extranjeras que intentan agravar al extremo la tension de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben proceder a la solucion de asuntos nacionales con la posicion independiente pensando seriamente en las consecuencias negativas de su actitud irrespetuosa.

articles.title: Fixtures of DPRK Football Teams for Int'l Games in 2018
articles.content:
Fixtures of DPRK Football Teams for Int'l Games in 2018
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's men and women football teams will take part in different international games this year.
					 The women footballers proved successful in FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup and FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup in 2016 and the Asian games in 2002, 2006 and 2014.
					
					 What draws attention of football fans is a match between the DPRK team (two wins, two draws and one lose) and Hong Kong team of China (one win, two draws and two loses), both of which belong to Group B for the 2019 AFC Asian Cup qualification, to be held in Pyongyang.
					
					 Following are the main fixtures of international games:
					
					 - Final preliminary for 2019 AFC Asian Cup qualifications (March 27)
					
					 - Men's and women's football events in 18th Asian Games (August-September)
					
					 - 2018 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup (August 5-24)
					
					 - 2018 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup (November 13-December 1)
					
					 - 2018 AFC U-16 Championship (September 20-October 7)
					
					 - 2018 AFC U-19 Championship (October)
					
					 - Second-round preliminaries for the EAFF E-1 Football Championship 2019 (Unfixed)

articles.title: Phosphate Fertilizer Factory under Construction
articles.content:
Phosphate Fertilizer Factory under Construction
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Sunchon Phosphate Fertilizer Factory is under construction in the DPRK.
					 Researchers from the State Academy of Sciences and Kim Chaek University of Technology are in charge of technical preparations and designing for each production process.
					
					 Designing of the process of raw material processing and storage and the conveyor system nears completion, while machine-building factories and enterprises strive to produce custom-built equipment ahead of schedule.

articles.title: Youth League Officials Tour Pochonbo and Rimyongsu Areas
articles.content:
Youth League Officials Tour Pochonbo and Rimyongsu Areas
Samjiyon, February 3 (KCNA) -- The expedition of youth league officials from across the country to leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp toured the areas of Pochonbo and Rimyongsu.
					 The expedition left Hyesan and arrived in Pochonbo on Feb. 1, where they placed floral baskets and bunches of flowers at the statue of President Kim Il Sung and paid tribute to him.
					
					 They went round the command post of the Battle of Pochonbo, the police sub-station, the subcounty office, the post office, etc. and held a meeting.
					
					 They also looked round the Spring Site in Poso-ri and the monument to the teachings on the Tableland of Junghung, associated with Kim Jong Il's feats.
					
					 They reached the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site on Feb. 3.
					
					 They looked round the historic data which Kim Jong Il gave instructions to unearth all of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu and spruce them up so that the sites may contribute to the education in the revolutionary tradition.
					
					 They also visited Chongbong and Konchang bivouacs, where they went round the site at which the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk boiled rice and the site of the headquarters, slogan-bearing trees and other relics.
					
					 During the study tour they had a meeting to express their impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas, a poem-reciting meeting and other colorful political and cultural events.
					
					 The study tour continues.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Back Appeal of DPRK
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Back Appeal of DPRK
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Officials of the organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Jan. 30 made public statements in support of an appeal of the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations to all the Korean nationals at home and abroad.
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, stressed that he would spare no effort to stick to and carry forward the spirit of the joint conference of representatives of political parties and public organizations in north and south Korea and ensure that a joint national event to be attended by all political parties, organizations and personages at home and abroad would be successfully held on such occasions as the anniversaries of north-south declarations and the 73rd anniversary of national liberation this year marking the 70th anniversary of the said joint conference.
					
					 Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, said that the Korean youth and students in Japan would always stand in the van of the struggle to decisively smash the nuclear war exercises and all other obstructive moves of the U.S. and anti-reunification forces and brine about a fresh era of peace and reunification on the Korean Peninsula under the unfurled banner of By Our Nation Itself by further strengthening solidarity and unity with the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 Ryang Ok Chul, vice-chairperson of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, said that the union officials and all other Korean women would fulfill their mission and duty they assumed before the country and the nation, with the strong will to go all out to glorify this year as a year of great change and great event to be noteworthy in the history of national reunification.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Hits out at Abe Regime's Rubbish
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Hits out at Abe Regime's Rubbish
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are recently crying out for dismantling the DPRK's nukes.
					 Claiming that nuclear and missile development of north Korea constitutes an unprecedentedly grave and urgent threat, Prime Minister Abe blustered in his policy speech that he would force north Korea to give up its nuclear and missile program.
					
					 Foreign Minister Kono asserted that Japan would not engage in a dialogue allowing north Korea's possession of nukes although it may help defuse tensions temporarily, calling for constantly putting pressure on north Korea.
					
					 Entering the new year, a string of rubbish about "nuclear threat from north Korea" are heard from the Japan Archipelago. Against this backdrop, high-ranking officials of its regime have gone so impudent and foolish to say that they would make the DPRK abandon its nukes in a perfect, verifiable and irreversible method.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries, who have taken the lead in the sanctions racket to stifle the DPRK to please their American master, always cunningly behaved to seek their interests. However, they have just made a serious mistake in their judgment of the situation around the Korean peninsula.
					
					 As recognized by the world, the DPRK has emerged a new strategic state possessed of not only various type nukes delivery means but also super-powerful thermonuclear weapon along with its accomplishment of the historic great cause of completing the state nuclear force.
					
					 Through a protracted struggle for defending the sovereignty of the country from the U.S. nuclear threat, the DPRK has finally come to have a mighty treasured sword for preserving peace.
					
					 The nuclear force of the DPRK serves as a powerful and creditable war deterrent. This fact can never be changed by any force or by anything.
					
					 Today the international community is asserting that the U.S. will have to co-exist with the DPRK, saying the DPRK is a nuclear power and will consolidate the status.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the island country's regime is still talking about the abandonment of DPRK's nukes and pressure on it, seized with an anachronistic wild dream.
					
					 This is just a last-ditch effort of the regime stunned by the emergence of the DPRK as a new strategic state.
