					  Moreover, it is just a revelation of Japan's sinister intention to put the brakes on easing tensions on the Korean peninsula and scuttle the efforts of the Koreans for their great event.
					
					 The Japanese regime is sadly mistaken if it thinks that its denial can ever change the tremendous national power and strategic status of the DPRK.
					
					 The Abe group had better understand the changed strategic position of the DPRK and make a switchover in its policy toward the DPRK, though belatedly.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservatives Urged to Stop Impudent Remarks against Event of North
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservatives Urged to Stop Impudent Remarks against Event of North
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- Now heard from south Korea are a flurry of improper remarks criticizing an event to be held in the DPRK in celebration of the birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary says:
					
					 Since the middle of January, such puppet conservative media as Yonhap News, Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo and Dong-A Ilbo have made such coarse invectives that the "north is preparing for a large-scale military parade to mark the 70th anniversary of the KPA" and "it is its intention to dramatize the political effect that it completed the nuclear weaponization".
					
					 Reckless remarks are being made by gentries of the conservative opposition parties such as Kim Song Thae, floor leader of the "Liberal Korea Party", Kim Yong Thae, a lawmaker from the same party, Jang Je Won and Jong Thae Ok, spokespersons of the party, Ryu Sung Min, representative of the Parun Party, and Ha Thae Gyong, executive chairman of the same party.
					
					 The puppet conservative group criticize the DPRK's event for celebrating the founding anniversary of the KPA as a "provocation", "show of nuclear weapons" and "part of the war preparations", asserting that the planned event should be canceled at once.
					
					 All the facts clearly show how wicked, narrow-minded and tricky the puppet conservatives engrossed in pro-U.S. flunkeyism and confrontation with fellow countrymen are and that they are a despicable group of traitors.
					
					 What matters is that the south Korean authorities are taking a noncommittal and irresolute attitude, reading minds of the conservatives clinging to heinous confrontational acts to stem the trend of mending the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities continue taking an indecisive stand, allowing the reckless confrontational acts of the anti-reunification conservative forces going against the desire of the nation and trend of the times, it will only bring about the consequences of souring the successful opening of the Winter Olympics and the blame for this will be with them as well as the conservative group.
					
					 The puppet conservative group should immediately stop their impudent and shameless remarks against the event of fellow countrymen, properly facing up the surging resentment of the army and people of the DPRK and the whole nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Calls for Election System Reform
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Calls for Election System Reform
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea reportedly released a commentary on Thursday to criticize the "Liberal Korea Party" for opposing the provision of suffrage to 18-year-old students.
					 The commentary accused the LKP floor leader of his rubbish opposing the students' suffrage.
					
					 It urged political parties to make efforts to reform the election system as demanded by the public.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Criticizes Media's Misinformation
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Criticizes Media's Misinformation
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee of the Students' Progressive Federation of south Korea reportedly held a press conference outside the building of the newspaper Chosun Ilbo on Jan. 31, where they criticized it for reporting false information of the DPRK.
					 Speakers there censured the newspaper for malignantly slandering the north side's step over the participation in the Winter Olympics.
					
					 Recalling Chosun Ilbo's false report that south Korean students in their 20s and 30s are staging a relay demonstration against the north, they accused conservative media of disturbing the repair of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 They urged it to stop such libel and make an apology immediately.

articles.title: Acts of Disturbing Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Flailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Acts of Disturbing Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Flailed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Jaju Sibo, the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on Feb. 1 in denunciation of the U.S. and conservative forces checking the improvement of the north-south relations.
					 At the meeting speakers charged that gentries of the conservative group are making such coarse invectives that they would like to see peace disturbed so as to keep their vested rights through national division.
					
					 They contended that the present chief executive should follow the spirit of By Korean Nation Itself, not lending his ears to mud-slinging by the conservative forces.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to withdraw all its nuclear strategic assets from around the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They called on all the people to struggle against the forces disturbing the inter-Korean relations by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Myanmar
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Myanmar
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A Myanmar preparatory committee for celebrating the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed with due ceremony at the building of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar on Jan. 23.
					 A press release was made public at the inaugural ceremony on significantly celebrating the Day of the Shining Star as a holiday common to humankind.
					
					 It said that the institution of the Day of the Shining Star represented the unanimous wishes of the Korean people and the world progressives for celebrating Kim Jong Il's birthday as a holiday common to humankind, adding:
					
					 The life of HE Kim Jong Il was a noble life of the peerless patriot and outstanding leader who devoted his all to the victory in the cause of human independence.
					
					 The world peace-loving people pay the highest homage to leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The press release said that the preparatory committee with Tha Win, secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, as its chairman decided to hold political and cultural events such as celebration meeting, film show and photo exhibition in the period from Jan. 29 to Feb. 17.
					
					 It also appealed to the world peace-loving people to extend invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people's struggle for building of a powerful socialist country and national reunification.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Kyrgyzstan
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for marking the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Bishkek on Jan. 23.
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party and chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: KPA Birthday to Be Marked in Nigeria
articles.content:
KPA Birthday to Be Marked in Nigeria
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian preparatory committee for marking the 70th birthday of the Korean People's Army (KPA) was formed in Abuja on Jan. 25.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the peerlessly great men's feats for the founding and strengthening of the KPA through media and hold colorful political and cultural events.

articles.title: Belarusian Paper Carries Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
articles.content:
Belarusian Paper Carries Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
Pyongyang, February 3 (KCNA) -- The Jan. issue of the Belarusian newspaper Buperyod carried the detailed gist of the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un with his photo.

articles.title: Esquiadores del Norte y el Sur de Corea realizan ejercicios conjuntos
articles.content:
Esquiadores del Norte y el Sur de Corea realizan ejercicios conjuntos
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ACNC) -- Se realizaron el 31 de enero y el primero de febrero en el Campo de Esqui Masikryong los ejercicios conjuntos de los esquiadores del Norte y el Sur de Corea en visperas de los 23o Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.
					Los esquiadores de ambas partes practicaron en este campo varias tecnicas deportivas.

articles.title: Agenda de principales juegos internacionales de 2018 para equipos de futbol de Corea
articles.content:
Agenda de principales juegos internacionales de 2018 para equipos de futbol de Corea
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ACNC) -- Las selecciones de futbol de ambos sexos de la RPDC participaran en la "defensa" de la Copa Mundial (f) sub-20 y otros juegos internacionales.
					Con anterioridad, las futbolistas coreanas triunfaron en las Copas Mundiales sub-17 y sub-20 de la FIFA 2016 y en los XIV, XV y XVII Juegos Asiaticos que tuvieron lugar en 2002, 2006 y 2014, respectivamente.
					
					Acapara la atencion de los aficionados el partido entre la seleccion coreana y la de Hong Kong de China que pertenecen a la llave B de la ultima etapa de clasificatorias de la Copa Asiatica 2019 de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol (CAF), el cual tendra lugar en Pyongyang.
					
					Entre 5 partidos jugados, el once coreano registro 2 victorias, igual numero de empates y una derrota y el de Hong Kong, una victoria, dos empates e igual numero de derrotas.
					
					El programa de los principales partidos internacionales va como sigue:
					
					- Partido de la ultima etapa de clasificatorias de la Copa Asiatica 2019 de la CAF (27 de marzo)
					
					- Juegos de futbol de ambos sexos de los 18o Juegos Asiaticos (entre agosto y septiembre)
					
					- Copa Mundial (f) sub-20 de la FIFA 2018 (del 5 al 24 de agosto) 
					
					- Copa Mundial (f) sub-17 de la FIFA 2018 (entre el 13 de noviembre y el primero de diciembre)
					
					- Campeonato sub-16 de la CAF 2018 (entre el 20 de septiembre y el 7 de octubre)
					
					- Campeonato sub-19 de la CAF 2018 (octubre)
					
					- Segunda ronda de clasificatorias del Campeonato E-1 de la Federacion de las Asociaciones de Futbol del Este de Asia de 2019 (fecha indefinida).

articles.title: ACNC comenta la intencion irrealizable de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la intencion irrealizable de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ACNC) -- En estos dias, los reaccionarios japoneses hablan mucho de la cancelacion de armas nucleares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En su discurso de la politica gubernamental, el premier Abe cuestiono el programa nuclear y de misiles del Norte de Corea como amenaza mas importante y apremiante que nunca y dijo con fanfarronada que le obligaria a renunciarlo.
					
					Por su parte, el canciller Kono senalo que se debe mantener la presion al Norte de Corea y no sostendra con este el dialogo que tolere su posesion de armas nucleares para relajar momentaneamente la tension.
					
					Mientras se escuchan seguidamente desde el Ano Nuevo en el archipielago japones los disparates sobre la supuesta "amenaza nuclear del Norte", los altos funcionarios prometen atrevidamente "hacerle cancelar el arma nuclear de manera completa, verificable e irreversible".
					
					Juzgan mal ahora la situacion en torno a la Peninsula Coreana los reaccionarios japoneses quienes se pusieron al frente de la campana de sancion y presion anti-RPDC para congraciarse con su amo gringo.
					
					Como reconoce todo el mundo, la RPDC emergio bruscamente como nuevo Estado estrategico que al cumplir la causa historica de completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares, se dispuso de diversos medios de transporte de arma nuclear y hasta del superpotente armamento termonuclear.
					
					La RPDC ha preparado finalmente el poderoso medio de defensa de la paz al cabo de la larga lucha por defender la soberania nacional desde la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Las fuerzas armadas nucleares de nuestro Estado, confiable disuasivo de guerra, no pueden ser canceladas de ninguna manera.
					
					Hoy dia, la sociedad internacional opina que la RPDC es una potencia nuclear y se consolidara su posicion y por eso, EE.UU. debe coexistir con ella.
					
					Sin embargo, los reaccionarios japoneses, cautivados de su ambicion anacronica, reclaman todavia la cancelacion nuclear y la presion contra la RPDC para frenar el proceso de distension de la Peninsula Coreana y llevar al fracaso los eventos de la nacion coreana.
					
					Estarian muy equivocados si ellos piensan que con su negativa pueden desvirtuar el poderio inagotable y la posicion estrategica de la RPDC.
					
					Seria mejor que la banda de Abe cambie su politica sobre la RPDC justipreciando la posicion estrategica de esta.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena la chismografia sobre el evento de la RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena la chismografia sobre el evento de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 3 de febrero (ACNC) -- Se escuchan a menudo en el suelo surcoreano los chismes que cuestionan el acto conmemorativo del dia de fundacion del ejercito de la RPDC.
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun difundio este sabado un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					Desde mediados de enero, los medios conservadores surcoreanos, inclusive Yonhap News, Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo y Tong-A Ilbo, comenzaron a transmitir la chismografia de que el "Norte esta preparando una parada militar de gran dimension en ocasion del septuagesimo aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular" y "este evento parte de la intencion de maximizar los efectos politicos de la conclusion del armamento nuclear".
					
					A la demagogia se suman tambien las figuras de partidos opositores incluyendo el lider en el parlamento Kim Song Thae, el parlamentario Kim Yong Thae, los voceros Jang Je Won y Jong Thae Ok del Partido de Corea Libre y el representante Ryu Sung Min y el presidente ejecutivo Ha Thae Gyong del Partido Parun.
					
					Causan la consternacion sus calumnias sobre los festejos del dia de fundacion del ejercito de la parte connacional tales como "acto provocador", "escenario de propaganda de armas nucleares", "preparativos de guerra" y "hay que cancelarlos ahora mismo".
					
					Todos los hechos revelan que los conservadores surcoreanos, enloquecidos por el servilismo proyanqui y el enfrentamiento fratricida, son desperdicios biologicos y traidores asquerosos.
					
					El problema del caso es la conducta ambigua e indecisa de las autoridades surcoreanas que se mueven acorde al estado de humor de las fuerzas conservadoras que tratan de impedir el mejoramiento de relaciones N-S con sus extremados actos conflictivos.
					
					Si ellas continuan portandose como ahora, se entenebreceran las perspectivas de apertura exitosa de los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.
					
					Cuando suceda eso, tendran que asumir la responsabilidad al igual que los elementos conservadores.
					
					La camarilla conservadora surcoreana debe parar ahora mismo su chismografia sobre el evento de la parte connacional al darse cuenta de que estan muy indignados todos los coreanos, en particular, los militares y habitantes de la RPDC.

articles.title: Trial Run of New-type Trolley Bus Made in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Trial Run of New-type Trolley Bus Made in Presence of Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A trial run of new-type trolley bus was conducted in the presence of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, together with Ri Sol Ju.
					 The Supreme Leader went round the city aboard a trolley bus at midnight despite his busy time, saying that he would feel easy when he personally examines the test of new-type trolley bus with which he acquainted himself during his recent visit to the remodeled Pyongyang Trolley Bus Factory.
					
					 The trolley bus is comfortable and reliable as its damper and speed are good and it has no vibration and noise, he noted, appreciating its technical conditions.
					
					 He feels easy and proud and great as it was made by our workers, he said, adding that he would be very glad and satisfied to see the products of the strength of self-reliance.
					
					 Stressing the need to not only turn out a new thing but also steadily improve it in a technical way and further perfect its production process, he said that he would offer useful technological data and that it is needed to better the technical specifications of trolley bus and mass-produce it so as to normalize the passenger service in the capital city.
					
					 He earnestly called on the sector of the passenger service in the capital to strive to satisfactorily provide traffic convenience for the citizens in the cold winter days in particular, always regarding the popular masses' demand and appreciation as absolute standard and with the revolutionary outlook on the masses strictly based on this and the spirit of devoted service to the people.
					
					 Accompanying him were Vice-Chairman O Su Yong and Vice Department Director Jo Yong Won of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Blasts Trump
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Blasts Trump
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA on February 4, as regards "State of the Union Address" made by Trump. 
					 In the "State of the Union Address", Trump described last year as a year fully recorded with "incredible progress and extraordinary success"- the year during which he pushed the American society and the world into disturbance through his reckless words and deeds as well as aggression moves dumbfounding the world public. This is indeed the height of Trump-style arrogance, arbitrariness and self-conceit.
					
					 The whole world is deeply concerned, seeing as an omen of new disaster the Address of Trump who asserted "America First" and "unmatched power" based on nuclear weapons while forcing other countries to submit themselves to the U.S. chauvinistic interest.  
					
					 Trump also insisted upon the "maximum pressure" against our country, viciously slandering our most superior people-centered social system. However, it is no less than screams of Trump terrified at the power of the DPRK that has achieved the great historic cause of completing the state nuclear force and rapidly emerged as the strategic state recognized by the world, and it is purely a nasty perversity aimed to disturb the advance of inter-Korean relations.     
					
					 Trump even reveals his sinister intention to do something against us by relying on strength while talking about "American resolve". Our self-reliant defense capability with the nuclear force as its backbone will, however, completely deter Trump and his lackeys from showing off on the Korean peninsula.  
					
					 If Trump does not get rid of his anachronistic and dogmatic way of thinking, it will only bring about the consequence of further endangering security and future of the United States.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- D. Tsogtbaatar, minister of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia, and his party and other foreign guests visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 They paid high tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 They paid tribute to the great leaders who lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house the cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Chongryon Headquarters Chairmen Vow to Contribute to National Reunification
articles.content:
Chongryon Headquarters Chairmen Vow to Contribute to National Reunification
Tokyo, February 3 (KNS-KCNA) -- Chairpersons of the Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on Jan. 31 in support of the appeal of the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations.
					 Jo Il Yon, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, said that the Chongryon officials and Koreans in the metropolis would make patriotic efforts to create the climate of national reconciliation and reunification and open a new phase of national reunification under the banner of national independence, By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Kim Sang Il, chairman of the Kyoto Headquarters of Chongryon, vowed to resolutely reject the U.S. reckless nuclear war provocation moves against the DPRK and strengthen the unity of compatriots under the unfurled banner of national independence, By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Ri Ju Hak, chairman of Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, noted that the officials and compatriots would turn out as one in the campaign to frustrate the U.S. war moves against the DPRK and bring about the climate of peace on the Korean Peninsula so as to fulfill their responsibility and role as the driving force of the movement for national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Issue Works on Building Revolutionary Armed Forces
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Issue Works on Building Revolutionary Armed Forces
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il opened a new chapter of building regular armed forces and provided a great programme for building the most elite revolutionary army.
					 The President set forth the policy of building a regular revolutionary army by our own efforts in "On Founding the Party, State and Armed Forces in the Liberated Homeland," a speech delivered by him on August 20, Juche 34 (1945).
					
					 In "On Establishing the Pyongyang Institute" and other works he clarified the importance and significance of building regular armed forces and gives answers to the principled and fundamental problems arising in training military and political cadres and establishing self-supporting national defense industry.
					
					 "On the Occasion of the Founding of the Korean People's Army", the speech delivered by him at the military parade of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on February 8, 1948 is a great programme for building the KPA into the invincible people's armed forces and the revolutionary army with regular appearance.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War, he made public hundreds of works elucidating the tasks and ways of further strengthening the KPA into the matchless revolutionary army which is equipped with the Party's revolutionary idea against imperialism and Juche-based art of war and in which iron-like discipline is established.
					
					 In his conclusion made at the 10th Plenary Meeting of the Fifth Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in February 1975, he advanced a five-point policy to strengthen the People's Army into the cadre army, modern army and a-match-for-a-hundred revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 In a talk to soldiers of the 105th Mechanized Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960, Kim Jong Il put it forward as the main mission and the core of the struggle tradition of the KPA to defend the Party and the leader with lives.
					
					 In his other works, he clarified that to model the entire army on Kimilsungism is the general task for army building, and set forth tasks and ways to prepare all the service personnel to be Kimilsungists.
					
					 When talking to KPA commanding officers after inspecting the Dwarf Pine Company on Jan. 1, 1995, he elucidated the tasks and ways of intensifying the ideological education among the service personnel and making sustained great efforts to bolster up the military power of the People's Army.
					
					 Illuminated in other works is his idea that to firmly defend the socialist country is the most important revolutionary duty of the People's Army.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Disturbing Repair of Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Disturbing Repair of Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is working hard to check the trend of national reconciliation and unity created with much effort on the Korean peninsula.
					 High-ranking officials of the White House, Department of State, Department of Defense, CIA and Congress are spouting rubbish every day.
					
					 They are saying "Olympics should never be a ground for north Korea's social system propaganda", crying out for "tightening sanctions and pressure on north Korea in order not to be deprived of the initiative in handling the issue of the Korean peninsula."
					
					 Against this backdrop, the U.S. announced on Jan. 24 that it would independently impose additional sanctions upon the DPRK. Next day the under secretary of Treasury flied to south Korea to urge it to maintain thoroughgoing cooperation in imposing sanctions "upon the north."
					
					 The U.S. also sponsored meetings with those concerned of south Korean diplomacy and defense one after another, where it stressed the need for them to lead the north-south dialogue to the one for denuclearization.
					
					 It invited high-ranking security officials of Chongwadae and the military of south Korea to the U.S. to discuss the issue of intensifying "military cooperation" against the DPRK.
					
					 It massively brought nuclear aircraft carrier strike groups and nuclear strategic bombers to the Korean peninsula and its vicinity. It is asserting that it is to resume the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills right after the Winter Olympics. It staged a flying corps strike drill targeting the DPRK in league with the Japan Air "Self-Defense Force."
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the U.S. is getting crazy to chill the atmosphere of improving north-south relations created by positive measures and proactive role of the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. truly supports and welcomes the north-south dialogue, there is no need for it to malignantly slander the DPRK's participation in the Winter Olympics on the international arena and to invite the south Korean diplomatic and security officials who are "busy with preparations for the Olympics" to the U.S. one after another to force its ill intention on them.
					
					 It is the sinister design of the U.S. to make the north and the south stand in confrontation eternally and create constant tensions on the Korean peninsula from the calculation that the better peace environment on the peninsula makes the U.S. lose its justification for igniting a nuclear war against the DPRK and puts the brakes on its drive for carrying out the strategy for dominating Asia.
					
					 The situation shows that smooth development of the north-south relations can never be expected but peace and stability on the Korean peninsula are gravely threatened as long as the U.S. persists in carrying out its sinister purpose and interference.
					
					 All Koreans should heighten their vigilance against the U.S. aggression and interference to bring the disaster of a fratricidal war and a nuclear war to this land, contrary to the trend of the times. They should foil the U.S. moves by dint of the national unity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, the founder-builder of the Korean People's Army (KPA), will be shining forever in the history of the country, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Sunday, and goes on:
					 Feb. 8, Juche 37 (1948) witnessed the KPA foundation - a national historic event of great significance in developing the Korean revolution and carving out the destiny of the Korean people.
					
					 Thanks to the KPA birth, the Korean people realized their cherished desire for modern regular army and put an end to the distress-torn history of the ruined country.
					
					 The KPA is regular revolutionary armed forces that took the first step and established the valuable tradition under the care of the ever-victorious iron-willed brilliant commander.
					
					 The army inflicted a disgraceful serious defeat on the U.S. imperialist aggressors who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world, which brought about the beginning of the decline for them. It has devotedly defended the cause of the leader and the Party with arms and also taken the lead in opening a broad avenue to the building of a thriving country in decades of grim revolution.
					
					 The credit for them rest with the great care.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces, blessed with illustrious leaders and brilliant commanders down through generations, are greeting the greatest heyday in its development.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the KPA, which demonstrates its might as a revolutionary army of the Party advancing straight ahead aiming to the direction only pointed by the Party, an invincible army which can crush any aggressors at one blow and creators of the people's happiness.

articles.title: S. Korean Defense Minister Hit for His Rubbish against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Defense Minister Hit for His Rubbish against DPRK
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- S. Korean Defense Minister Song Yong Mu let out a string of rubbish stoking confrontation with the DPRK at a recent "multi-party security meeting" held in Singapore.
					 He spouted such nonsense that if the DPRK "uses nuclear weapons" against the U.S. and south Korea, it will be "wiped off the face of the earth", adding that it is "anachronistic."
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says:
					
					 What Song uttered is just trickery to dishonor the nuclear deterrent of the DPRK for peace and add to the atmosphere of cooperation for worldwide sanctions and pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 His rubbish is just a reckless act of a pro-American confrontational maniac as it chills the hard-won climate for improving the north-south relations, pursuant to the U.S. hideous moves for a nuclear war.
					
					 There is a saying that one scabbed sheep will mar a whole flock.
					
					 No one can vouch that such reckless act of Song seized with inveterate repugnance and hostility toward the fellow countrymen would not scuttle the efforts for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Traitor Song should bear in mind that all Koreans are sharply watching his behavior. He should not forget even a moment that his impudent and reckless tongue-lashing may bring irreversible consequences.

articles.title: People's Party of S. Korea Criticizes Regime's Deceptive Step
articles.content:
People's Party of S. Korea Criticizes Regime's Deceptive Step
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The People's Party of south Korea held a press conference at the "National Assembly" on Jan. 31 criticizing the regime's deceptive "modification" of minimum wage system, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Speakers there charged that the chairperson of the minimum wage committee who should speak for millions of minimum wage workers is going to retrogressively modify the minimum wage system.
					
					 Noting that 20 percent of the minimum wage workers are women, they said the retrogressive modification is little short of killing them twice.
					
					 They urged the regime to make finance necessary for the minimum wage hike by decreasing the aid fund for the conglomerates in order to realize true minimum wage hike.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Angola
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Angola
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- An Angolan preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Luanda on Jan. 24.
					 The international secretary of the Angolan Women's Organization who is a lawmaker was elected chairperson of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold film show, book and photo exhibition and other colorful political and cultural events from Jan. 24 to April 18.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for marking the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed by the All-Russia Lenin Young Communist League on Jan. 24.
					 Podzorov, first secretary of the league, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from Jan. 24 to Feb. 17 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il in the period.

articles.title: KPA Birthday to Be Marked in Benin
articles.content:
KPA Birthday to Be Marked in Benin
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Beninese national preparatory committee for marking the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA) was formed in Cotonou on Jan. 26.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader", was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events including celebration meeting and film show on the occasion.

articles.title: KPA Poses Fear to U.S. Imperialists: Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
KPA Poses Fear to U.S. Imperialists: Swiss Bodies
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Jan. 27 made public a joint statement ahead of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement praised President Kim Il Sung for founding and developing the KPA, noting:
					
					 The KPA worked a historic miracle by defeating the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces in the Fatherland Liberation War under the leadership of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, an ever-victorious iron-willed brilliant commander and outstanding strategist.
					
					 The KPA forced the U.S. imperialists to kneel down before the Korean people for the first time in the world.
					
					 The KPA has resolutely foiled the U.S. imperialists' moves to start another war under the leadership of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The KPA has turned into invincible revolutionary armed forces with powerful war deterrent and thus made it possible to firmly guarantee the sovereignty and dignity of socialist Korea and peace and security of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The KPA with respected Marshal Kim Jong Un as its supreme commander is the only and one army in the world that poses a real fear to the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Long live the invincible Korean People's Army!
					
					 We pay the highest glory to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and respected Marshal Kim Jong Un!

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia en la prueba de trolebus de nuevo tipo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia en la prueba de trolebus de nuevo tipo
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, junto con su esposa Ri Sol Ju, presencio en la prueba de trolebus de nuevo tipo.
					A la noche avanzada, el Maximo Dirigente tomo el vehiculo para dar vuelta a la ciudad, diciendo que se tranquilizara luego de tomar el trolebus, visto durante su direccion sobre la remodelada Fabrica de Trolebus de Pyongyang, realizada hace unos dias.
					
					En la ocasion evaluo el estado tecnico del vehiculo subrayando que es comodo, son buenos el amortiguador y la velocidad y no hay vibracion ni ruido.
					
					Refirio que el medio de transporte fabricado por nuestros obreros le considera como lo orgulloso y grande y agrego que esta muy contento y satisfecho cuando ve los productos fabricados por propia cuenta.
					
					Senalo la necesidad de mejorar sin cesar y de manera tecnica y perfeccionar y desarrollar ininterrumpidamente la cadena de produccion, sin vanagloriarse de nueva fabricacion, y refirio que enviara los datos tecnicos necesarios para que se libre la campana para renovar las caracteristicas tecnologicas de trolebus y producirlo mucho mas, de manera que hay que normalizar la operacion de transporte de pasajeros de esta capital.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente encomendo reiteradamente que la rama de transporte de pasajeros de la capital debe esforzarse por facilitar la comodidad de transito del pueblo, sobre todo en los dias invernales, al tomar siempre como norma absoluta la demanda y la evaluacion de las masas populares y al tener la concepcion revolucionaria sobre las masas populares y el espiritu de servir al pueblo con entera disposicion.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, O Su Yong y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX critica mensaje de Trump
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX critica mensaje de Trump
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- En relacion con el "mensaje del ano nuevo" publicado por Trump, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 4 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					En su "mensaje del ano nuevo", Trump califico de "ano de progreso increible y exitos excepcionales" el 2017 en que con sus disparates, locuras y actos agresivos, produjo grandes disturbios en toda la sociedad estadounidense y el mundo. Esta evaluacion constituye el climax de la arrogancia, despotismo y egolatria por el estilo de Trump.
					
					Ahora todo el mundo se muestra preocupado considerando como aguero de nuevos desastres el acto verbal de Trump que al abogar por la "doctrina de America es primera" y la "supremacia de fuerza" basada en armas nucleares, impuso a otros paises estar sujetos a los intereses exclusivistas de EE.UU.
					
					En su mensaje, el calumnio tanto el regimen social de nuestro pais, el mas ventajoso centrado en las masas populares, hablando de la "maxima presion". Esta palabra no pasa de ser el alarido del atemorizado ante el poderio de la RPDC que al cumplir la historica causa de completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, emergio bruscamente como Estado estrategico reconocido por el mundo. Igualmente, deja conocer las malas entranas de quien trata de obstaculizar la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur de Corea.
					
					Hablando de la "resolucion al estilo norteamericano", Trump expone su siniestro intento de atacar a nuestro pais por via militar, pero nuestras fuerzas de autodefensa nacional, centradas en las armadas nucleares, disuadiran consecuentemente las acciones insolentes de el y sus lacayos en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Si Trump no deja su modo de pensar anacronico y egocentrico, pondra en el peligro mas serio la seguridad y el futuro de su pais.

articles.title: ACNC rechaza en comentario acciones de EE.UU. en contra de reconciliacion N-S
articles.content:
ACNC rechaza en comentario acciones de EE.UU. en contra de reconciliacion N-S
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- EE.UU. intenta de una manera u otra romper la corriente de reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion coreana, preparada a duras penas en la Peninsula Coreana.
					En estos dias, las altas figuras de la Casa Blanca, el Departamento de Estado, el de Defensa, la CIA y el Congreso de Estados Unidos dicen que "hay que endurecer la sancion y presion al Norte (de Corea) para no perder el control del problema de la Peninsula Coreana" y "no se debe dejar que los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales se conviertan en el escenario de propaganda del regimen norcoreano".
					
					En tales circunstancias, EE.UU. publico el 24 de enero la nueva medida de sancion independiente contra la RPDC y envio el dia siguiente al secretario adjunto de Tesoro al Sur de Corea para instruir a este que mantenga la cooperacion perfecta en "sancionar al Norte". 
					
					Ademas, convoca en el extranjero las reuniones con los funcionarios de diplomacia y defensa del Sur de Corea para amonestarles que el dialogo Norte-Sur de Corea debe orientarse a la desnuclearizacion.
					
					Llamo a EE.UU. a los altos funcionarios de seguridad de Chongwadae y el circulo militar surcoreano para mandarles intensificar la "cooperacion militar" contra la RPDC.
					
					Por otra parte, EE.UU. anuncia el comienzo de los ejercicios militares conjuntos con el Sur de Corea tan pronto como terminaran los Juegos Olimpicos concentrando por otra parte en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno las flotillas de portaaviones nucleares y los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares.
					
					Realizo hasta el entrenamiento de ataque aereo contra la RPDC con las "Fuerzas Aereas de Autodefensa" de Japon.
					
					Esto deviene una prueba evidente de que EE.UU. se muestra cada vez mas desesperado para romper la atmosfera de mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas, preparada por las medidas protagonicas y esfuerzos activos de la RPDC.
					
					Si EE.UU. apoya de verdad las conversaciones intercoreanas, no tendria la razon de criticar tanto a la vista de la sociedad internacional la participacion de la RPDC en los Juegos Olimpicos y llamar uno tras otro a los funcionarios diplomaticos y de seguridad del Sur de Corea quienes estan muy "ocupados por los preparativos de la cita deportiva".
					
					Cada vez que se haga fuerte el clima de paz en la Peninsula Coreana, se perdera la justificacion de provocar la guerra nuclear anti-Norte y se complicara el cumplimiento de la estrategia de tomar la hegemonia en Asia. Por el temor a eso, EE.UU. intenta perpetuar el enfrentamiento entre ambas partes coreanas y mantener siempre en el territorio coreano la tensa situacion.
					
					La realidad demuestra que no se puede esperar el desarrollo sano de las relaciones intercoreanas y se veran gravemente amenazadas la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana mientras persistan el siniestro intento y la intervencion del imperio yanqui.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana debera frustrar con las fuerzas unidas la campana de agresion e intervencion de EE.UU. que intenta imponer al territorio coreano los desastres de confrontacion fratricida y guerra nuclear desafiando a la corriente de la epoca actual.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun refuta chismes de Song Yong Mu
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun refuta chismes de Song Yong Mu
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- En la "conferencia de seguridad multipartita" abierta hace poco en Singapur, el ministro de Defensa surcoreano Song Yong Mu disparateo que el Norte de Corea sera borrado del mapamundi si usa armas nucleares contra EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea y es "anacronico tal proyecto".
					Su acto verbal deviene una artimana para encubrir el caracter pacifista del disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC y hacer mas fuerte en escala internacional la atmosfera de sancion y presion contra ella.
					
					Puntualiza asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual fechado hoy y prosigue:
					
					De esa manera, Song, elemento conflictivo proyanqui, rompe el ambiente de mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas, preparado a duras penas, sumandose a las tentativas de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Hay un refran que dice: "Un frijol echa a perder la olla".
					
					?Quien podria asegurar que la conducta conflictiva de Song, habituado a vetar y hostilizar sin motivos justos a la parte connacional, no va a echar a perder la corriente de mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas?
					
					El traidor Song debe tener presente que toda la nacion esta observando cada movimiento de el. Y no debe olvidar ni un momento que sus acciones imprudentes pueden traer las consecuencias irreparables.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Sunday received a message of greeting from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic.
					 Extending his heartfelt congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the friendly men and officers of the Korean People's Army on the occasion of Feb. 8, its 70th birthday, Bashar Al-Assad in the message wished him bigger success and the Korean people progress and powerfulness.
					
					 The message expressed the belief that the joint efforts by the leadership of the two countries would contribute to strengthening the cooperative relations between the two countries in conformity with the wellbeing and interests of the friendly two peoples.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Mongolian FM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Mongolian FM
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, had a talk with D. Tsogtbaatar, minister of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia, and his party who made a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Greetings to Sri Lankan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Sri Lankan President
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Maithripala Sirisena, president of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka, on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message wished the Sri Lankan president success in his responsible work for the country's socio-political stability and economic development, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations with a long tradition between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Mongolian FM
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Mongolian FM
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a talk with D. Tsogtbaatar, minister of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia, and his party who paid a courtesy call on him on Monday.

articles.title: FM Talks between DPRK and Mongolia Held
articles.content:
FM Talks between DPRK and Mongolia Held
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Talks between DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho and Mongolian Foreign Minister D. Tsogtbaatar were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issue of continuing to develop the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries in several fields and the issues of mutual concern and reached a consensus.
					
					 The DPRK foreign minister stressed the need to continue to develop the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries forged and developed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il with the preceding leaders of Mongolia irrespective of the changing situation.
					
					 The Mongolian foreign minister, saying that this year serves as an important occasion in developing the bilateral relations as it marks the 70th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries, underlined the need to develop on good terms the Mongolia-DPRK relations of friendship with a long history and tradition.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian FM
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian FM
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Mongolian foreign minister who is on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, by D. Tsogtbaatar, minister of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia, on Monday.

articles.title: DPRK High-level Delegation to Visit S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK High-level Delegation to Visit S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A high-level delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea led by Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, will soon visit south Korea to attend the opening ceremony of the 23rd Winter Olympics.

articles.title: DPRK Art Troupe Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK Art Troupe Leaves
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- An art troupe of the DPRK led by Kwon Hyok Bong, department director of the Ministry of Culture, and Hyon Song Wol, head of the Samjiyon Orchestra, left here on Monday to give congratulatory performance for the 23rd Winter Olympics due in south Korea.
					 The art troupe will go to Wonsan by train and then visit south Korea aboard the ship "Mangyongbong-92".

articles.title: State Academic Degrees, Titles Conferred on Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees, Titles Conferred on Intellectuals
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were conferred on intellectuals in the DPRK with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday ahead of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The intellectuals made signal contributions to the economic development of the country and the improvement of the people's standard of living by achieving many successes in the struggle to solve all problems arising in the building of a powerful socialist country by dint of science and technology.
					
					 The title of academician went to Ri Sung Ik, a researcher at Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University, and the title of candidate academician to teachers Ri Myong Il and Ho Tal Yun and researcher Sin Thae Gyong of Kim Il Sung University, Pak Man Song, a researcher at the Farm Machine Institute of the Ministry of Agriculture, and others.
					
					 Professorship was conferred on department heads Won Chol Guk and Ri Tong Yun, teacher Ro Sung Il and section chief Ri Song Ho of Kim Il Sung University, deans of faculties Han Hyon Il and Pak Ki Chang and Director of an institute Paek Un Yong of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Sok Bong, head of a department of Pyongyang University of Architecture, Kim Hye Gwon, vice-rector of Korea University of Physical Education, O Yu Song, section chief of the State Academy of Sciences, Mun Jong Ji, vice-rector of College of Education No. 2 of Phyongbuk University, and Won Ye Yon, a teacher of Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering.
					
					 Doctorate went to Kum Chol Ryong and Ri Hyok Chol, department heads of Kim Il Sung University, Ra Jin Myong, an academic adviser to Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University, Ra Yong Chol and Hyon Pyol I, department heads of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Pyong Uk, a teacher of Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies, and others, associate professorship to 160 persons and master's degree to 1,082 persons.

articles.title: Japan Police's Search of Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon under Fire
articles.content:
Japan Police's Search of Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon under Fire
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A combined investigation headquarters of the Metropolitan Police Office and the Saitama Prefectural Police of Japan conducted a search of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Feb. 1.
					 That day 100-odd armed policemen and police vehicles including three large buses encircled the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters and the combined investigation headquarters carried out an exhaustive search of the headquarters despite the protest of Chongryon officials.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the Japanese authorities are trying to stir up the anti-Chongryon atmosphere, building up public opinion over this case through media.
					
					 Officials of Chongryon and its affiliated organizations and Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters, members of the Korean Youth League and other Korean residents in Japan staged a strong protest outside the office of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters, holding slogan boards and placards reading "We denounce the Japanese police authorities' unwarranted oppression of Chongryon".

articles.title: Appeal of Joint Conference of DPRK Supported by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Appeal of Joint Conference of DPRK Supported by Koreans in China
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on Jan. 30 in support of the appeal to all the Koreans at home and abroad adopted at the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations.
					 The statement said that the officials of the general association and all Koreans in China would devote all their enthusiasm and wisdom to glorifying this year as a year of events to be specially recorded in the national history, in response to the appeal.
					
					 It said that they would hold in high esteem respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as the great lodestar of national reunification and positively support his idea and line of independent reunification with warm patriotism.
					
					 It stressed that they would turn out as one in the struggle for glorifying this year as the year of a great turn and event to be eternally recorded in the history of national reunification.
					
					 Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the general association, spokespersons for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the general association, the Association of Young Koreans in China and the Association of Korean Women in China, issued statements in support of the above-said appeal.

articles.title: Oath-taking Meeting of Youth League Officials
articles.content:
Oath-taking Meeting of Youth League Officials
Samjiyon, February 5 (KCNA) -- Youth league officials from across the country met at leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp Monday on the occasion of his birth anniversary to vow to accelerate the final victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Attending the meeting were officials concerned and the study tour makers of youth league officials from across the country.
					
					 Led by Pak Chol Min, first secretary of the C.C., Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, the participants pledged to remain faithful to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They expressed the resolve to hold in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the eternal sun of Juche and build up the youth league into the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist youth league forever.
					
					 All of them also made a pledge to give full play to the heroic stamina and wisdom of the Korean youth in the struggle for hastening the final victory in the building of a powerful socialist country.
					
					 At the end of the meeting they went round historic mementoes preserved at the birthplace.

articles.title: People Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
articles.content:
People Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A constant stream of people visits the regular armed forces building wing of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on the occasion of the 70th birthday of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The wing deals with the feats President Kim Il Sung performed in strengthening the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the regular revolutionary armed forces KPA and laying a foundation for the self-supporting munitions industry.
					
					 Among the visitors this year alone were service personnel and working people and youth and students of many units including Kim Il Sung University and the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex.
					
					 The visitors went round historic data and mementoes showing that the President set up the Security Officers Training Centre and led the work for building a regular army with modern services, arms and corps.
					
					 They also looked round a photo of Kim Il Sung declaring the birth of regular revolutionary armed forces on the platform of military parade on Feb. 8, 1948 and the mike used by him and the colors raised by the military parade ranks.
					
					 And they went round the submachine guns he awarded anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters and weapons of various kinds produced by the Korean working people for the first time and data showing the strong spirit of the servicepersons.

articles.title: Taedoksan Post
articles.content:
Taedoksan Post
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- It has been 55 years since President Kim Il Sung set forth the slogan "A-Match-for-a-Hundred," when visiting the Taedoksan frontline post together with leader Kim Jong Il on February 6, Juche 52 (1963).
					 That day, the President acquainted himself in detail with the military service of servicepersons at the post and said that a general well-versed in battle has been called a-match-for-a-hundred combatant from olden times.
					
					 He also put forward the task and ways to train them politically, ideologically and in military technique and set forth the slogan "A-Match-for-a-Hundred" to be adhered to by the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 Bearing the intention of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in their mind, servicepersons at the post have prepared themselves to be "A-Match-for-a-Hundred" combatants.
					
					 And the enthusiasm for military and political training started at the Taedoksan post, the native place of the slogan, has prevailed over the whole army to be conducive to strengthening the KPA into an invincible one.
					
					 Now the KPA is demonstrating its might as the invincible revolutionary armed forces fully possessed of actual war capability and equipped with the strongest military muscle in the world under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is successfully giving continuity to the history and tradition of "A-Match-for-a-Hundred" pioneered by the peerlessly great men.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Traits of Korean People Living for Tomorrow
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Traits of Korean People Living for Tomorrow
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Korean people devote themselves to the work for rosy future of the country despite the grim tempest of history, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The revolutionary traits of the Korean people living for tomorrow is manifested in the fact that they are staunchly advancing along the road of socialism. They devotedly work at their revolutionary posts to make everything flawless even in the distant future.
					
					 Now the Korean people vigorously push forward the all-out revolutionary offensive to achieve a fresh victory on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 They have turned out in the charge for increased production and creation, with the single mind to devote themselves to the future.
					
					 The hostile forces are now getting evermore vicious in their challenges, but nothing can block the advance of the revolutionary people possessed of the noble view of life to live for tomorrow.
					
					 All our party members, servicepersons and working people will make uninterrupted innovations and progress to build as early as possible a socialist fairyland, the best powerful and prosperous country where the people enjoy a happy life to the full with nothing to envy in the world.

articles.title: U.S. Blasted for Marring Atmosphere of Improved Inter-Korean Ties
articles.content:
U.S. Blasted for Marring Atmosphere of Improved Inter-Korean Ties
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has recently tried hard to drive the situation on the Korean Peninsula into confrontation again by marring the atmosphere for detente and improvement of the inter-Korean relations created thanks to the patriotic and proactive efforts of the DPRK.
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Monday says it shows that the U.S., upset by the hard-won climate of national reconciliation and unity and the improvement of the inter-Korean ties on the peninsula, is making desperate efforts to prevent the trend at any cost.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. claims to "back" the inter-Korean dialogue, but it is nothing but an artifice to cover up its sinister intention to persistently coil up the tension on the peninsula.
					
					 Such criminal act is a dangerous scheme to start a war for aggression on the DPRK.
					
					 Watching the Trump group seek to hinder the inter-Korean dialogue and openly aggravate the situation, the Korean nation and the international community clearly see once again through the black-hearted intention of the U.S., harasser of dialogue and peace and nuclear war maniac.
					
					 The reality proves that so long as the U.S. persists in its sinister scheme and anti-reunification interference, it is impossible to expect smooth development of the inter-Korean ties and achieve the peace and stability of the peninsula.

articles.title: Investigation into Sexual Abuses in Prosecution Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Investigation into Sexual Abuses in Prosecution Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea issued a statement on Jan. 31 in demand of an investigation into the sexual abuses in the prosecution.
					 Noting that a woman prosecutor disclosed the situation of sexual abuses in the prosecution, the statement stressed that overall investigation into the Ministry of Justice and the prosecution is necessary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for marking the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on Jan. 24.
					 Its First Secretary Dolgachev was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee set a celebration period from Jan. 25 to Feb. 16 and decided to give wide publicity to the feats of Kim Jong Il through media and hold colorful political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked by Political Parties and Bodies under CPSU
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked by Political Parties and Bodies under CPSU
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A joint preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed by the political parties and bodies under the Communist Party of Soviet Union on Jan. 24.
					 The preparatory committee with Mozgovoy, first secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of Soviet Union and chairman of International Social Federation "for the Union and Union's Communist Party", as its chairman consists of figures of the Communist Party of Kyrgyzstan, the Communist Workers Party of Russia, the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, Communist Party of Azerbaijan, the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, and other parties and organizations.
					
					 It decided to hold political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK Sure to Win in Standoff with U.S.: Benin Bodies
articles.content:
DPRK Sure to Win in Standoff with U.S.: Benin Bodies
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on Jan. 29 made public a joint statement ahead of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement said that President Kim Il Sung set the founding of a regular army as an essential requirement of the building of an independent and sovereign state and founded the KPA, the revolutionary regular armed forces, with his outstanding idea of army building and energetic leadership.
					
					 The accomplishment of the cause of building the regular armed forces enabled the Korean army and people to win in the three-year Fatherland Liberation War and build a powerful socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence, it added.
					
					 The statement noted that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un has further strengthened the KPA into the invincible revolutionary ranks by consolidating its politico-military might in every way.
					
					 Under his guidance the Korean army and people will defend the country's sovereignty and dignity and surely win in the anti-imperialist and anti-U.S. confrontation struggle, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con D. Tsogtbaatar y su comitiva
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con D. Tsogtbaatar y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se reunio el dia 5 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de Mongolia, D. Tsogtbaatar, y su comitiva, quien le hicieron una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Sri Lanka
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio ayer un mensaje de felicitacion a Maithripala Sirisena, presidente de la Republica Democratica Socialista de Sri Lanka, en ocasion del septuagesimo aniversario de la independencia de ese pais asiatico.
					En su misiva, el remitente formulo votos por los exitos en las responsabilidades del destinatario por lograr la estabilidad sociopolitica y el desarrollo economico del pais y expuso su seguridad de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y Sri Lanka de largas tradiciones se intensificaran y se desarrollaran mas de acuerdo con los intereses comunes.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de Mongolia y su comitiva
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de Mongolia y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente de la Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio el dia 5 con D. Tsogtbaatar, ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de Mongolia, y su comitiva, que realizaron una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Delegacion de alto nivel de la RPDC visitara el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Delegacion de alto nivel de la RPDC visitara el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ACNC) -- La delegacion de alto nivel de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, visitara pronto el Sur de Corea para participar en el acto inaugural de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.

articles.title: Parte de Pyongyang el conjunto artistico de la RPDC
articles.content:
Parte de Pyongyang el conjunto artistico de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ACNC) -- El conjunto artistico de la RPDC que dirigen Kwon Hyok Bong, jefe de departamento del Ministro de Cultura, y Hyon Song Wol, jefa de ka Orquesta Samjiyon, partio el dia 5 de esta capital para felicitar los 23o Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.
					El conjunto artistico llegara a Wonsan en el tren y visitara en el barco "Mangyongbon-92" el Sur de Corea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena los actos criminales de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena los actos criminales de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ACNC) -- Estos dias, EE.UU. maniobra siniestramente para romper el ambiente por la distension y la mejora de relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea, creado en la Peninsula Coreana por los esfuerzos activos y patrioticos de la RPDC, y llevar la situacion a la fase conflictiva.
					Esto comprueba que EE.UU. esta aturdido ante el ambiente por la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, preparado a duras penas en la Peninsula Coreana, y se vale de todos los medios para impedirlo.
					
					Asi insiste el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 5 y continua:
					
					EE.UU. expresa el "apoyo" al dialogo Norte-Sur, pero esto no pasa de ser una artimana para encubrir su intencion malsana de seguir agravando la tension de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Tales actos criminales de EE.UU. devienen una aventura peligrosa para encender la mecha de la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC.
					
					Presenciando las maniobras de la banda de Trump para impedir el dialogo Norte-Sur y exacerbar la tension, la nacion coreana y la sociedad internacional se percatan claramente de la faz verdadera de EE.UU. como destructor de dialogo y paz y maniaco de guerra nuclear.
					
					La realidad muestra que no se puede esperar un desarrollo normal de relaciones intercoreanas ni lograr la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana mientras que continuen la intencion malsana y la intervencion de EE.UU. en la reunificacion de Corea.

articles.title: Ministry of People's Armed Forces Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Ministry of People's Armed Forces Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces hosted a reception in honor of the military attaches corps here on Tuesday on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present on invitation were members of the military attaches corps and foreign diplomatic envoys here and a Zimbabwean military delegation led by Moyo Elson, commander of the Air Force of the Zimbabwe National Army, on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					 Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, generals and officers of the KPA were on hand.

articles.title: Answer of Spokesman for Institute for American Studies of DPRK FM
articles.content:
Answer of Spokesman for Institute for American Studies of DPRK FM
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Institute for American Studies, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA on February 06, as regards the U.S. release of so-called "Nuclear Posture Review".
					 Recently, Trump administration released the so-called "Nuclear Posture Review" which has clearly exposed its heinous ambition to blackmail other sovereign states and dominate the world with nuclear weapons by speeding up modernization and diversification of all its nuclear lethal weapons for possible use at any moment. 
					
					 The United States is the only country which developed nuclear weapons first in the world and slaughtered hundreds of thousands of civilians by using them. It is a nuclear criminal state which has huge stockpile of all kinds of nuclear lethal weapons and drives the world into an outbreak of nuclear war.
					
					 It has been the consistent policy of the previous U.S. authorities to realize wild ambition for world domination by relying on absolute nuclear supremacy, and Trump administration is more frantic for its realization, as befits a faithful advocate of the U.S. military monopolies.
					
					 The United States has stated through the Review that it will develop new nuclear weapons including low yield tactical nuclear warhead and carry out preemptive strike against adversaries whether the latters' attack is nuclear or conventional, and thus, the U.S. has made declaration of war against the whole world.
					
					 This clearly shows that Trump is seeking nuclear war.
					
					 Our state completed war deterrent in order to protect our sovereignty and rights to existence and development from the half-a-century-long nuclear threat of the U.S. However, the U.S. recklessly denounces our deterrent as a "threat" to world peace. This is a high manifestation of the thief turning on the master with a club.
					
					 The U.S. is becoming all the more undisguised in its attempt to maintain its sphere of world domination by wantonly violating the international law, clinging to highhandedness and arbitrariness, and wildly brandishing its nuclear club. Today's stern reality proves that we were absolutely right in having bolstered up the nuclear deterrent, braving through all difficulties, upholding the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, and it further hardens our determination to resolutely continue the road we chose.
					
					 As a peace-loving and responsible nuclear power, the DPRK will not use nuclear weapons unless aggressive hostile forces infringe upon our sovereignty and interest and will not threaten any nation or region with nuclear weapons. However, we will strongly counter any acts of destroying peace and security of the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Suppression of Chongryon Blasted
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Suppression of Chongryon Blasted
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots of the DPRK in a statement Tuesday denounced the Japanese reactionaries for getting frantic in their suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The joint investigation headquarters, made up of policemen from the Metropolitan Police Office and Saitama Prefecture of Japan, on Feb. 1 hurled more than 100 armed policemen to search the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon and the house of a Chongryon official and the Future Foundation set up for rendering support for the Korean school.
					
					 Earlier on Jan. 31, the Japan police authorities walked off the former chairman of the Katsushika branch of Chongryon on charges of "violation of the law on secondhand dealers".
					
					 Charging that the banknote of the former Chongryon branch chairman had a record of remitting money to Chongryon organization, they ransacked the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon and the house of a Chongryon official who had nothing to do with the remittance.
					
					 Lurking behind the recent acts hostile toward the DPRK and Chongryon which the Japanese reactionaries committed in broad daylight is a crafty and sordid political attempt peculiar to the island country, the spokesman said, and went on:
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by Japan through its rare act of swindling which it orchestrated with much effort.
					
					 That is to charge Chongryon, a dignified overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK, as an "illegal organization" and "lawless body", heighten atmosphere against the DPRK and Chongryon throughout Japan, escalate the tension on the Korean peninsula with it as an occasion and thus pave the way for realizing Japan's dirty militarist ambition.
					
					 The Japanese authorities' frantic anti-Chongryon and anti-Korean moves will only disclose the despicable and shameless nature of Japan as the tundra of human rights and a political dwarf.
					
					 If the Japanese authorities do not stop at once such vicious and childish suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, they will be made to hold full responsibility for the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by such acts.

articles.title: MOU on Mutual Cooperation Signed between DPRK, Mongolia
articles.content:
MOU on Mutual Cooperation Signed between DPRK, Mongolia
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A memorandum of understanding on mutual cooperation between the State Emergency Disaster Committee of the DPRK and the National Emergency Management Agency of Mongolia was signed at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday.
					 It was endorsed by Kang Il Sop, chairman of the State Emergency Disaster Committee of the DPRK, and T. Badral, chief of the National Emergency Management Agency of Mongolia.

articles.title: Mongolian FM Tours Different Places
articles.content:
Mongolian FM Tours Different Places
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- D. Tsogtbaatar, minister of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia, and his party visited the Natural History Museum.
					 Being briefed on the fact that the museum was built as an educational center and leisure complex, they went round various places including the paleontological hall, animal hall and botanical hall.
					
					 They also toured the Rungna Dolphinarium.

articles.title: Mongolian Foreign Minister Leaves
articles.content:
Mongolian Foreign Minister Leaves
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- D. Tsogtbaatar, minister of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia, and his party left for home Tuesday.

articles.title: Zimbabwean Military Delegation Here
articles.content:
Zimbabwean Military Delegation Here
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A military delegation of the Republic of Zimbabwe led by Moyo Elson, commander of the Air Force of the Zimbabwe National Army, arrived here Tuesday on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Delegation Returns from Sweden
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Delegation Returns from Sweden
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry delegation led by Vice-Minister Han Song Ryol returned home Tuesday after visiting Sweden.

articles.title: Art Squad of C.C., Youth League Gives Performance to Mark KPA Birthday
