articles.content:
Art Squad of C.C., Youth League Gives Performance to Mark KPA Birthday
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Youth League gave a performance  at the Central Youth Hall on Tuesday to celebrate the 70th birthday of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The performance began with chorus "Cantata to Marshal Kim Il Sung" and "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung".
					
					 Its numbers included narration and song "Red Chol Pass".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who founded the KPA and strengthened it into an invincible revolutionary army.
					
					 They also vividly represented the best wishes of the Korean army and people for good health to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is ushering in the greatest heyday of building the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 There were also numbers showing the mettle of the young people to create new legendary tales about the heroic youth in the present grand march of Mallima.
					
					 Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, youth league officials and youth and students enjoyed the performance.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps, Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Visit War Museum
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps, Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Visit War Museum
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps and the economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on Tuesday on the threshold of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The guests went round various halls of the museum, being briefed on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the war victory and the Songun revolution and on the heroic struggle of the Korean army and people who have always won in the confrontation against imperialism and the U.S. under the wise guidance of the peerlessly illustrious commanders.

articles.title: Meeting with DPRK Hero Held
articles.content:
Meeting with DPRK Hero Held
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Youth and students in Pyongyang City met with DPRK Hero Ji Yong Chun, a lecturer of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, at the Central Youth Hall Tuesday on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Ji noted that the Korean revolutionary armed forces have been strengthened into the true army of the leader, party and people under the care of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He said that KPA soldiers have performed heroic feats in the sacred road of defending the country and building socialism.
					
					 The youth and students expressed their determination to display the spirit and mettle of the Korean youth in the ongoing great advance of Mallima for bringing earlier a rosy future of a powerful socialist nation while consolidating the national power of Juche Korea in every way.

articles.title: Korean Film Show Given for Celebrating Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Korean Film Show Given for Celebrating Day of Shining Star
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A Korean film show was given at the Taedongmun Cinema here Tuesday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations and officials of foreign embassies in the DPRK.
					
					 Kim In Bom, vice-minister of Culture and general director of the General Bureau of Film Arts, officials concerned, and creators and artistes in the field of film arts were on hand.
					
					 The participants watched a Korean feature film "The Story of a Blooming Flower" showing the warm sincerity and total dedication of a Japanese gardener who bred Kimjongilia, flower of the sun, for decades.

articles.title: Symposium on Kimjongilia Held
articles.content:
Symposium on Kimjongilia Held
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A national symposium on Kimjongilia was held at the Sci-Tech Complex Tuesday on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the naming of immortal flower Kimjongilia.
					 Present there were Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho, Department Director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Choe Tong Myong, President of the State Academy of Sciences Jang Chol, Chairman of  the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee Kim Chang Do, officials and teachers and researchers in the fields concerned and in the fields of scientific researches.
					
					 Presented to the symposium were papers which dealt with the biological factors of Kimjongilia, and achievements and experience gained in the scientific researches for the cultivation and dissemination of the flower.
					
					 The speakers referred to research data on new compound fertilizer made for the growth of Kimjongilia.
					
					 They noted that they developed vegetable agrochemicals which remove various harmful insects that may occur during the cultivation of the flower and which are safe for both human body and plants.
					
					 Recounted at the seminar are the research achievements made in the course that the flower was brought into full bloom to be bigger and more beautiful while bringing earlier more than one month the duration of growth after acclimatizing seedlings to outdoor cultivation conditions for the successful holding of the Kimjongilia Festival.

articles.title: Martial Spirit of Koguryo
articles.content:
Martial Spirit of Koguryo
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Koguryo is recorded in the history of Korea as a powerful kingdom that existed in the East for a thousand years (B.C. 277-A.D. 668).
					 At that time, the martial spirit had dominated the whole kingdom and played a great role in strengthening its military muscle.
					
					 Koguryo people made horse-riding, archery, running, swordsmanship, ssirum (Korean wrestling), subak (a Korean style of martial art using mainly hands), etc. as part of their daily life from their childhood.
					
					 Their folk amusements and games were also closely associated with martial arts, which can be well evidenced by Samguksagi (Chronicles of the Three Kingdoms) and tomb murals of Koguryo including the mausoleum of Kogukwon (331-371), the 21st king of Koguryo, and Tokhung-ri tomb.
					
					 In the period of Koguryo, anyone was estimated and promoted by his martial art, so that the hunting competition in every spring served as an important occasion to appoint winners as government officials. 
					
					 The martial spirit of Koguryo people had been fully displayed in their struggle to defend the country for a long time.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts U.S. Plan to Resume Military Exercises after Olympics
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts U.S. Plan to Resume Military Exercises after Olympics
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Even before the start of the Winter Olympics, there are increasing concerns at home and abroad about the situation on the Korean Peninsula after the Olympics.
					 The concerns are increasing as the U.S. is touting the resumption of the joint military exercises with south Korea as soon as the Olympics ends.
					
					 Recently a spokesman for the U.S. Defense Department, the director of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff and the U.S. charge d' affaires in south Korea and other men of the Trump group at their official appearances said that they just "adjusted the schedule so that south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises would not overlap with Olympics" and "the exercises will start as soon as the Olympics are over".
					
					 This sinister military act aimed to chill the hard-won atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south ties and reverse the trend of development is an outright challenge to the sincere efforts made by the DPRK to defuse the tension on the Korean peninsula and create a peaceful environment.
					
					 The U.S. plan to postpone the joint military exercises to the period after the Olympics is never a manifestation of generosity.
					
					 This was a measure taken under the strong demand of the south Koreans from all walks of life and the international community, clear evidence that the U.S.-s. Korea joint military exercises are a serious crime harassing peace and security on the Korean peninsula and the region.
					
					 Historically, the phase for detente created on the Korean peninsula with much effort was disrupted more than once due to the U.S. racket for war exercises against the DPRK.
					
					 Commenting on this, a foreign media confirmed that "if south Korea and U.S. hold large-scale joint military exercises after the Phyongchang Olympics, it would without doubt rattle the DPRK again and chill the DPRK-south Korea relations that have shown positive sign."
					
					 Lurking behind the U.S. act of building up the public opinion over the resumption of the joint military exercises even before the opening of the Olympics is its intention to undermine the atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south ties before it gains momentum.
					
					 The situation clearly proves that the U.S. is a harasser of the peace on the Korean peninsula, a chief culprit escalating tensions and a main stumbling block standing in the way of Korea's reunification.
					
					 What matters here are the moves of the south Korean military warmongers chiming in with the U.S. racket for saber-rattling.
					
					 If the U.S. and south Korea resume the large-scale joint military exercises, the situation on the Korean peninsula will again be pushed back to the grim phase of catastrophe and the provokers will have to bear all responsibilities.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean military warmongers will have to ponder over the consequences to be brought about by their nuclear war saber-rattling.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands Trump as Lunatic
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands Trump as Lunatic
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- In the recent "State of the Union Address", old lunatic Trump said that the DPRK is threatening the U.S. mainland by "reckless nuclear and missile pursuit". Not content with slandering the DPRK over "degeneration" and "oppression", he took issue with the non-existent "human rights".
					 This is the intolerable politically-motivated provocation and tyrannical blackmail of the boss of gangsters and hysteric fit of a lunatic against the DPRK, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 No matter how desperately Trump may try to defame the dignified and just system in the DPRK with worst invectives, he can not deodorize nasty smell from his dirty body woven with frauds, sexual abuses and all other crimes nor keep the U.S. from rushing to the final destruction.
					
					 There is a foolish attempt to make pretence for provocation and pave the road for invasion ahead of conducting the military adventure "bloody nose strategy" in the invectives of Trump recalling Bush's reckless remarks of "axis of evil".
					
					 Dolt-like Trump should know that his backbone would be broken, to say nothing of "bloody nose", and the empire of America would go to the hell and the short history of the U.S. would end forever, the moment he destroys even a single blade of grass on this land.
					
					 It is the only way for the U.S. and the world concord and peace to urgently detain Trump, who is putting the U.S. and the world in turmoil, in the isolated hospital of psychopaths.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Make Switchover in Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Make Switchover in Policy toward DPRK
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Former U.S. high-ranking officials and experts in international issues have recently asserted that it is impossible to make the DPRK dismantle the nukes and so it is necessary to recognize it as a nuclear weapons state, according to the website for political affairs "The Hill", CNBC and other U.S. media.
					 U.S. financier Soros at a press conference held on the sidelines of an international conference said that the U.S. is causing conflict with the DPRK while seeking a nuclear war against it, adding that the only way out is to recognize the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state and conclude an agreement to prevent war.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary says that those who took the lead in pursuing the policy toward the DPRK doubt the policy and call for its switchover as the DPRK has access to a powerful and reliable war deterrent, which no force and nothing can reverse, by completing its nuclear forces.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 It is tragedy that the Trump group persists in the outdated hostile policy towards the DPRK at a time when the result of DPRK-U.S. showdown is made clear.
					
					 It shows that the U.S. seeks to find a way out in persisting in the outdated hostile policy toward the DPRK and provoking nuclear war.
					
					 But it is not the way out. If the U.S. persists in the hostile policy toward the DPRK, the former will certainly meet the catastrophic end.
					
					 The DPRK is the only and one country with tremendous capability, extraordinary readiness and indomitable will to react to any war mode of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to make a policy switchover, though belatedly. It should properly understand the strategic position of the DPRK as befits the world's military power and nuclear power and the trend of the times and make a bold decision to drop the hostile policy toward the DPRK. This is a good prescription for the U.S.

articles.title: Abe Blasted for His Sinister Intention of Participating in Winter Olympics
articles.content:
Abe Blasted for His Sinister Intention of Participating in Winter Olympics
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Abe reportedly made up his mind to take part in the opening ceremony of the Winter Olympics. Days ago, Abe said that he would meet the south Korean chief executive to clearly convey his opinion that "the principle of maximum pressure on the north" should not be changed in the least and he is opposed to the humanitarian cooperation as it would send a "wrong message to the north". Meanwhile, he asserted that he would not accept the demand of the south Korean authorities for additional steps related to the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and would strongly demand the removal of the statue of girl sexual slave outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Abe is mulling attending the Winter Olympics in a bid to chill the warming climate of inter-Korean dialogue and turn the theatre of Olympics into the ground of confrontation between compatriots, not content with forcing the south Korean authorities to tighten sanctions and pressure against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in Japan.
					
					 Abe's participation in the Winter Olympics is pursuant to the scenario of the U.S. to bind the south Korean authorities to the chains for tightening "sanctions against the north" and tri-angular cooperation by using Japan.
					
					 What is more intolerable is the fact that Abe tries to make his participation in the Winter Olympics a good opportunity for forcing the south Korean authorities to implement the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should clearly know that their cynical ploy to behave mischievously by interfering in the issue of inter-Korean relations would add to their thrice-cursed crimes committed against the Korean people and touch off bitterer anti-Japanese sentiment.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Push for Resumption of U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Push for Resumption of U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Mackenzie, director of strategic planning and policy department of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff, during his recent official appearance, when asked if there is any plan to suspend south Korea-U.S. combined military drill, answered that "schedule was adjusted" and "it will be resumed immediately".
					 The following day, a spokesman for the U.S. Defense Department and the U.S. charge d' affairs a.i. in south Korea said that the south Korea-U.S. combined military exercises "would start promptly".
					
					 The U.S., in the meantime, has been closeted with the south Korean military warmongers over the resumption of the joint military exercises.
					
					 At the instructions of the master, the south Korean military is trumpeting about "carrying out as usual" the joint military exercises with the U.S.
					
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Tuesday says that the busy moves of the U.S. and the south Korean military warmongers are truly disgusting as they seek the resumption of the war exercises against the north behind the scene although they talk that they "welcome 100 percent" the detente on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 As admitted by the public at home and abroad, the south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises are dangerous saber-rattling aimed at invasion of the north, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The situation clearly proves that the U.S. is a harasser of peace on the Korean peninsula, the chief culprit of the worsening situation and a main stumbling block lying in the way for the reunification of Korea.
					
					 What matters is the bellicose ill-advised bravery of the south Korean military chiming in with the U.S. racket for the resumption of the war exercises.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the situation on the Korean peninsula will be reduced to a grave catastrophic phase again if the large-scale joint military exercises are resumed in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean military warmongers have to hold due responsibility for pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the grim one.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Confrontational Rhetoric of S. Korean Defense Minister
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Confrontational Rhetoric of S. Korean Defense Minister
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- South Korean Defence Minister Song Yong Mu at a multi-party security meeting in Singapore said if the north uses nuclear weapons against south Korea and the U.S., the north regime will be erased off a map and that it is anachronistic for the north to use nuclear weapons for unification.
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Tuesday says that Song Yong Mu is an imbecile enraging the whole nation by reeling off confrontational rhetoric.
					
					 The nuclear weapons of the DPRK are the absolute symbol for safeguarding peace and achieving national prosperity as they defend the sovereignty of the country, the right to existence of the nation and the peace and security on the Korean peninsula and the region, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Had we not had access to the nuclear deterrence for self-defence, the war deterrence, the Korean peninsula would have been erased off a map and would have turned into ruins long ago due to the U.S. reckless nuclear blackmail and threat decade after decade, century after century targeting the extermination of the Korean nation.
					
					 The confrontational remarks uttered by Song are senseless ones of a colonial stooge serving the U.S. and ridiculous rhetoric of a bete noire unaware of where he has to stand.
					
					 Song should control his tongue, if he does not want to face a wretched fate, bearing in mind that sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with the fellow countrymen would bring ruin only.

articles.title: Actions against U.S. Worsening Tension Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions against U.S. Worsening Tension Launched in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Large scale anti-U.S., anti-war actions were launched all at once in Seoul and other parts of south Korea on Feb. 3, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The participants in the action held in Seoul charged that Trump is laying hurdles in the way for settlement of the issue of the Korean nation, and called upon all the citizens to stage a massive struggle against the U.S. and war.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Pusan-Kyonggi Association of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification and other organizations in Pusan region held a rally opposing the deployment of U.S. strategic weapons and demanding the closure of its germ weapons laboratory.
					
					 In Taegu members of organizations and citizens staged a rally and a demo outside the U.S. forces base, holding such slogans as "U.S. troops, go out of south Korea" and "Peace Olympics disturber Trump, shut up".
					
					 Similar actions were also launched in Kwangju and other parts of south Korea.

articles.title: Moves against Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Flailed
articles.content:
Moves against Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Flailed
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The People's Democratic Party of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 3 to denounce the U.S. and the pro-American conservative forces for hindering the improved south-north ties, according to the south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo.
					 The speakers condemned the U.S. for massively shipping nuclear strategic assets in and around the Korean peninsula to turn the region into the crucible of a war and for getting keen on slandering the DPRK over "human rights issue" with the Winter Olympics due in south Korea just around the corner.
					
					 The U.S. is a chief culprit which divided the Korean nation and estranged the south from the north and has committed all sorts of atrocities on this land, they said.
					
					 They recalled the U.S. and the conservatives have hampered the improvement of the south-north relations, urging the present "government" not to blindly follow the U.S. without principle.
					
					 A press release at the conference said that the danger of U.S. nuclear war exercises against the north is daily increasing, disclosing that the "support for south-north dialogue" touted by Trump is a crafty camouflage to cover it up.
					
					 At the end of the press conference, the participants marched up to the "government" building, while chanting slogans.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Guinea
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A Guinean preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Conakry on Jan. 25.
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from Feb. 1 to April 15 and decided to hold diverse political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Congo
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Congo
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A Congolese preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Brazzaville on January 25.
					 Vital Balla, chairman of the Congolese Association for Friendship among Peoples, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from Feb. 1 to 16 and decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and the personality of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as the great man and organize celebration meeting, lecture, film show and other political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked by Nigerian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked by Nigerian Political Party
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria for marking the 76th birth anniversary of HE Generalissimo Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Abuja on Jan. 25.
					 Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il and eye-opening achievements performed by the army and people of the DPRK in the building of a powerful socialist country through media and hold colorful political and cultural events such as round-table talks, book exhibition and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Organ of Ugandan Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Organ of Ugandan Political Party
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The full text of the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was carried by the Jan. 26 issue of Public Lens, the organ of the Uganda National Resistance Movement, with his photo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Bashar al-Assad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Bashar al-Assad
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el dia 4 Bashar al-Assad, Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi consideracion.
					
					En ocasion del 8 de febrero, dia de septuagesimo aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, extiendo la sincera felicitacion a Vd., y por su conducto, a los oficiales y soldados del ejercito de vuestro pais amistoso. Y deseo que Usted logre mayores exitos y el pueblo coreano alcance el progreso y ostente su poderio.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad significativa para manifestar mi conviccion de que los esfuerzos comunes de las Direcciones de nuestros dos paises haran aporte a estrechar las relaciones de cooperacion entre la Republica Arabe de Siria y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea conforme al bienestar y los intereses de los pueblos de los dos paises amistosos.
					
					Le expreso mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Rubricada nota de entendimiento sobre cooperacion mutua RPDC-Mongolia
articles.content:
Rubricada nota de entendimiento sobre cooperacion mutua RPDC-Mongolia
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedo firmado el dia 5 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el memorandum de entendimiento sobre la cooperacion mutua entre el Comite Estatal de Emergencia de Desastres de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Agencia Nacional de Gestion de Emergencia de Mongolia.
					El presidente de la entidad coreana, Kang Il Sop, y el director general de la entidad de Mongolia, T. Badral, suscribieron el documento.

articles.title: MINFAP ofrece banquete por 70o aniversario de fundacion de EPC
articles.content:
MINFAP ofrece banquete por 70o aniversario de fundacion de EPC
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio el dia 6 un banquete para el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea en ocasion del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Fueron invitados al convite los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares y los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises en la RPDC y la delegacion militar de la Republica de Zimbabwe encabezada por el Comandante de las Fuerzas Aereas del Ejercito Nacional de Zimbabwe, Moyo Elson, de visita en la RPDC.
					
					Participaron en la ocasion el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, otros generales y oficiales del EPC.

articles.title: Efectuado encuentro de jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos con Heroe de la Republica
articles.content:
Efectuado encuentro de jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos con Heroe de la Republica
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 70 de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos se reunieron el dia 6 con el Heroe de la Republica, Ji Yong Chun, en la Casa Central de la Juventud.
					El heroe, quien trabaja como conferenciante del Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, relato que las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea se consolidaron como verdadero ejercito del lider, el partido y el pueblo bajo la guia del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Apunto que los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea vinieron demostrando el merito heroico en el camino sagrado para la defensa de la patria y la construccion socialista.
					
					Los jovenes y estudiantes juraron poner de pleno manifiesto el temperamento de la juventud coreana en la actual marcha de Mallima para adelantar el futuro de una potencia socialista fortaleciendo por todos los medios el poderio estatal de la Corea del Juche.

articles.title: Vocero del IAN rechaza el "reporte de revision del estado nuclear" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Vocero del IAN rechaza el "reporte de revision del estado nuclear" de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada en relacion con la reciente publicacion del "Reporte de revision del estado nuclear" por parte de EE.UU. el vocero del Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos (IAN) del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 6 la siguiente respuesta:
					En el recien publicado "Reporte de revision del estado nuclear" la administracion de Trump revelo mas abiertamente su ambicion atroz de modernizar y diversificar mas para utilizar en cualquier momento los equipos nucleares de distintos generos para asi amenazar con las armas nucleares a otros paises soberanos y dominar el mundo.
					
					EE.UU. es el Estado criminal nuclear que fue primero en el desarrollo de las armas nucleares en el mundo, es el unico pais que asesino con estos artefactos a cientos de miles de los civiles y mantiene muchos equipos nucleares llevando asi el mundo a la guerra nuclear.
					
					Los gobernantes precedentes de EE.UU. persiguieron invariablemente la politica de tomar la hegemonia mundial basandose en la absoluta supremacia nuclear. Y la administracion de Trump se esfuerza mas locamente por su realizacion siendo portavoz fiel a los consorcios belicos norteamericanos.
					
					En su "Reporte de revision del estado nuclear" EE.UU. aclaro que desarrollara las armas nucleares de nuevo tipo incluyendo la ojiva nuclear tactica con bajo poder explosivo y dara el ataque preventivo nuclear sin distincion de que los adversarios usaran o no los artefactos nucleares, de manera que hizo la declaracion de guerra nuclear hacia todo el mundo.
					
					Este hecho demuestra claramente que Trump mendiga la guerra nuclear.
					
					Deviene la extremidad de los actos descarados el hecho de que la banda de Trump cuestiona arbitrariamente como "amenaza" a la paz mundial el disuasivo de guerra de la RPDC que fue perfeccionado para defender la soberania, los derechos a vivir y desarrollar del pais y la nacion desde la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. que se sigue durante mas de medio siglo. 
					
					La realidad de hoy en que EE.UU. hace abierto su intento de mantener con las armas nucleares la hegemonia mundial violando cruelmente la ley internacional mediante la arbitrariedad y el despotismo, demuestra claramente la justicia de la RPDC que ha venido consolidando el disuasivo nuclear superando todas las dificultades en acato a la linea de desarrollo paralelo y nos hace mas firme nuestra conviccion de seguir con pasos firmes en el futuro tambien el camino optado por nosotros.
					
					La RPDC, consciente de su responsabilidad como potencia nuclear amante de la paz, no usara las armas nucleares ni amenazara con este armamento a cualquier pais y region mientras que las fuerzas agresivas hostiles no violen la soberania y los intereses de si misma. Pero, dara una respuesta categorica a los actos que perturban la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: CCACU condena represion anti-Chongryon de los reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
CCACU condena represion anti-Chongryon de los reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- En relacion con que los reaccionarios japoneses reprimen con mas furia a la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon), el portavoz del Comite Coreano de Ayuda a Compatriotas en Ultramar hizo publica el dia 6 una declaracion que sigue:
					El primero de febrero, la Direccion de Pesquisa Policiaca Conjunta, formada por los policias de la Prefectura de Policia de Japon y del Departamento de Saitama, registro por la fuerza la Direccion de la Chongryon en la metropoli de Tokio, la casa de un funcionario de la misma entidad y la "Fundacion del Futuro" organizada para ayudar a las escuelas coreanas movilizando mas de cien policias armados.
					
					Con anterioridad, las autoridades policiacas japonesas arrestaron el 31 de enero al ex presidente de la sucursal de Katsushika de la Chongryon bajo el pretexto de la violacion de la "ley de comercio de objetos usados".
					
					Bajo el absurdo pretexto de que en la libreta de cuentas de el hay el registro de remesas a la Chongryon, ellas cometieron el registro forzado sobre dichos inmuebles que no tienen nada que ver.
					
					Detras del nuevo caso de hostilidad anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon reportado a plena luz del dia, hay la siniestra y taimada intencion politica de los reaccionarios del pais isla. 
					
					Al estigmatizar como "organizacion ilegal" la Chongryon, prestigiosa organizacion de ciudadanos de la RPDC en ultramar, pretenden fomentar a lo largo del territorio japones la atmosfera anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon y agravar asi la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, lo cual les serviria de base para realizar su sucia ambicion militarista.
					
					Cuanto mas fobia tengan las autoridades japonesas a la Chongryon y a los coreanos, tanto mas se revelara a la vista del mundo la sucia y descarada naturaleza de Japon, tierra privada de derechos humanos y enano en lo politico.
					
					Si ellas no paran de inmediato su pueril campana de represion, asumiran la responsabilidad total de las consecuencias catastroficas.

articles.title: ACNC denuncia tentativas de EE.UU. de reanudar entrenamiento militar conjunto
articles.content:
ACNC denuncia tentativas de EE.UU. de reanudar entrenamiento militar conjunto
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- Ya desde ahora cuando todavia no se iniciaron los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales, crecen dentro y fuera del pais las preocupaciones sobre la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana que se creara despues de terminada esa cita deportiva.
					En particular, debido al anuncio de EE.UU. de que inmediatamente despues de conclusion de la Olimpiada se reanudara el entrenamiento militar junto con el Sur de Corea.
					
					En estos dias, el portavoz del Departamento de Defensa de EE.UU., el director de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor de EE.UU., el encargado de negocios a. i norteamericano en el Sur de Corea y otros compinches de Trump se reunieron a porfia con los medios de prensa, ocasiones en las cuales disparatearon que "se ha ajustado solamente el programa del simulacro para que este no coincida con la olimpiada" y que "una vez terminados los juegos comenzara de inmediato el entrenamiento".
					
					El hecho constituye una imprudencia militar para impedir el ambiente de la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas preparado a duras penas y la tendencia de su desarrollo y deviene un desafio frontal a nuestros esfuerzos sinceros por aliviar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y preparar el ambiente pacifico.
					
					La postergacion del entrenamiento por parte de EE.UU. no es una caridad ofrecida a alguien, sino una medida tomada por la fuerte exigencia de diversos estratos surcoreanos y la sociedad internacional, lo que testimonia que los ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU-Sudcorea constituyen irrefutable crimen contra la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region. 
					
					Historicamente, debido a los ejercicios militares de EE.UU. quedo frustrada en varias ocasiones la fase de alivio de tension creada dificilmente en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Al respecto, una fuente extranjera habia afirmado que "una vez librada por Sudcorea y EE.UU. el simulacro militar conjunto de gran envergadura despues de los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales, eso volvera a ofender a la RPDC y frenara indudablemente el desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas que muestran el indicio positivo". 
					
					Destruir el ambiente de la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas mas temprano que tome auge, he aqui la intencion malsana de EE.UU que hace circular la opinion sobre el reinicio del simulacro desde antes de inicio de la Olimpiada. 
					
					La realidad demuestra una vez mas que el pais norteamericano es el perturbador de la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, el autor del empeoramiento de la situacion y el obstaculo principal de la reunificacion de Corea.
					
					Lo problematico es que los belicistas militares surcoreanos marchan a contrapelo de la corriente sumandose a la campana belica de su patron norteamericano.
					
					Si EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea reanudan el entrenamiento militar, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se vera obligada a hallar otra vez en la fase catastrofica y su responsabilidad recaera totalmente sobre los provocadores.
					
					Los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia al meditar bien las consecuencias del aventurero juego con fuego.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta "mensaje de ano nuevo" de Trump
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta "mensaje de ano nuevo" de Trump
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- En su reciente "mensaje del ano nuevo", el viejo loco Trump senalo que la RPDC amenaza el territorio principal estadounidense "persiguiendo imprudentemente el desarrollo de misil nuclear". E insatisfecho de la ofensiva verbal contra el pais socialista con las palabras como "corrupcion" y "opresion", cuestiono el inexistente problema de "DDHH".
					Esto deviene una intolerable provocacion politica contra la RPDC, una amenaza brutal del caudillo gangsteril y una locura histerica del demente carente de la funcion de pensamiento normal.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes y prosigue:
					
					Por mas que maldiga para manchar la imagen de nuestro regimen prestigioso y justo, Trump no podra encubrir jamas sus crimenes personales ni salvar el destino de su pais decadente.
					
					En la denigracion de Trump que hace recordar las locuras de "eje de mal" lanzadas por Bush esta ocultada su intencion absurda de preparar el pretexto de la provocacion y allanar el pavimento para la invasion antes de desarrollar la aventura militar llamada "estrategia de hemorragia nasal" (consistente en atacar con precision al Norte de Corea).
					
					Trump debe tener bien presente que tan pronto como tocara siquiera una hierba de esta tierra, se le rompera su espinazo y el imperio americano se convertira en un infierno dando punto final a su historia tan corta.
					
					Encerrar a Trump en la camara de psicopatas aislada del mundo es la unica receta tanto para EE.UU. como para la armonia y paz del orbe.

articles.title: DPRK Art Troupe Arrives at Mukho Port of S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK Art Troupe Arrives at Mukho Port of S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- An art troupe of the DPRK left Wonsan Port aboard the ship "Mangyongbong-92" and arrived at Mukho Port of south Korea on the afternoon of Tuesday to give congratulatory performance for the 23rd Winter Olympics.
					 It is making preparations for congratulatory performance to be given in Kangrung on Feb. 8.

articles.title: DPRK National Olympic Committee Delegation Departs
articles.content:
DPRK National Olympic Committee Delegation Departs
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A DPRK National Olympic Committee delegation led by Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports who is chairman of the DPRK Olympic Committee, left here on Wednesday to take part in the 23rd Winter Olympics due in south Korea.
					 A cheering group, a Taekwon-do demonstration group and a press corps of the DPRK left together with the delegation.
					
					 After arriving in Kaesong, the delegation and groups and corps headed for the south side's area at around 9 o'clock.
					
					 On the same day, the DPRK National Olympic Committee delegation arrived in Phyongchang of south Korea while its cheering group, Taekwon-do demonstration group and press corps arrived in Rinje.
					
					 Earlier, the DPRK players team arrived in south Korea to take part in the Winter Olympics. It is conducting training in Kangrung, Phyongchang, etc.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Muhammadu Buhari, president of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, on the occasion of the 70th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 The charge d'affaires ad interim of the Nigerian embassy here conveyed the floral basket to an official concerned on Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a basket of flowers and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here ahead of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The basket and letter were conveyed to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Russian Military Attache Alexei Bartusov, doyen of the corps, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid at Martyrs Cemeteries
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid at Martyrs Cemeteries
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Wednesday on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Seen on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths from respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were senior party and government officials Pak Kwang Ho, Kim Phyong Hae, Thae Jong Su, O Su Yong, An Jong Su, Ro Tu Chol, Choe Pu Il, Ri Man Gon, Kim Su Gil, Jong Kyong Thaek and No Kwang Chol and officials of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong and observed a moment's silence in memory of her.
					
					 Placed on the wreath-laying stands of the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri were wreaths in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee, the DPRK State Affairs Commission, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK and on the wreath-laying stand of the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery a wreath in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the DPRK State Affairs Commission.
					
					 Also laid there were wreaths in the names of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the KPISF, institutions of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media and party and power bodies, enterprises, farms, etc. in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs.
					
					 They went round the cemeteries.

articles.title: Congratulations to Cyprus President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Cyprus President
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly who is Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, on Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Nicos Anastasiades on his reelection as president of the Republic of Cyprus.
					 Kim in the message wished the Cyprus president greater success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country and wellbeing of its people, expressing belief that the relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in their common interests.

articles.title: Congratulations to Zambian FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Zambian FM
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho on Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Joseph Malanji upon his appointment as foreign minister of the Republic of Zambia.
					 The message wished the foreign minister of Zambia greater success in his responsible work for the development of the country's external relations, expressing the expectation that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with long history and tradition would grow stronger.

articles.title: Zimbabwean Military Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Zimbabwean Military Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A military delegation of the Republic of Zimbabwe led by Moyo Elson, commander of the Air Force of the Zimbabwe National Army, Wednesday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Members of the delegation paid high tribute to the peerlessly great men before their statues.
					
					 They paid homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Director of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
articles.content:
Director of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Jin Yuhua, director of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, arrived here on Wednesday.

articles.title: Serbian Lawmaker Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Serbian Lawmaker Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Miroslav Lazanski, a lawmaker from the Serbian Progressive Party, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on Kim Il Sung's revolutionary career, the visitor looked round historical mementoes preserved in his old home with much care.
					
					 He also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, etc.

articles.title: Provokers Keen on Escalating Confrontation Can Never Evade Punishment: CCNR
articles.content:
Provokers Keen on Escalating Confrontation Can Never Evade Punishment: CCNR
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Consultative Council for National Reconciliation in a statement Wednesday condemned the south Korean ultra-right conservative forces getting frantic in escalating confrontation with the DPRK to the extremes and going all the more desperate with the opening of the Winter Olympics approaching.
					 The "Korean Patriotic Party" and other ultra-right conservative forces of south Korea held anti-DPRK rallies at Seoul Railway Station Plaza and outside Inchon Sonhak International Skating Stadium on Feb. 3 and 4 where they committed such hideous crime of tearing and burning the portraits, symbolic of the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership, DPRK flags and Korean peninsula flags while shouting like a group of rabid dogs that "they are opposed to Phyongchang Olympics becoming Pyongyang Olympics".
					
					 On Feb. 6 they flocked to Mukho Port, crowded with south Koreans who came to welcome the art troupe of the DPRK about to arrive there aboard "Mangyongbong-92", and held a "press conference against Pyongyang Olympics". And as the ship approached a wharf, they again committed the heinous act of torching the DPRK's flag and Korean peninsula flag, not content with shouting that "ship with Reds aboard is entering" and "You go back to your country".
					
					 What is all the more shocking is that the riffraff of the conservative organizations plan to continue committing such shuddering acts while holding anti-DPRK confrontational rallies in several parts of Kangrung including the hotel where our cheering group is to stay and a venue where the art troupe is to give its performance on Feb. 8, the army day of the DPRK, and during the Olympiad.
					
					 The spokesman denounced the ultra-right conservative forces including the "Korean Patriotic Party" as a group of matchless human scum and cancer-like entity seized by the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in whom not even appearance or conscience as a member of the Korean nation can ever be found.
					
					 What matters is that the wild acts of the conservative forces are timed to coincide with the act of the Trump group kicking up a "human rights" racket against the DPRK even by egging on "defectors from the north", uneasy over the atmosphere of the north-south reconciliation getting ripened with each passing day, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The situation clearly proves who is the enemy to reunification standing in the way of the improvement of the north-south relations and peace on the Korean Peninsula and who is a chief culprit instigating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen and how the confrontation racket of the conservative forces has reached such an extreme phase.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' connivance at such uncouth and rude acts of chilling the DPRK's sincerity and efforts not only greatly disappointed us and arouses doubt about their willingness for the improvement of the north-south ties.
					
					 Is that OK with the south Korean authorities if the Olympics ground which should be the one for peace turns into a theater of confrontation and a backward current is created in the north-south relations, and will it be possible for them to hold no responsibilities?
					
					 The south Korean authorities should come to their senses and take decisive measures, though belatedly, if they do not want to see an inglorious thing happening.
					
					 The heinous provokers who dared to challenge the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system, being engrossed in escalating confrontation with it, can never evade merciless punishment.

articles.title: Workers' Art Group of C.C., GFTUK Gives Performance
articles.content:
Workers' Art Group of C.C., GFTUK Gives Performance
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Art Group of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) Tuesday gave a performance at the Central Hall of Workers to mark Feb. 8, the birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including chorus "Cantata to Marshal Kim Il Sung" and "Song of the Korean People's Army", female quartet "Train to the Front" and male solo and pangchang "Appearance of Korea".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in army building.
					
					 Narration and mixed quartet "We Cannot Live without You" mesmerized the audience as it truthfully represented the personality of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as the great man.
					
					 Also staged were a series of songs like "Tell the Love for Soldiers" describing the spirit of a-match-for-a-hundred fighters and their ardent love for the homeland.
					
					 Instrumental music and song "We Will Go to Mt Paektu", "Let's Keep the Revolutionary Faith to the Death" and other numbers vividly depicted the faith and will of the working class and members of the trade unions to add eternal luster to the exploits of the great leaders in army building and faithfully support the Party's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 Among the audience were officials concerned, officials of the trade unions, workers and trade union members.

articles.title: Performance of Women's Union Art Squad
articles.content:
Performance of Women's Union Art Squad
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea Tuesday gave a performance at the Hall of Women in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The numbers of the performance included chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "Song of the Korean People's Army".
					
					 The performers sang loudly of the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who set a brilliant example in building the regular armed forces of Juche and developed the KPA into the matchless revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 They represented the Korean women's will to actively assist the servicepersons like their own flesh and blood and bring up their children ideologically, morally and physically for military service and thus contribute to consolidating the defence capabilities of the country.
					
					 They also showed the enthusiasm of all the women to staunchly advance along the road of the revolution following the Party in single mind with the pride of being citizens of socialist Korea which is demonstrating its tremendous strength under the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.

articles.title: Performance of UAWK Art Squad
articles.content:
Performance of UAWK Art Squad
Jaeryong, February 7 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea gave a performance at the Samjigang Co-op Farm in Jaeryong County of South Hwanghae Province on Tuesday, in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Put on the stage of the performance which started with chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "Song of the Korean People's Army" were colorful numbers such as female duet "General's Way to Front" and male quartet "A Soldier Hears Rice Ears Sway".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who set a brilliant example in the building of revolutionary armed forces in the era of independence with their unique military idea and outstanding commanding art and made an ever-victorious history of the heroic KPA.
					
					 Serial songs "Cheers of the People" and "The Best Bosom" mesmerized the audience with deep reverence for respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who turned the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the greatest patriotic legacy of the great leaders, into a dignified nuclear power of Juche and world military power.
					
					 They showed well the ardent patriotic will of the agricultural workers to keep the first line trench of the first echelon in defending socialism through mixed duet "Arirang of Army-People Unity", jugglery, comic story and other numbers.

articles.title: Poster for 22nd Kimjongilia Festival Produced
articles.content:
Poster for 22nd Kimjongilia Festival Produced
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A poster for the 22nd Kimjongilia Festival to be held on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was produced.
					 Depicted on its centre is immortal Kimjongilia in full bloom with grandiose sublime appearance of Jong Il Peak as background.
					
					 On its upper part are slogan reading "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" and letters "The Day of the Shining Star" with the festival logo.
					
					 On its lower part are letters "The 22nd Kimjongilia Festival", festival venue and period.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK State Stamp Bureau issued new stamps (two sheets and one individual) with the approach of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Seen in upper part of the stamps are letters "Celebration of Feb. 8, the 70th Anniversary. Juche 37(1948)-Juche 107(2018)".
					
					 One of the sheets carries a photo of President Kim Il Sung standing on the tribune of honor at the military parade of the KPA on Feb. 8, Juche 37 (1948). Depicted in it are Mt Paektu, the holy mountain of revolution symbolic of the glorious tradition of the KPA, the flag of the Anti-Japanese People's Guerilla Army and the colors of the KPA.
					
					 Printed in the lower part of the sheet with the Korean painting "In the days of army building" showing the exploits of Kim Il Sung who set forth the army building line as one of the three tasks for building a new country after the liberation of Korea and led the struggle for its realisation are the text and musical note of "Song of the Korean People's Army".
					
					 The individual stamp deals with soldiers of the KPA intensely loyal to the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Kwanum Temple Restored in DPRK
articles.content:
Kwanum Temple Restored in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Kwanum Temple, a historical relic of Koryo (918-1392) that was built in 970, was recently restored in the DPRK.
					 The temple, rebuilt in 1646, stands near the Pakyon Falls at the foot of Mt Chonma in Pakyon-ri of Kaesong City.
					
					 The Department of National Heritage Protection under the Kaesong City People's Committee and the Kaesong City Management Office for the Protection of National Heritage replaced rotten wood parts and tiles of the Taeung Hall and dormitory in the temple and colorfully repainted them on the principle of historicism and restoration.
					
					 According to an official concerned, the restoration project was carried out, according to the agreement on cooperation in repairing historical relics in Kaesong City concluded between the DPRK National Authority for the Protection of Cultural Heritage and the German embassy in Pyongyang in April 2017.

articles.title: Winter Folk Games of Korea
articles.content:
Winter Folk Games of Korea
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Children are enjoying this winter season through diverse folk games in the DPRK.
					 Typical of them are sleigh-riding, snowman-making and top spinning which are most popular among children for having good effect on physical training.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Flailed for Disturbing Inter-Korean Reconciliation
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Flailed for Disturbing Inter-Korean Reconciliation
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- When asked if the U.S. plans to stop the joint military drills with south Korea by a reporter shortly ago, the director of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff answered that it just "adjusted the schedule" so that the exercises would not overlap Olympics and the exercises will "resume immediately" after the Olympics are over.
					 A spokesman for the U.S. Department of Defense and the U.S. charge d' affaires in south Korea asserted that the drills would start immediately after the Olympics.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says that their remarks are an outright challenge to the sincere efforts made by the DPRK to defuse the tension on the Korean peninsula and create a peaceful environment as they are a sinister military racket aimed to chill the atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south ties and reverse the trend of development with the DPRK's participation in the Olympics as a momentum.
					
					 The commentary notes that if the U.S. and south Korean military warmongers resume the large-scale joint military drills aimed at the DPRK as soon as the Winter Olympics are over, the inter-Korean relations which took the first step towards detente will worsen and the situation on the Korean peninsula turn back to the catastrophic phase again.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 If the joint military exercises bedeviling the improvement of the north-south relations and threatening peace resume despite the unanimous opposition and denunciation at home and abroad, the U.S. and south Korean military warmongers will be held wholly accountable for the consequences to be entailed by them.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean military warmongers would be well advised to stop acting rashly, clearly bearing in mind that if they do not stop the nuclear war saber-rattling bringing a miserable disaster to the Korean peninsula, they will be bitterly blasted by the Korean nation and the international community.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as Chief Culprit of Nuclear Proliferation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as Chief Culprit of Nuclear Proliferation
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S.-Japan atomic energy agreement which allowed Japan's plutonium extraction through the reprocessing of spent nuclear fuel and uranium enrichment has been automatically extended.
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this is a product of the island reactionaries' crafty calculation to realize the ambition for nuclear possession at the tacit connivance of their master, and the dirty intention of the U.S. to use Japan as a shock brigade in invading Asia.
					
					 The news analyst goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is a nuclear war criminal that dropped A-bombs over Hiroshima and Nagasaki whereas Japan is a would-be nuclear criminal that made desperate efforts till right before its defeat while carrying out nuclear explosion test in the waters off Hungnam, Korea.
					
					 The U.S. has systematically supported Japan's expansion of nuclear capabilities by granting it the privileged position regarding the nuclear technological transfer and reprocessing of the spent nuclear fuel and by cooperating in the construction of reprocessing plant. Now it has allowed the automatic extension of the U.S.-Japan atomic energy agreement, thus fuelling Japan's ambition for nuclear weaponization.
					
					 Japan is seeking the revival of the blood-stained imperial era, being buoyed by the ambition for reinvasion. It is watching for a chance to go nuclear at the tacit connivance of the U.S. just like a stray cat eyeing an oil bowl.
					
					 Several forces following the U.S. are soliciting it to grant them the same right as Japan's, doubling the danger of the situation.
					
					 The U.S. is a chief culprit which spreads the nuclear weapons technology throughout the planet, namely Northeast Asia and the Middle East, and gives rise to the worldwide nuclear arms race.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts Senseless Complaint of Top-Class Human Rights Abuser Japan
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts Senseless Complaint of Top-Class Human Rights Abuser Japan
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson during his recent press appearance said that Japan still has something to do for the solution of the sexual slavery issue.
					 Dumb-founded by the attitude of the U.S. whom Japan upholds just like her own father, the Japanese government reeled off a string of complaints, talking about sort of "concerns".
					
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Wednesday brands this as a senseless complaint of political imbeciles in whom even an iota of human conscience can hardly be found.
					
					 The hideous crimes against humanity committed by Japan can never be settled without state acknowledgement of responsibility from legal viewpoint and without apology and reparation to the victims, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Japan's persistent act of denying the crimes related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army is as foolish an act as adding to its past crimes.
					
					 Japan's far-fetched assertions and a litany of complaints are not just aimed to cover up its despicable nature as a war criminal state. Lurking behind its moves is a sordid design to realize the old ambition of the "Greater East-Asia Co-prosperity Sphere", which it failed to do in the past, by reviving militarist Japan.
					
					 This is useless, however. Japan can neither cover up nor write off the truth of history no matter how desperately it may try.
					
					 The statues of sexual slaves being set up in different parts of the world today are a serious warning of the world mindset to the present Japanese reactionaries who are going impudent while categorically evading sincere repentance and reparation for the past crimes.

articles.title: U.S. Has No Other Option than to Co-exist with DPRK: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Has No Other Option than to Co-exist with DPRK: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Former U.S. State Secretaries Kissinger and Shultz and former Deputy Secretary of State Armitage at a U.S. senate hearing some days ago said it is now late for the Trump administration to settle the nuclear issue of Korea. Saying that there are no possibilities in place for stopping Korea's reinforcement of nuclear weapons, Kissinger warned that unilateral fighting of a war with Korea can bring great consequences. Agreeing to it, Shultz stressed the need for the U.S. to be careful, asserting that a threat little short of an empty talk will only destroy the U.S.
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Wednesday says that this is a warning given to the Trump administration which is shunning the situation, being seized by the pipedream of "nuclear dismantlement of the north" and pushing the country into self-destruction.
					
					 "Nuclear dismantlement" of the DPRK pursued by the Trump administration is a wild dream that can never come true and there are neither strength nor ways to reverse the situation, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Gone are the days when the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula was a controversial issue.
					
					 Now is a time to discuss how to set right the relations with the DPRK after acknowledging the DPRK's strategic position as an entity possessed of nuclear weapons, not to discuss denuclearization.
					
					 To doggedly deny this logical way of thinking and to dream of "nuclear dismantlement" of the DPRK while resorting to the old way of thinking which has already lost its value is not just a waste of time but also a senseless act bringing great danger.
					
					 There is no other option now for the U.S. than to co-exist with the DPRK, a nuclear power.

articles.title: S. Korea: Ultra-Right Conservatives Slashed for Trying to Spoil National Cooperation
articles.content:
S. Korea: Ultra-Right Conservatives Slashed for Trying to Spoil National Cooperation
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online newspaper Minjok Ilbo Monday carried an editorial critical of the "Liberal Korea Party" and other ultra-right conservatives of south Korea trying to do harm to national cooperation.
					 The editorial charged that the gentries of the LKP were slandering the north's event, to be held in celebration of the army day, as "military provocation" and "war preparations".
					
					 Contending that the conservative parties and ultra-right forces should take a stand against the U.S. nuclear war moves, if they are interested in peace and security, the editorial said the reality clearly shows who is the patriotic force aspiring after peace and reunification and who is the treacherous force seeking a war and division.

articles.title: Spasm of Psychopaths Accustomed to Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
articles.content:
Spasm of Psychopaths Accustomed to Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The conservative group of south Korea staged a never-to-be-condoned farce of confrontation with fellow countrymen on Tuesday when the DPRK's art troupe arrived at Mukho Port in south Korean Kangwon Province to give congratulatory performance for the Winter Olympics due in south Korea, according to reports in Seoul.
					 When the ship "Mangyongbong-92" carrying the art troupe arrived, Jo Won Jin, head of the "Korean Patriotic Party", a stooge party of traitor Park Geun Hye, and other crazy nerds held a "rally against Pyongyang Olympics" and ran around like headless chickens, barking that "the ship of reds came", "go back to your country" and "boost the south Korea-U.S. alliance". Worse still, they made no bones about besmirching the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership and burning the flags of the DPRK and the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Such farce of those conservatives stunned the world as they were crazy with the racket for confrontation before foreign reporters while many inhabitants of various strata gave hearty welcome to the compatriots from the north even in cold weather.
					
					 Now all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad and the international community eagerly want to see that the hard-won climate for improved north-south relations and removal of confrontation will be led to national concord and cooperation and detente and reunification of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 However, those conservatives have staged such disgusting farces as "press conference against Pyongyang Olympics" and "demo against the visit of the north's art troupe" almost every day. Not content with it, they put an affront on the mission that came to celebrate an event of the nation, far from presenting bouquets. In fact, they are no more than a group of benighted gangsters inferior to beast, human scum.
					
					 They, accustomed to sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with fellow countrymen, barely prolong their remaining days with vituperation and rampage. Their frenzy is getting fiercer after Trump and Abe prattled that "pressure should be maximized without falling to the smiling diplomacy of the north" on Feb. 2.
					
					 So, the south Korean people are raising shout of wrath at this group of rabid dogs that block national concord and unity and peace and bring disgrace to the nation, defining the group as "the remaining evil forces stoking national division", "traitors" and "modern-day five traitors in 1905".
					
					 Such mad behavior of the enemies of the nation running counter to the compatriots' wishes and the trend of the times will only bring earlier the day when the waste of history sink into the grave.

articles.title: Action for Peace against War Called for
articles.content:
Action for Peace against War Called for
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration on Feb. 1 made public an appeal to all the youth and students in the north and the south of Korea and overseas, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 Referring to the fact that a unified team of the south and the north was formed and the cheering group, art troupe and Taekwon-do demonstration group of the north are to visit south Korea on the occasion of the Winter Olympics, the appeal said:
					
					 Youth and students in the south and the north and abroad who love peace and reunification should smash the anti-reunification and anti-peace moves of the conservative forces at home and abroad to make the Winter Olympics a festival of peace.
					
					 The appeal urged the youth and students to turn out in the struggle against any action of escalating tension, under the banner of peace against war.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed by the Communist Party "Russian Communists" on Jan. 26.
					 M. A. Suraikin, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party "Russian Communists", was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to hold colorful political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Austria
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Austria
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- An Austrian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Vienna on Jan. 26.
					 Thomas Losh, general secretary of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to hold colorful political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary feats of the peerlessly great persons on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Slovenian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Slovenian Body
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was posted on the website of the Slovenian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star on Jan. 26.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that it is a principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to continue holding leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, and clarifies the tasks to continue to develop the Party into the glorious party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: El grupo artistico de la RPDC llega al Puerto de Mukho del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
El grupo artistico de la RPDC llega al Puerto de Mukho del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- A fin de ofrecer la funcion para felicitar los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales el grupo artistico de la RPDC partio del Puerto de Wonsan a bordo del barco "Mangyongbong-92" y llego por la tarde del dia 6 al Puerto de Mukho del Sur de Corea.
					El grupo hace los preparativos para la funcion artistica que se efectuara el dia 8 en Kangrung.

articles.title: Delegacion del Comite Olimpico Nacional de RPDC parte de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Delegacion del Comite Olimpico Nacional de RPDC parte de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- La delegacion del Comite Olimpico Nacional encabezada por Kim Il Guk, ministro de Deportes y presidente del Comite Olimpico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, partio el dia 7 de esta capital para participar en los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales a efectuarse en el Sur de Corea, junto con los grupos de hinchas, de demostracion de Taekwon-do y periodistas.
					La delegacion y los grupos llegaron a Kaesong y dirigieron a eso de las 9 a la zona surcoreana.
					
					El mismo dia, la delegacion arribo a Phyongchang del Sur de Corea y los grupos, a Rinje.
					
					Con anterioridad, el grupo de deportistas norcoreanos llego al Sur de Corea para participar en la olimpiada y se ejercita ahora en Kangrung, Phyongchang y otros lugres.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de Presidente nigeriano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de Presidente nigeriano
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que le enviara Muhammadu Buhari, Presidente de la Republica Federal de Nigeria, en ocasion del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					El encargado de negocios a. i. de Nigeria en Corea lo traslado el dia 7 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de Cuerpo de Agregados Militares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de Cuerpo de Agregados Militares
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores y una carta de felicitacion que le dedicara el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares acreditado en Corea, con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la EPC.
					El agregado militar de la embajada rusa, Alexei Bartusov, quien preside el Cuerpo, los traslado el dia 7 al general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.

articles.title: Jin Yuhua llega a Pyongyang
articles.content:
Jin Yuhua llega a Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- Llego hoy a esta capital Jin Yuhua, directora del Consejo de la Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Portavoz de CRN advierte a maniacos de enfrentamiento fratricida
articles.content:
Portavoz de CRN advierte a maniacos de enfrentamiento fratricida
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- En visperas de la apertura de los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales, las entidades conservadoras ultraderechistas del Sur de Corea recrudecen mas que nunca el alboroto de enfrentamiento contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional (CRN) publico el dia 7 una declaracion que sigue:
					
					Los dias 3 y 4, los gangsteres de las entidades conservadoras ultraderechistas incluyendo el Partido Patriotico de Corea libraron al frente de la plaza de la Estacion Ferroviaria de Seul y del Estadio Internacional de Patinaje Sonhak de Inchon los mitines conflictivos contra la RPDC y cometieron por doquier el crimen de rasgar y quemar el retrato considerado como simbolo de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC, la bandera de la Republica y la de reunificacion gritando "Rechazamos la Olimpiada de Phyongchang que se convierte en la de Pyongyang".
					
					Y el dia 6, acudieron al Puerto de Mukho donde los habitantes de distintos sectores formaban un robledal de bienvenida en espera de la llegada del grupo de artistas norcoreanos a bordo del barco "Mangyongbong-92" y sostuvieron una "conferencia de prensa contra la Olimpiada de Pyongyang" disparateando que "viene el barco de rojos" y "regresen a su pais". Y cuando llego el barco al desembarcadero, volvieron a quemar la bandera de la Republica y la de reunificacion. 
					
					Lo mas indignante es que los tipejos de las entidades conservadoras tratan de cometer tales actos temerarios efectuando el 8 de febrero, dia de fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, y en el periodo de los Juegos Olimpicos los mitines conflictivos en el hotel donde se alojara el grupo de hinchas de la RPDC, en el lugar de funcion de nuestro grupo artistico y otros puntos de Kangrung.
					
					El hecho demuestra claramente que el "Partido Patriotico de Corea" y otras entidades conservadoras ultraderechistas son hez humana de pesima calana carente de la calidad y percepcion del integrante de la nacion y ente canceroso enloquecido en la confrontacion fratricida.
