					Lo problematico del caso es que los tumultos sucesivos de las entidades conservadoras surcoreanas coinciden con la campana intrigante de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de la banda de Trump, muy inquietada por el ambiente favorable a la reconciliacion N-S, donde se movilizaron hasta los "fugitivos norcoreanos".
					
					La realidad facilita saber correctamente quien es el enemigo de reunificacion que impide la mejora de relaciones N-S y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, quien instiga el enfrentamiento fratricida y cuan tragica fase a que llego la demencia conflictiva de las entidades antinacionales.
					
					Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas no hacen nada ante tales locuras insolentes que echan agua fria a nuestros sinceros esfuerzos. Esta conducta nos causa la decepcion y la sospecha sobre su voluntad de mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					?Acaso, las autoridades surcoreanas no tienen culpa por la conversion de la olimpiada, evento de paz, en el campo de confrontacion y por la creacion de la contracorriente de las relaciones N-S?
					
					Si no desean el caso desagradable, ellas deben volver en si y tomar las medidas decisivas.
					
					No evitaran severo castigo los provocadores de categoria especial quienes desafian a la maxima dignidad y regimen de la RPDC.

articles.title: Locuras de los tipejos enloquecidos por la confrontacion fratricida
articles.content:
Locuras de los tipejos enloquecidos por la confrontacion fratricida
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- Segun transcendidos en Seul, la banda conservadora surcoreana perpetro el dia 6 una imperdonable farsa de confrontacion fratricida ante el grupo artistico de la RPDC que llego al Puerto de Mukho de la provincia de Kangwon del Sur de Corea para ofrecer una funcion para felicitar los 23o Juegos Olimpicos Invernales que tendran lugar en el Sur de Corea.
					Cuando llego el barco "Mangyongbong-92" que lleva el grupo artistico de la RPDC, Jo Won Jin y otros tipejos del Partido Patriotico de Corea, entidad de los lacayos restantes de la traidora Park Geun-hye, efectuaron el "mitin contra la olimpiada de Pyongyang" en que levantaron un tumulto gritando "viene el barco de rojos", "regresen a su pais", "vamos a gritar en voz alta para que escuchara Hyon Song Wol" y "fortalezca la alianza Sur de Corea-EE.UU.".
					
					Y perpetraron sin vacilacion los imperdonables actos de ofender la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y quemar la Bandera de la Republica y la de reunificacion.
					
					Pese al frio del invierno, los habitantes surcoreanos de distintos sectores salieron a acoger con emocion a los compatriotas norcoreanos.
					
					En contraste con esto, aquellos tipejos se enfrascaron en la furia conflictiva sin sentir avergonzado ante los reporteros de varios paises, lo cual produjo un gran espanto mundial. 
					
					Ahora, todos los coreanos en el Norte y el Sur de Corea y en otros paises y la sociedad internacional desean que las medidas preparadas a duras penas por la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la eliminacion de la confrontacion fratricida se dirigieran a la reconciliacion y cooperacion nacionales y la distension y la reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					En este momento unos tipejos efectuaron dia y dia las farsas como la "entrevista de prensa contra la olimpiada de Pyongyang" y la "manifestacion contra la visita del grupo artistico del Norte". Insatisfechas con esto, esas basuras humanas perpetraron los actos gangsteriles contra los mensajeros norcoreanos quienes visitaron con el caliente amor consanguineo el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Tales alborotos locos se desarrollan mas locamente despues del dia 2  cuando Trump y Abe dijeron: "No deben ser fascinados por la diplomacia de sonrisa del Norte, sino aumentar al maximo la presion".
					
					Por tanto, todos los sectores del Sur de Corea expresan la gran ira calificando a esa banda que obstaculizan la reconciliacion, la unidad y la paz nacionales como "fuerzas viciosas de la division", "vendepatrias" y "los 5 traidores de Ulsa de edicion moderna".
					
					Las conductas viles de los enemigos de la nacion quienes marchan a contrapelo del deseo nacional y la tendencia anticiparan mas el dia de su arruinamiento.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a EE.UU., culpable de proliferacion de armas nucleares
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a EE.UU., culpable de proliferacion de armas nucleares
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- Se prorrogara automaticamente el convenio de energia atomica EE.UU.-Japon que permite a este pais isleno la extraccion de plutonio mediante el reprocesamiento de combustibles nucleares usados y el enriquecimiento de uranio.
					Esto deviene el producto del calculo taimado de los reaccionarios japoneses de realizar su ambicion de poseer las armas nucleares bajo el amparo de su amo gringo y de la intencion malsana de EE.UU. de usar eternamente a su lacayo Japon como brigada de choque para la agresion a Asia.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					EE.UU. es el criminal nuclear que lanzo las bombas atomicas contra Hiroshima y Nagasaki. Y a su vez, Japon es el criminal nuclear frustrado que antes de su derrota realizo la prueba de explosion nuclear en el mar frente a Hungnam de Corea.
					
					EE.UU. ya apoyo sistematicamente la ampliacion de la capacidad nuclear de Japon mediante el traslado de la tecnica nuclear, la concesion de la posicion privilegiada sobre el reprocesamiento de combustibles nucleares usados y la cooperacion en la construccion de la fabrica de reprocesamiento, etc.  
					
					Y esta vez permitio prorrogar automaticamente el susodicho convenio, hecho que incito otra vez a la ambicion de Japon por el armamento nuclear.
					
					Bajo la tolerancia de EE.UU., el pais isla, que recurre al renacimiento de la epoca imperial y a la ambicion de reagresion, acecha la oportunidad de armamento nuclear.
					
					Se aumenta la peligrosidad del caso debido a la exigencia de otras fuerzas seguidoras a EE.UU. a conceder el derecho privilegiado como Japon. 
					
					De veras, EE.UU. es el culpable que prolifera la tecnica de armas nucleares y engendra la carrera armamentista nuclear mundial.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica decision de EE.UU. de reanudar los ejercicios militares conjuntos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica decision de EE.UU. de reanudar los ejercicios militares conjuntos
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el jefe de departamento de la Junta de los Jefes de Estado Mayor de EE.UU. respondio a la pregunta de un reportero sobre la existencia o no del plan de suspender los ejercicios militares con el Sur de Corea. En esa ocasion, el dijo que "solo se ha ajustado el programa" para que el simulacro no coincida con la olimpiada y "lo reiniciaria de inmediato" una vez terminada la cita deportiva.
					Tambien, hablaron asi el portavoz del Departamento de Defensa y el encargado de negocios a. i. norteamericano en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Este acto verbal persigue el siniestro intento de romper la atmosfera de mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas, creada con motivo de la participacion de la RPDC en el evento deportivo, y la corriente de su evolucion. Ademas, resulta un desafio frontal a nuestros esfuerzos sinceros por aliviar la tension y preparar el ambiente pacifico de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de hoy y continua:
					
					Si EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos reinician los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran envergadura contra la RPDC tan pronto como terminaran los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales, se tambalearan las relaciones intercoreanas, que dieron apenas el primer paso de mejoramiento, y la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana volvera a la coyuntura catastrofica.
					
					La responsabilidad de todas sus consecuencias recaera totalmente a EE.UU. y los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano que amenazan de esa manera la paz desoyendo las unanimes voces de rechazo de los nacionales y extranjeros.
					
					Ellos deben actuar con prudencia al darse cuenta de que seran criticados y condenados mas fuertemente por la nacion coreana y la sociedad internacional si no dejan su plan de ejercicios de guerra nuclear que impondran tremendos desastres a la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Has No Intention to Meet U.S. Side
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Has No Intention to Meet U.S. Side
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Jo Yong Sam, department director general of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK, Wednesday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA as regards the fact that U.S. authorities say this or that over the issue of contact between the DPRK's delegation participating in the opening ceremony of the 23rd Winter Olympics and the U.S. vice-president:
					 On Tuesday a spokesperson for the U.S. Department of State told a reporter over the possible contact between the DPRK's delegation participating in the opening ceremony of the 23rd Winter Olympics and the U.S. vice-president that the U.S. evidently has no plan to contact with the DPRK during and after the Olympics.
					
					 U.S. Vice-President Pence, too, said that he didn't press for any contact with the DPRK's delegation and asked the south Korean authorities to fix a schedule not to encounter the delegation. And he claimed that they would see what is happening.
					
					 This is the height of sarcasm.
					
					 We have never begged for dialogue with the U.S. nor in the future, too.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, we have no intention to meet with the U.S. side during the stay in south Korea.
					
					 Our delegation's visit to south Korea is only to take part in the Olympics and hail its successful holding.
					
					 We are not going to use such sports festival as the Winter Olympics as a political lever. There is no need to do so.
					
					 The U.S. had better act with discretion, well aware that its imprudent word and deeds will only show itself in a more awkward position.

articles.title: Commanding Officers of KPA Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Commanding Officers of KPA Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Commanding officers of the Korean People's Army (KPA) visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on February 8, the 70th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 The visitors paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the halls of immortality where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, they made deep bows to them in the humblest reverence.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their revolutionary life.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Great Leaders
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Great Leaders
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Seen before the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang was a floral basket from respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Placed at the statues were floral baskets in the name of party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, enterprises and schools at all levels in the city.
					
					 The visitors made bows to the statues.
					
					 Floral baskets in the name of units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, enterprises and other units, together with bouquets and flowers, were laid before the statues of the great leaders at Kim Il Sung Military University, Kim Il Sung University of Politics, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security and other places in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Servicepersons, working people and school youth and children in across the country paid floral tribute to the statues of the great leaders and mosaics depicting their beaming images in their residential quarters.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Martyrs
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Martyrs
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid at the statues and cemeteries and tombs of martyrs and memorial towers for the fallen soldiers of the Korean People's Army (KPA) across the country on Thursday, on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 Attending the wreath-laying ceremonies were officials of local party and power organs, working people's organizations, men and officers of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people and school youth and children.
					
					 Placed there were wreaths in the names of the local party and power organs, working people's organizations, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, industrial establishments, farms and other units, together with bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The participants paid a silent tribute to the martyrs.

articles.title: People's Delegations Visit KPA Units
articles.content:
People's Delegations Visit KPA Units
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- People's delegations visited units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on the occasion of its founding anniversary.
					 The units were overflowing with affections of blood ties between the army and people as members of the people's delegations congratulated service personnel on the army day and the latter were excited with joy.
					
					 The visitors conveyed the efforts of the people behind the front to the service personnel and handed them supplies they prepared sincerely.
					
					 They, together with the service members, participated in colorful political and cultural events held to celebrate the anniversary.
					
					 Talking to the soldiers who have distinguished themselves in the combat and political training, they conveyed to them the warm request of the people hoping that the soldiers will defend the posts of the country as firm as a rock.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in different parts of the country on Thursday in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Dancing venues in Pyongyang included the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding and the Arch of Triumph.
					
					 The participants began dancing to the tune of "Song of the Korean People's Army".
					
					 They danced in humble reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who creditably accomplished the cause of building the revolutionary regular armed forces and developed the KPA into the matchless and invincible revolutionary army.
					
					 "At Square of Military Parade", "Song of Airman" and other songs revved up the atmosphere of the dancing parties.
					
					 When the song "Cheers of the People" resounded over the dancing venues, the dancers were full of high pride of holding respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 Similar dancing parties were also staged in provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Historic Day in Building Juche-type Revolutionary Armed Forces
articles.content:
Historic Day in Building Juche-type Revolutionary Armed Forces
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- February 8 is a historic day when the birth of the Korean People's Army (KPA) was declared.
					 After the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, President Kim Il Sung set it as a prerequisite for building an independent and sovereign state to found a regular armed forces, and put forward the line of building a revolutionary regular army embracing sons and daughters of the working people with the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters as its backbone.
					
					 Under his guidance, the Pyongyang Institute was established in February Juche 35 (1946) to produce military and political officers and the Central Security Officers Training School in July that year to train commanding officers and technical personnel of all branches of arms and services.
					
					 An aviation class was formed at the Pyongyang Institute in March 1946 and the Marine Security Officers Training School founded to train military cadres for air and naval forces in a far-sighted way. 
					
					 And the Security Officers Training Center was organized to train core members of the regular army and, on this basis, it had been pushed forward to expand different units of arms and services.
					
					 Early in October 1945, the President visited Phyongchon-ri in Pyongyang and unrolled the grand plan for founding the Juche-oriented national defence industry. Thanks to his leadership, the munitions factory, the first of its kind in the country, came into being in June 1947 to produce weapons and military hardware by its own efforts.
					
					 Under these circumstances, a military parade was held on February 8, 1948 to proclaim the birth of the KPA, the people's army carrying forward the tradition of the anti-Japanese revolutionary armed struggle and having different services and arms fully supported by the independent munitions industry.
					
					 Since its founding, the KPA has reliably defended the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution with arms, frustrating the U.S. imperialists' ceaseless moves to provoke a war, and fully discharged its mission and duty as the creator of the people's happiness.
					
					 It defeated the U.S. imperialists, which boasted of being "the strongest" in the world, in the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953) and captured the U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo to exact a written apology from the U.S.
					
					 Now, the KPA is further demonstrating its might as a powerful revolutionary elite army fully ready to react to any form of war under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is ushering in the greatest heyday of building the revolutionary armed forces.

articles.title: Congratulations to Bangladeshi President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Bangladeshi President
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to MD. Abdul Hamid on his reelection as president of the People's Republic of Bangladesh.
					 Kim in the message wished the president success in his responsible work, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Papers Praise Army-Building Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men
articles.content:
Papers Praise Army-Building Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK Thursday dedicate editorials to the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 They stress that the foundation of the KPA by President Kim Il Sung on February 8, Juche 37 (1948) was a historic event of great significance in carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung is the founder-builder of the heroic KPA.
					
					 After the liberation of the country the building of regular armed forces became an urgent task which brooks no moment's delay due to the U.S. imperialists' occupation of south Korea and massive war preparations. With deep insight into the prevailing situation and lawful requirement of the developing revolution, the President set forward the building of the regular revolutionary armed forces as the top priority of the state affairs and directed utmost efforts to it. He successfully accomplished the cause of the building of the regular revolutionary armed forces in less than three years under the difficult conditions where there was neither experience nor foundation. It is the immortal revolutionary exploit that could be performed only by the President, an outstanding statesman, military genius and peerless patriot.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il wisely led the Korean revolutionary armed forces to demonstrate the invincible might with outstanding military idea and rare commanding art. The revolutionary character of the KPA which has firmly maintained its nature as the Party's revolutionary armed forces down through generations is associated with the clairvoyance of the great leaders. And its mettle as an invincible army that has set an example in the world history of anti-imperialist struggle, assuming the perfect features of regular army and forming a harmonious whole with the civilians is also associated with the seasoned guidance of the leaders.
					
					 Today the KPA ushers in a heyday of its development under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The KPA under his guidance will bravely open a broad avenue for the Juche revolution, demonstrating its tremendous might.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the KPA is an invincible revolutionary army which paved an original path for building regular revolutionary armed forces in the era of independence and has firmly carried forward the ever-victorious history and tradition under the guidance of the peerlessly great men.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Blasted for Lunacy
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Blasted for Lunacy
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Recently Japanese Prime Minister Abe made a policy speech at the House of Representatives.
					 In his speech he said that he would make all efforts for global peace and prosperity under the banner of "proactive pacifism".
					
					 Crying out for "protecting the people", he said that he would exert his effort to increase defense capabilities needed in practice rather than the existing extension line.
					
					 Next day Defense Minister Onodera, agreeing to Abe's remarks, said that he would think of defence capabilities needed in practice, calling for "protecting the people" under the pretext of "severe reality".
					
					 Their remarks were timed to coincide with military moves, evidenced by brisk military exercises of various missions staged in Japan in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Thursday says that this is a typical revelation of the Japanese reactionaries' overseas expansion ambition to make Japan into a war state at any cost wearing a veil of "peace".
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Japan, a war criminal state, is not allowed to turn itself into a military giant nor take part in a war.
					
					 However, it, under the patronage of its master U.S., is preparing itself for making a preemptive attack and making desperate efforts to realize the ambition for overseas expansion.
					
					 The Japanese reactionary ruling circles, running amuck obsessed with the overseas expansion ambition, would be well advised to cool their heads overheated with the ambition for reinvasion and think twice.
					
					 No country in the world will allow Japan's aggression.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Abandon War Scenario
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Abandon War Scenario
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and other civic and social organizations in south Korea reportedly held a press conference in Seoul on February 5 to urge the U.S. administration to give up the "bloody nose operation" plan for preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					 They stressed that the U.S. should stop imposing sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK, give up south Korea-U.S. joint military maneuvers and come to DPRK-U.S. dialogue without preconditions.

articles.title: Chinese Media Slashed for Arrogantly Meddling in Event of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Chinese Media Slashed for Arrogantly Meddling in Event of Korean Nation
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The following is the full text of "For what they despicably intrude on other's affair", an article written by Jong Phil which was carried on the DPRK's leading newspapers Thursday:
					 The ties between the north and the south of Korea are now on the track of positive development.
					
					 Thanks to the DPRK's proactive proposal and steps, a breakthrough was made toward detente, peace and improvement of the relations between the north and the south and the enthusiasm of the fellow countrymen to hold the Winter Olympics as a successful event of the nation is sweeping the whole Korean Peninsula.
					
					 At this time, some media of China, not to be left behind the U.S. and Japan, reactionaries of history, are letting out impudent arguments of individual experts, seriously spoiling the atmosphere for the feast.
					
					 The Chinese Central TV Network on Feb. 5 aired an assertion of a vice-researcher of the Institute for Asia-Pacific and World Strategy under the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences: The DPRK calculated to show an open aspect of the country and improve its international image through the south Korea visit by the president of the Presidium of its Supreme People's Assembly. The international community is expecting the DPRK to show greater sincerity and concession over the denuclearization issue if it truly hopes for promoting the detente on the Korean peninsula. Unless it does so, it will be difficult for the DPRK to attain its purpose.
					
					 On the same day, the Global Times of China's People's Daily carried an argument made by a senior research fellow at the China Institute of International Studies that restoring inter-Korean relations without touching on the nuclear issue is unsustainable and fragile. 
					
					 Earlier in January, some Chinese media made wicked assertions that the sustenance of the atmosphere for detente on the Korean peninsula is closely related to the solution of the "nuclear issue of the DPRK" and that "detente will not last long without common recognition of the denuclearization".
					
					 Such incoherent talks heard from Chinese media can not but be retorted as an arrogant act aimed at interference in the internal issue of the Korean nation and an unreasonable logic and sophism ignorant of the essence of the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Obvious is the stand of the DPRK to successfully hold the Winter Olympics as a national event and fully display the dignity and might of the Korean nation and, therefore, this is supported and welcomed by all the fellow countrymen and the international community.
					
					 It is only the U.S. and other outsiders who are to blame for the division of the Korean Peninsula and the tension there that stand against the Korean nation working hard to open up a new chapter for peace on the peninsula by its concerted efforts.
					
					 China's experts and media, that have touted for "peaceful solution" to the Korean peninsula issue whenever an opportunity presented itself, now shun the present positive development of the situation and are arguing for and against while setting the DPRK's participation in the Winter Olympics against its strategic issue. How can such behavior be interpreted as an act of allegedly "disinterested" neighbors.
					
					 This is evidently an act of screwballs feeling dissatisfaction with the north and the south of Korea aspiring after detente and peace, and a mischievous act to reverse and divert the international focus away from the atmosphere for the north-south reconciliation.
					
					 It reminds one of a mean fellow looking over the fence of a feast host.
					
					 The Winter Olympics has nothing to do with "denuclearization".
					
					 As acknowledged by the world, the DPRK's possession of nuclear deterrence was a legitimate option for self-defense reflective of the stern historical lesson and the reality in which the DPRK's sincere efforts for the denuclearization of the whole Korean Peninsula were ignored and the U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK aimed to destroy its sovereignty and rights to existence and development has daily increased.
					
					 At this time, swimming against the atmosphere of peace on the Korean Peninsula, the U.S. is rendering to the extremes the political and military threat and brandishing a fireball after shipping huge aggression forces including all sorts of ultramodern nuclear war weapons to the sky, land and sea, thereby threatening the Winter Olympics and the post-Olympics situation.
					
					 If one truly hopes for peace on the Korean Peninsula and regional stability, it is reasonable for one to say what it should do to the trouble-maker U.S.
					
					 It is illogical for the Chinese media to absurdly vociferate about "denuclearization", far from saying what it should do.
					
					 So, is an event of "denuclearization" ever on the list of the Winter Olympics?
					
					 Call a spade a spade. It is very despicable of those Chinese media to mess with their neighbor's event, far from offering congratulations to it.
					
					 Ignoring the reality and occasion, they are forcibly linking the issue of "denuclearization" to the Olympics, which cannot be interpreted otherwise than an act aimed to spoil others' feast.
					
					 They betrayed the dark intention to distract the international caution focused on them to the DPRK by doggedly standing in the way of creating reconciliation atmosphere between the north and the south of Korea that would have a positive impact on the world peace and the development of the regional situation.
					
					 They are trying to hold the issue of inter-Korean relations on nuclear issue leash and use it as leverage for interference.
					
					 They, in the long run, left the international community unpleasant feelings that the "initiative and proactive neighboring diplomacy" only seeks interference in the internal affairs of other countries and nations.
					
					 Recently they slandered the DPRK's measure for self-defense as "narrow-minded interpretation of outside and self-justified action in the nuclear and missile issue". They also belittled the military capabilities of the DPRK, quoting a "conclusion drawn after inspecting from the south side position in Panmunjom". Now to what extent have they reached.
					
					 Some experts and media of China engrossed in admonishing others are now showing the same proclivity as the Trump and Abe groups and the conservative riff-raffs of south Korea marginalized after being isolated and rejected in the world.
					
					 Going blind in judging the trend of the times would make one face great disappointment.
					
					 Such senseless meddling doesn't fit the appearance of a "power".

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by Brazilian Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by Brazilian Body
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics on Feb. 1 posted on its website President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Occasion of the Founding of the Korean People's Army" in the run-up to the 70th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 The work, published on February 8, Juche 37 (1948), is an immortal program proclaiming the founding of the KPA and indicating tasks for strengthening the KPA into the invincible people's armed forces and the revolutionary army as befits a regular army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Mongolia
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A Mongolian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of the great HE Kim Jong Il was formed on Jan. 26.
					 E. Maksim, executive chairperson of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from Jan. 27 to Feb. 16 and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and feats of leader Kim Jong Il and introducing the struggle of the Korean army and people who are speeding up the building of a powerful socialist country under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Slovakia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Slovakia
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A Slovak preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Bratislava on Jan. 27.
					 Ivan Draxler, chairman of the Slovakia-Korea Friendship Association and chairman of the Slovak Association for Supporting and Studying the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from Jan. 27 to Feb. 20 and decided to hold various political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il in the period.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Nicos Anastasiades
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Nicos Anastasiades
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 6 un mensaje de felicitacion al reelecto presidente de la Republica de Chipre, Nicos Anastasiades.
					Convencido de que las relaciones entre los dos paises se desarrollaran positivamente conforme a los intereses comunes, el remitente deseo mayores exitos en las labores responsables del destinatario por la prosperidad del pais y el bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Nuestra delegacion no piensa contactarse con la parte norteamericana, afirma Jo Yong Sam
articles.content:
Nuestra delegacion no piensa contactarse con la parte norteamericana, afirma Jo Yong Sam
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que las autoridades estadounidenses hablan a sus caprichos del problema de contacto entre la delegacion de la RPDC y el vicepresidente estadounidense que participaran en el acto inaugural de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales, el director del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jo Yong Sam, dio el dia 7 la siguiente respuesta:
					El dia 6, cuando un periodista pregunto sobre la posibilidad de contacto entre nuestra delegacion y el vicepresidente estadounidense que participaran en el acto inaugural de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales, el portavoz del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. contesto que "no hay el plan de encontrarse con el Norte de Corea durante y despues de esa cita deportiva" y "quiere dejarlo en claro".
					
					El vicepresidente estadounidense Pence tambien dijo que "no ha pedido ningun tipo de contacto con la delegacion norcoreana" y "exigio a las autoridades surcoreanas que eviten la concurrencia con ella". Ademas, agrego asi en tono jactancioso: "Vamos a ver que va a pasar".
					
					!Que ridiculo es eso!
					
					Nuestro pais nunca le ha suplicado el dialogo a EE.UU. y tampoco lo hara en el futuro.
					
					Evidentemente dicho, no pensamos contactarnos con la parte norteamericana durante la visita al Sur de Corea.
					
					Nuestra delegacion viaja al Sur de Corea con el mero objetivo de felicitar la apertura exitosa del evento deportivo participando en el mismo.
					
					No queremos utilizar ese festival deportivo como espacio politico ni tenemos la necesidad de hacerlo.
					
					Le convendria a EE.UU. portarse como caballero teniendo presente que su inapropiado acto verbal pone de relieve su situacion incomoda.

articles.title: Comandantes del EPC visitan el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Comandantes del EPC visitan el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 70 de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los comandantes del EPC visitaron el dia 8 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Los visitantes rindieron tributo a los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de pie y en los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos. 
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de las ordenes otorgadas a los lideres antecesores y otras de carros, coche electrico, barco y vagones de tren, usados por ellos hasta el ultimo periodo de sus vidas revolucionarias para las visitas de orientacion en el terreno y viajes al extranjero.

articles.title: Periodicos enumeran proezas de grandes Lideres por la construccion del EPC
articles.content:
Periodicos enumeran proezas de grandes Lideres por la construccion del EPC
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Los periodicos centrales coreanos publicaron hoy los editoriales dedicados al 70o aniversario de fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					La fundacion del EPC por el Presidente Kim Il Sung el 8 de febrero del 37 (1948) de la Era Juche fue un acontecimiento historico de enorme importancia para el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, destacaron los rotativos. 
					
					Rodong Sinmun adelanta que el Presidente es el fundador y constructor del heroico EPC y continua:
					
					Despues de la liberacion de la patria, los imperialistas norteamericanos ocuparon el suelo surcoreano y comenzaron a preparar la guerra. En tales circunstancias, la construccion de las fuerzas armadas regulares se presentaba como mayor prioridad. 
					
					Percatado de la situacion y la demanda legitima de la revolucion en desarrollo, Kim Il Sung presto atencion primordial a la construccion de las fuerzas armadas regulares revolucionarias presentandola como el mas importante de los asuntos estatales. 
					
					Y cumplio exitosamente esta causa en menos de tres anos en las condiciones dificiles en que no hubo las experiencias ni el cimiento. He aqui la imborrable proeza revolucionaria del extraordinario politico, genial estratega militar y patriota sin par. 
					
					Con su destacada ideologia militar y extraordinaria arte de mando, el Presidente y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il condujeron sabiamente para que el EPC ostentara su poderio de ejercito invencible. 
					
					Gracias a la larga prevision de los grandes Lideres y su probada direccion, el EPC mantiene de decada en decada su caracter de fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del partido y crea el ejemplo de relevancia mundial en la lucha antiimperialista estableciendo la unidad monolitica con las masas populares. 
					
					Hoy dia, el EPC acoge la era de esplendor bajo la guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Bajo la orientacion de su Comandante Supremo, el EPC abrira con valentia la senda de avance de la revolucion del Juche manifestando su poderio inagotable.  
					
					Minju Joson apunta que el EPC es el invencible ejercito revolucionario que bajo la direccion de los grandes hombres sin iguales, allano el camino inexplorado de la construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares y vino continuando generacion tras generacion la historia y la tradicion de victoria.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica la doctrina de "pacifismo activo" de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica la doctrina de "pacifismo activo" de Japon
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- En su reciente "discurso sobre la politica gubernamental", hecho en la camara de representantes de la Dieta, el premier japones Abe chismeo que haria todo lo posible por la paz y la prosperidad del orbe levantando en alto la bandera del "pacifismo activo". En cuanto a la "proteccion del pueblo", apunto que se esforzaria no como lo hacia antes sino por mejorar la capacidad de defensa realmente necesaria.
					Al repetir como papagayo el dia siguiente las palabras de Abe, el ministro de Defensa, Onodera, se refirio a la "proteccion del pueblo" frente a la "realidad rigurosa" y agrego que pensaria en el poderio defensivo realmente necesitado.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, cobran intensidad en el suelo japones los ejercicios conjuntos con EE.UU. y otros movimientos militares.
					
					Revela asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de hoy y prosigue:
					
					El hecho constituye una expresion coherente de la ambicion expansionista a ultramar de los reaccionarios japoneses que quieren convertir el pais en el capaz de hacer la guerra bajo el vistoso cartel de la "paz".
					
					A Japon, pais criminal de guerra, estan prohibidas la conversion en potencia militar y la participacion en guerra.
					
					Sin embargo, bajo el amparo de su patron norteamericano, prepara la capacidad de ataque preventivo y anda desesperado para realizar su ambicion expansionista a ultramar.
					
					Los gobernantes reaccionarios japoneses deberan calmar su fiebre expansionista al darse cuenta de que ningun pais tolerara la agresion de Japon aunque eso sucedio en el siglo pasado.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Speech at Military Parade
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Speech at Military Parade
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), made a congratulatory speech at the military parade held in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 The following is the full text of the speech:
					
					 Officers and men of the heroic Korean People's Army,
					
					 Commanders and combatants of the units participating in the parade to be held in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army,
					
					 Dear Pyongyang citizens and other people across the country,
					
					 Today, marking the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army, revolutionary regular armed forces, by the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung, we are holding a grand parade of the combat units of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The first parade of the regular armed forces held 70 years ago in the square in front of the Pyongyang Railway Station demonstrated the proud image of the newly-emergent Korea, and today's military parade will demonstrate the mettle of the powerful Democratic People's Republic of Korea which has developed into a world-class military power.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity when we are looking back with deep emotion on the proud militant course of history of the heroic Korean People's Army, and reflecting the great emotion overflowing in the hearts of all our service personnel and people, I would like to extend noblest respect and infinite glory to the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who founded and built up the Juche-oriented revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 I also would like to extend noble respect to the fighters of the anti-Japanese revolution and soldiers of the People's Army who fought with revolutionary arms in their hands, dedicating their youth and even lives without hesitation to the reunification and sovereignty of their country, to the liberation of their fellow people and to socialist construction, and greeting the army founding day, I offer my warm congratulations and militant salute to the war veterans, discharged soldiers and all the officers and men of the army.
					
					 My heartfelt thanks go to the working class, agricultural working people and other people across the country, who readily placed their sons and daughters, whom they had brought up with great care, at the posts of national defence, and have provided on a top priority basis, even in the face of difficulties and trials, everything needed for increasing the combat capabilities of the army.
					
					 Comrades,
					
					 Together with April 25, when Comrade Kim Il Sung founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, February 8, when he founded the Korean People's Army, revolutionary regular armed forces, is a day of historic significance in building up the revolutionary armed forces and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Our people, who had to experience the miserable fate of a ruined nation for lack of an army worth mentioning, ardently desired for a powerful army of their own.
					
					 This centuries-old desire of our people was achieved 70 years ago this February 8 under the wise leadership of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					 After the country's liberation the great Comrade Kim Il Sung set the founding of a powerful regular army as a prerequisite for developing the country into an independent and sovereign state. He stepped up the cause of army building by dint of his outstanding ideas and energetic leadership, thereby founding the Korean People's Army, the revolutionary regular armed forces of the Juche type, in a matter of less than three years.
					
					 The Korean People's Army is, both in name and in reality, a revolutionary army that inherited the traditions of the anti-Japanese struggle?the indomitable revolutionary spirit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and its rich fighting experience and adroit art of warfare.
					
					 Thanks to the birth of this Juche-oriented regular army our Republic, from the very beginning after its founding, enjoyed the prestige of being a dignified people's country with its own strong armed forces; it defeated the imperialist aggressor forces that had been boasting of being the "mightiest" in the world and achieved a great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 April 25, 1932, the day when our revolutionary armed forces began to take historical roots, was fundamental to vanquishing the brigandish Japanese imperialists and realizing the sacred cause of national liberation; February 8, 1948, the birthday of our regular armed forces that inherited the traditions of the anti-Japanese struggle, was crucial to the great victory of the Fatherland Liberation War and the successful advance of our socialist cause.
					
					 The whole course of historic development of the Korean People's Army has been accompanied by constant tension and intense confrontation in the world's largest powder-keg and hottest spot which is pregnant with the danger of outbreak of a war.
					
					 Being faithful to its mission of defending the country, the revolution and the people, our army has smashed the enemy's adventurous provocations at every step, upholding the military line of self-reliant defence and the banner of "a-match-for-a-hundred." In the course of this, it has been developed into an invincible combat force capable of defeating any enemy, however formidable, at a stroke.
					
					 In the grimmest and most difficult period when it had to fight against the allied imperialist forces of the world single-handed, with no flanks and with no support from outside, our People's Army performed remarkable exploits by waging a heroic, do-or-die struggle in the first line of the revolution under the leadership of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il.
					
					 As this elite revolutionary army played the role of the standard-bearer and solid cornerstone for defending socialism and the revolution at the forefront of the anti-imperialist military front and the construction of a prosperous country, our Republic has won one brilliant victory after another in the battle to safeguard socialism and gained the high reputation of a world-class military power.
					
					 In world history cannot be found any other nation that accomplished the great cause of army building from scratch by relying on its internal forces and built an elite army in spite of the protracted, worst-ever challenges and blockade; such brilliant exploit of building a powerful army for the sake of national prosperity is a miracle that can be wrought only by the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the peerless patriots and iron-willed commanders.
					
					 Officers and men of the People's Army,
					
					 The Korean People's Army, which made its first fine appearance through a magnificent parade 70 years previously, has become what it is today, hoisting the flag of victory in the fierce battle fields in defence of the country and people.
					
					 Our army, which has grown up into a world-class powerful army, is a stout pillar in preventing the catastrophe of war and defending peace on the Korean peninsula and in the region and a force that makes breakthroughs in the vanguard of the grand march of our people towards final victory for the socialist cause.
					
					 Now our people regard as their great pride our brave People's Army which is struggling with the spirit and stamina of Paektu, and are gaining fresh strength and courage from the militant might of our army which is growing stronger day by day.
					
					 The People's Army has won the sincere affection and trust of the people at the cost of blood, sweat and death-defying devotion, achieved oneness with them enjoying their enthusiastic support and assistance, and performed feats on the fronts for defending the country and building socialism.
					
					 It is a source of pride for our Party and state and a great fortune of our people that they have such a dignified and powerful revolutionary army, an army of the people.
					
					 I deem it the highest honour to have assumed the heavy responsibility of supreme command of the courageous revolutionary army.
					
					 On behalf of the Workers' Party of Korea, the government of the Republic and all the people, I once again warmly congratulate all the officers and men on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the heroic Korean People's Army, and extend militant greetings to them.
					
					 Combatants of the units participating in this parade and all the other officers and men of the People's Army,
					
					 As the Party and the country have high expectations of it and the people are sincere in their affection for it, the People's Army must defend the country and the people reliably through faithful service and devoted struggle as befits the army of the Party and people.
					
					 The People's Army should increase its political and military capabilities to the maximum as suited to the status of our dignified state to meet the demands of the times and the developing revolution, and firmly guarantee by force of arms the struggle of our Party and people to accomplish the socialist cause.
					
					 The central task facing the People's Army at present is to perfect its combat capabilities as befitting a revolutionary army by holding aloft the banner of modelling the entire army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and implementing to the letter the strategic lines and tasks for increasing the military strength put forward by the Party.
					
					 The People's Army should be boundlessly loyal to the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The Korean People's Army is the army of our Party which was born and built up in the embrace of the Party; the source of its mightiness lies in the Party's revolutionary ideas and leadership.
					
					 It should become the first death-defying corps, the first guards unit, sharing its destiny with the Workers' Party of Korea and defending its Central Committee with arms.
					
					 It should firmly establish the unified leadership system of the Party within itself, create a revolutionary military climate in which all its service personnel move as one under the command of the Party, and organize and conduct all types of military work on the basis of the Party's lines and policies.
					
					 It should maintain strengthening itself politically and ideologically and making itself morally sound as its two major tasks, and concentrate all its efforts on preparing itself as an army that is strong in ideology and faith like the 7th Regiment during the anti-Japanese war and the Guards units during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 It should raise more fiercely the flames of the revolution in training to improve its capability of fighting a war.
					
					 Training is precisely the way to defending the socialist country and the people, and the short-cut to turning the People's Army into a powerful army is to make the most exacting demand upon its soldiers under training.
					
					 It should steadily improve the content, style and method of training in line with the Party's ideas on military strategy and tactics, with the demands of the Juche-oriented tactics and with the demands and features of modern warfare, and should not stop even a day practical training in a virtual combat environment.
					
					 In the present situation, in which the United States and its vassal forces are making a fuss around the Korean peninsula, the People's Army should remain on full alert and give a spur to perfecting its combat preparedness.
					
					 Thus we must prevent any aggressive forces from violating or offending the dignity and sovereignty of our sacred country in the slightest.
					
					 Units of all services, arms and corps must intensify training aimed at having a command of their military hardware and improving their specialist levels, so as to make full preparations for waging hi-tech warfare in any operational space.
					
					 In particular, the People's Army must present building itself up into an army, which is excellent in all aspects, as an important strategic task in line with the requirements of the new, higher stage of turning the entire army into an army of cadres and modernizing it, and give top priority to its implementation.
					
					 The People's Army must establish rigid ethos and assume the appearance of a perfect regular army.
					
					 All the service personnel, from privates to generals, should be well versed in military regulations and manuals, and make it part of their habit to abide by them, thus ensuring that all units, sub-units and other places where there are soldiers always present regularized features.
					
					 All the officers and men of the army, always bearing in mind that the People's Army cannot exist even a moment separated from the people, must boundlessly respect and love them, and constantly sustain the fine traits of the revolutionary army, whose soldiers defy death if it is for the sake of the people.
					
					 The People's Army must not weigh the importance of undertakings intended for the people, but regard it as a revolutionary military climate to devote all its sincerity with the most honest attitude.
					
					 Holding higher the patriotic, revolutionary slogan "Let us take upon ourselves both national defence and socialist construction," it should give free rein to its unexcelled heroism in all places for translating the people's dreams and ideals into reality by displaying fortitude and creativity, not knowing the word impossible, and continuously take the lead in the struggle for transforming the country into a more beautiful land.
					
					 Comrades,
					
					 As long as imperialism exists on the globe and the United States persists in following its hostile policy against our country, the mission of the People's Army, as a powerful sword for defending the country, people and peace, can never be changed.
					
					 Final victory belongs to our Party and people with a firm grip on the arms of the revolution.
					
					 Our Party and people are fully convinced that the Korean People's Army, which has provided a military guarantee for the revolutionary cause of Juche, will continue to reliably defend the Party and the revolution, the country and the people, and increase its strength in every way possible to safeguard justice and peace.
					
					 As long as we have the Korean People's Army that is unfailingly loyal to the leadership of the Workers Party of Korea, our glorious motherland?the Democratic People's Republic of Korea?will grow more powerful and more prosperous.
					
					 All the service personnel of the People's Army,
					
					 The flag of the ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea will always lead the way ahead of you, giving you a great encouragement and rousing you to fresh struggle and victory.
					
					 Let us fight bravely for the Party and the revolution, the country and the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Congratulatory Speech at Military Parade
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Congratulatory Speech at Military Parade
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un made a congratulatory speech at the military parade for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 In his speech he said February 8 when President Kim Il Sung founded the KPA, regular revolutionary armed forces, is a historic day of great significance in building the revolutionary armed forces and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, like April 25 when the President founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA).
					
					 The KPA is the revolutionary army which inherited the traditions of the anti-Japanese struggle with the indomitable revolutionary spirit, rich fighting experience and superb tactics of the KPRA, he said.
					
					 Thanks to the foundation of the Juche-based regular army, the DPRK has proudly emerged the most dignified people's country with its own strong military guarantee from the first days of its birth and it could defeat the imperialist aggression forces boasting of being "the strongest" in the world and achieve the great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, he added.
					
					 He said it is the pride of our Party and state and great fortune of our people to have a majestic and powerful revolutionary army, the people's army.
					
					 Stressing the need for the KPA to hold high the banner of modeling the whole army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and carry through the strategic line and tasks for bolstering up the military strength set forth by the Party and thus have perfect combat efficiency as befits the revolutionary army, he said:
					
					 The People's Army should remain intensely loyal to the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 It should be the first death-defying corps and the first lifeguards defending the Central Committee of the WPK with arms, entrusting its destiny to the WPK.
					
					 Under the present situation in which the U.S. and its vassal forces make a fuss around the Korean Peninsula, the People's Army should keep high alert and step up combat preparations.
					
					 And thus it should restrain the aggressors from violating or making a mockery of the dignity and sovereignty of our inviolable country even 0.001 mm.
					
					 The People's Army should establish blade-like military discipline and more thoroughly take on the appearance as befits the regular army.
					
					 It should do things, big and small, for the sake of the people and regard devoting true feelings to them with utmost sincerity as its revolutionary army spirit.
					
					 Stating that as long as there exists imperialism on the earth and the U.S. pursues hostile policy toward the DPRK, the mission of the People's Army, a powerful treasured sword for the protection of the country and people and peace, can never be changed, he said the final victory is in store for the WPK and the people that take a grip on arms of revolution.
					
					 He stressed that the DPRK would be powerful and prosperous forever as long as there is the KPA boundlessly faithful to the leadership of the WPK.

articles.title: Military Parade Marks 70th Founding Anniversary of KPA
articles.content:
Military Parade Marks 70th Founding Anniversary of KPA
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A grand military parade for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army was held at Kim Il Sung Square in Pyongyang Thursday.
					 Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, arrived at the square together with Ri Sol Ju.
					
					 A ceremony of the guard of honor of the KPA three services took place to greet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 When he appeared at the platform of the square together with Ri Sol Ju, all members of the parade burst into cheers of "Hurrah!" looking up to him, and chanted slogans "Kim Jong Un" and "Devoted Defence".
					
					 The Supreme Leader waved back to the participants in the parade and the crowds.
					
					 Taking the platform were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Jong Gak, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, KPA Vice Marshal Ri Myong Su, chief of the KPA General Staff, Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, and other commanding officers of the General Political Bureau and the General Staff of the KPA and the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and commanders of large combined units.
					
					 The box of the platform was taken by Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, and Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 It was also occupied by leading officials of the party and government.
					
					 Taking the tribune of honor were officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, teachers and students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School and officials of industrial establishments and persons of merits in Pyongyang.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas compatriots and diplomatic envoys and their spouses, military attaches and their spouses here and other foreigners.
					
					 The guard of honor of the three services and the combined military band of the KPA began the opening ceremony.
					
					 The flags of the DPRK and the WPK were hoisted.
					
					 The commanding officer of the military parade reported the minister of the People's Armed Forces of the DPRK that the military parade units have lined up to get inspection for parade celebrating the 70th birthday of the KPA.
					
					 The minister of the People's Armed Forces inspected the parade units, congratulating them on Feb. 8 holiday.
					
					 Then he reported Marshal of the DPRK Kim Jong Un that the military parade would begin.
					
					 A signal trumpet for the start of the military parade was sounded and a 21-gun salute boomed.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 Cars carrying the flags bearing the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il entered the square, being escorted by generals and officers of the KPA.
					
					 The guard of honor of the three services of the KPA and all the members of the military parade paid high tribute, looking up to the flags bearing the portraits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Then the military parade began.
					
					 Columns symbolic of the period of building the regular armed forces took the lead.
					
					 Then led by a car with the commanding officer of the parade aboard, columns of the three services, corps-level units, arms, specialists and army surgeons marched past the square.
					
					 Fighters in the formation of number "70" flew past the sky above the square, letting off fireworks.
					
					 The columns of mechanized units, strategic forces units, Hwasong artillery men marched past the square in fine array.
					
					 Fighters left a trail of the shape of a five-color fan to specially decorate the end of the parade.
					
					 When the parade ended, thunderous cheers of "Hurrah!" reverberated far and wide, fireworks were displayed and balloons were let loose.
					
					 Kim Jong Un stepped to the balcony of the platform and acknowledged the enthusiastically cheering crowds.
					
					 The military parade for celebrating the 70th anniversary of the KPA demonstrated the faith and will of the Korean army and people to further consolidate the DPRK as the invincible fortress of socialism and bring earlier the final victory of the Juche revolution.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Welcome Participants in Military Parade
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Welcome Participants in Military Parade
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The servicepersons, who had participated in the grand military parade held in the presence of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army, were warmly welcomed by Pyongyangites along streets of the capital city Thursday.
					 The route ranging from Yonggwang Street to Chollima Yongung, Pipha, Sungri and University streets was crowded with hundreds of thousands of citizens who turned out to welcome the participants in the military parade.
					
					 Those crowds were waiting for the moment when they would welcome the servicepersons with bouquets, flowers and balloons in their hands.
					
					 Motorcars carrying the participants in the military parade with cars fixed with the flags bearing the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the lead left at the road in front of Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 Working citizens and youth and students waved bunches of flowers to hail them.
					
					 Foreigners and overseas compatriots also warmly welcomed them.
					
					 The columns of mechanized units passed Sungri and University streets amid warm welcome.

articles.title: DPRK High-level Delegation Arrives in S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK High-level Delegation Arrives in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A high-level delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea led by Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Friday arrived in south Korea to attend the opening ceremony of the 23rd Winter Olympics.
					 "Chammae-2", a personal jet of the DPRK government flying corps, carrying the delegation aboard, landed at Inchon International Airport around 13:15.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yo Jong and other members of the high-level delegation were greeted by Jo Myong Gyun, minister of Unification, and others concerned at the airport.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam and Kim Yo Jong had a pleasant talk with the south side's reception members at the VIP room before leaving for Phyongchang by the rapid transit train, where the opening ceremony of the Winter Olympics was to be held.

articles.title: DPRK High-level Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK High-level Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A high-level delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea led by Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, left here on Friday to attend the opening ceremony of the 23rd Winter Olympics.
					 The delegation is composed of Kim Yo Jong, first vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Choe Hwi, chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee, Ri Son Gwon, chairman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country, and other suite members.
					
					 A guard of honor of the services of the Korean People's Army lined up at the depot in front of the airport terminal.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam reviewed the guard of honor of the KPA services after receiving a salute from its first deputy chief.
					
					 "Chammae-2", a personal jet of the government flying corps carrying the delegation, took off at Pyongyang International Airport around 12:30.

articles.title: DPRK Players Team Enters Players Village for Winter Olympics
articles.content:
DPRK Players Team Enters Players Village for Winter Olympics
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK players team which will take part in the 23rd Winter Olympics entered Kangrung players village of south Korea with due ceremony on Feb. 8. 
					 Present at the ceremony were members of the players team and the cheering group of the DPRK and those concerned organizing the Olympics.
					
					 The flag of the DPRK was hoisted amid the solemn playing of the Patriotic Song, its national anthem.
					
					 Lilting female band music and spirited rhythmic movements by the DPRK's cheering group revved up the atmosphere of the ceremony.

articles.title: DPRK Art Troupe Gives Congratulatory Performance in Kangrung of S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK Art Troupe Gives Congratulatory Performance in Kangrung of S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The art troupe of the DPRK on Thursday began a congratulatory performance in Kangrung of south Korea ahead of the opening of the 23rd Winter Olympics.
					 The venue of the performance was crowded with many people from across south Korea to enjoy the congratulatory performance.
					
					 The performance were enjoyed by Jo Myong Gyun, minister of Unification, Chu Mi Ae, representative of the Minju Party, Choe Mun Sun, governor of south Kangwon Province, and other personages of the south side and south Koreans.
					
					 Among the audience were Kwon Hyok Bong, Hyon Song Wol and other leading members of the art troupe of the DPRK.
					
					 Put on the stage of the performance, which began with overture "Glad to See You" and "Fall, White Snow," were colorful numbers such as light music "Pyongyang Is Best" and string ensemble and female solo "Morning Star".
					
					 The performers well represented through their rich voice and skilled rendition the musical emotion of the resourceful and intelligent Korean nation with the history of 5 000 years and brilliant culture.
					
					 The DPRK artistes well portrayed world famous songs including "Arirang" from orchestra "Dear Melodies".
					
					 They also put on the stage south Korean songs.
					
					 The audience broke into cheers and loud applause whenever numbers changed as they were mesmerized by the peculiar arts spiced with strong national flavor.
					
					 The performers concluded with female trio "Mts. Paektu and Halla Are Part of My Motherland" and finale "Our Wish Is Reunification" and "See You Again" reflecting the will of all Koreans to put an end to the tragedy of national division as soon as possible and bring earlier the national reunification by their concerted efforts.
					
					 The performance was enthusiastically applauded by the audience.

articles.title: Pak Yong Sik Meets Zimbabwean Military Delegation
articles.content:
Pak Yong Sik Meets Zimbabwean Military Delegation
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Friday met and had a talk with a military delegation of the Republic of Zimbabwe led by Moyo Elson, commander of the Air Force of Zimbabwe, which paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: DPRK FM Working-Level Delegation Visits Russia
articles.content:
DPRK FM Working-Level Delegation Visits Russia
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A working-level delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry headed by Im Chon Il, director general of its European Department 1, visited Moscow at the invitation of the Russian Foreign Ministry.
					 The head of the delegation had negotiations with Andrei B. Kulik, director of the Asia 1 Department of the Russian Foreign Ministry, on Feb. 6.
					
					 At the negotiations, an in-depth discussion was made on matters arising in the bilateral relations including a plan of joint event for marking the 70th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia and views on the situation on the Korean Peninsula were exchanged.
					
					 Both sides decided to positively propel the development of the overall bilateral relations by activating visits and contacts between the two countries and expanding the cooperation in various fields this year marking the above-said anniversary.

articles.title: Zimbabwean Military Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Zimbabwean Military Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A military delegation of the Republic of Zimbabwe headed by Moyo Elson, commander of the Air Force of Zimbabwe, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung, the guests looked round the historical mementoes preserved at his old home.
					
					 The delegation also toured Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Sci-Tech Complex, etc.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter, Gift from Director of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter, Gift from Director of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket, congratulatory letter and gift from Jin Yuhua, director of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, with the approach of the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il).
					 They were conveyed to an official concerned from Jin Yuhua on Friday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Commander of Zimbabwe Defence Forces
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Commander of Zimbabwe Defence Forces
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by Philip Valerio Sibanda, commander of the Zimbabwe Defence Forces.
					 The gift was conveyed to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Moyo Elson, commander of the Air Force of Zimbabwe who is heading a military delegation of the Republic of Zimbabwe, on Friday on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: KPA Song and Dance Ensemble Gives Performance
articles.content:
KPA Song and Dance Ensemble Gives Performance
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble gave a music and dance performance at the April 25 House of Culture Thursday in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 Kim Jong Gak, Ri Myong Su, Pak Yong Sik and Ri Yong Gil and other officials of armed forces organs watched the performance.
					
					 Enjoying it were senior party and government officials Pak Kwang Ho, Choe Pu Il and Jong Kyong Thaek, and officials of the Party Central Committee, ministries and national institutions and officials and labor innovators of institutions and industrial establishments in Pyongyang.
					
					 Invited to the performance were overseas compatriots, representatives and military attaches of foreign embassies here and representatives of international bodies here and their spouses and other foreign guests.
					
					 Put on the stage of the performance, which began with chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army", were such numbers as choruses "Cantata to Marshal Kim Il Sung" and "Long Live the Great Songun Brilliant Commander".
					
					 Orchestra "Look at Us," etc. revved up the mood of the performance. Those numbers showed the militant spirit, optimism and comradeship of the service personnel who have grown up to be a-match-for-a-hundred fighters under the care of the illustrious commanders.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience as it demonstrated the spirit and might of the invincible KPA.

articles.title: Music and Dance Performance Given to Celebrate KPA Birthday
articles.content:
Music and Dance Performance Given to Celebrate KPA Birthday
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troup gave a music and dance performance here on Thursday in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Among the audience were teachers and students of military academies at all levels, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School, persons of merits in army-assisting, labor innovators and other working people, youth and students in Pyongyang.
					
					 The performers impressively represented the proud 70-year-long history of the Korean revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the army-building exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who founded the KPA, the revolutionary regular armed forces of Juche type, and strengthened it into an invincible revolutionary army, thus providing sure military guarantee for prosperity of socialist Korea.

articles.title: Many Art Pieces Produced to Deal with Army-building Feats of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Many Art Pieces Produced to Deal with Army-building Feats of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A large number of art pieces were produced in the DPRK to deal with the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung for the past 70 years.
					 Among those paintings dealing with the exploits of the President for the founding of the Korean People's Army are works showing his big efforts made to solve the issue of training military and political cadres conductive to the building of modern regular armed forces.
					
					 They include acryl painting "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung inspecting the Security Officers Training Centre" and Korean painting "In those days of building the first flying corps".
					
					 There are also paintings showing the deep trust of the Korean army and people in the President who laid an eternal foundation for building self-supporting defense industry while taking the lead in breaking through the untrodden path to the Juche-oriented defense industry.
					
					 An oil painting "Founding of the Korean People's Army" dealing with the service personnel and people breaking into enthusiastic cheers, looking up to the legendary hero on the tribune of honor of the first military parade of the KPA, gives an epic depiction of the profound thanks of all the Korean people to Kim Il Sung who accomplished the historic, great cause of founding the regular revolutionary armed forces.

articles.title: Youth League Officials Tour Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site
articles.content:
Youth League Officials Tour Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site
Samjiyon, February 9 (KCNA) -- The expedition of youth league officials from across the country to leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp went round the Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site and the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 1.
					 The expedition arrived at the battle site on Feb. 6.
					
					 Its members visited the Samjiyon Grand Monument to place a floral basket and bunches of flowers at the statue of President Kim Il Sung and pay tribute to him.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that the site was built into an excellent center for education in the revolutionary traditions, they looked round the grand monument.
					
					 In front of the statue of leader Kim Jong Il in Samjiyon County, they vowed to build an invincible powerful socialist country true to the patriotic desire of the great leaders for a powerful and prosperous country.
